date_attribute.weather: Sunny, comfortable temperature, with a slight breeze.

2025-01.daily_overview: During the New Year's holiday, Yu Xiaowei spent a fulfilling and heartwarming day at home with her family. She and her husband collaborated on a renovation project to refresh the living room, prepared an afternoon tea for the family, and enjoyed movies, games, and a cozy dinner together. The day was filled with the joy of holiday reunions and beautiful expectations for the new year.

events.name: New Year Home Renovation Preparation
events.description: On the morning of New Year's Day, Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming took advantage of the holiday to prepare together for the renovation of their living room. They retrieved the beige-colored new curtains and sofa covers they had previously purchased and stored in the storage room, checking whether all the accessories were complete. Meanwhile, following her husband's suggestion, Yu Xiaowei prepared tools such as a ladder and a screwdriver for the replacement. The two enthusiastically discussed what the living room would look like after the renovation.

events.name: Collaborate on Replacing the Living Room Soft Furnishings
events.description: After lunch, Yu Xiaowei and her husband began replacing the soft furnishings in the living room. Zhang Weiming was responsible for climbing the ladder to remove and install the curtain rods, while Yu Xiaowei assisted by passing the accessories and ensuring the curtains were smooth and at the right height. Afterwards, the two worked together to put on new sofa covers and adjust the positions of the cushions. Looking at the slightly worn old fabrics they had taken down, Yu Xiaowei felt a sense of satisfaction in bidding farewell to the old and welcoming the new. She carefully folded them up, ready to be washed.

events.name: Preparing a family afternoon tea
events.description: After the living room was given a fresh new look, Yu Xiaowei happily prepared afternoon tea for her family. She skillfully brewed a pot of rich, authentic Hong Kong-style milk tea and placed the frozen pineapple buns in the oven for a quick warm-up. She carefully arranged the milk tea, warm pineapple buns, and some small snacks on the coffee table, which was now adorned with a beige tablecloth, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere for the afternoon tea.

events.name: Home Theater and Board Game Time
events.description: The entire family—Yu Xiaowei, Zhang Weiming, their son Zhang Zixuan, daughter Zhang Yuxin, and grandmother Chen Meiling—gathered in the newly renovated living room. They enjoyed afternoon tea while watching a lighthearted Lunar New Year comedy film. After the movie, at the children’s request, the family played a round of Monopoly. As they played, Yu Xiaowei and her husband guided their two children in learning basic financial concepts, filling the living room with laughter and joy.

events.name: Collaborating with Mother to Prepare Dinner
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei and her mother, Chen Meiling, were in the kitchen preparing a simple yet hearty homemade dinner. Her mother took charge of cooking the wonton noodles and roasted meats, while Yu Xiaowei assisted by handling the vegetables and arranging the dishes. As they worked, the mother and daughter chatted, with the mother sharing amusing stories from past New Year celebrations, and Yu Xiaowei discussing her work plans for the upcoming year and her hopes for the family. The kitchen was filled with the aroma of food and the warmth of familial affection. Meanwhile, her husband, Zhang Weiming, was in the living room playing with the children and building blocks.

events.name: Warm New Year Family Dinner
events.description: The whole family gathered around the dining table, enjoying a dinner prepared by both the mother and Yu Xiaowei. On the table were steaming bowls of wonton noodles, fragrant roasted meat platters, and several plates of lightly stir-fried seasonal vegetables. As they ate, they chatted animatedly. The children excitedly recounted the "battle scenes" from their afternoon games, while Zhang Weiming praised the new curtains for brightening up the living room. Watching the satisfied smiles on her family's faces, Yu Xiaowei felt a particularly warm and harmonious atmosphere, filling her with confidence and anticipation for the coming year.

events.name: Evening Family Leisure and Winding Down
events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei and her husband helped her mother clean up the dishes and the kitchen. Meanwhile, the children were in the living room watching children's programs with their grandfather. Once everything was tidied up, the family gathered together to chat for a while before each prepared to wash up and rest. Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei briefly reflected on the fulfilling day, marked the task of cleaning the old fabric items on her phone calendar for the next day, and then fell asleep peacefully.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong.
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, joyful, and full of anticipation for the new year

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong.
结束状态.心情: Satisfaction, happiness, and a strong sense of family belonging.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first workday after the New Year's holiday, Yu Xiaowei swiftly switched into work and planning mode. During breaks and lunchtime, she efficiently scheduled upcoming activities for her personal interests (yoga) and social relaxation (SPA). However, due to unexpected client consultations requiring overtime work, she ended up staying up late.

events.name: Handling Old Fabrics and Organizing Tools
events.description: Before leaving in the morning, Yu Xiaowei put the old curtains and sofa covers she had changed yesterday into the washing machine and returned the ladder, screwdriver, and other tools to the storage room. She entrusted the task of hanging the laundry to her mother, Chen Meiling, who was at home, ensuring that the living environment was restored to a clean and orderly state.

events.name: Planning New Year's resolutions during the commute
events.description: On the subway to her company in Wan Chai, Yu Xiaowei put on her headphones to listen to some light music, and began planning her personal growth and leisure arrangements for the new year. She thought about health check-ups, fitness classes, and gatherings with friends, and decided to take advantage of breaks at work to get a few things done first.

events.name: Query and select a yoga course
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei did not go out. Instead, after quickly finishing her lunch at a nearby tea restaurant, she used her phone to browse the website of the community center near her home. She carefully reviewed the schedule for the January yoga classes, comparing different time slots and the qualifications of the instructors. Considering that her child was taken care of by her husband, Zhang Weiming, every Wednesday evening, she ultimately decided on a class during that time slot and preliminarily checked the fees through the website.

events.name: Confirm and book a SPA appointment with your best friend.
events.description: During a break in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei sent a message to her best friend Lin Jiaxin via WhatsApp, suggesting they go for a spa treatment together over the weekend to relax. Lin Jiaxin quickly replied, agreeing to the idea. The two briefly exchanged a few preferred spa options and eventually settled on a well-regarded Japanese-style spa center in Tsim Sha Tsui. Yu Xiaowei then used a mobile app to complete the booking and online payment for a couples' package, sharing the reservation details with Lin Jiaxin afterward.

events.name: Temporary client urgently consults about overtime work.
events.description: Before leaving work, Yu Xiaowei received a call from an important client, Wang Qiming, inquiring about an urgent adjustment to an insurance plan. She had to stay behind to work overtime, meticulously handling the relevant documents, and did not finish until 8 p.m. This disrupted her evening plans, causing her to return home later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to get to work.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong
结束状态.心情: Tired but organized, looking forward to the relaxing activities of the weekend.

2025-01.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowei focuses on making forward-looking arrangements for family and personal development. She efficiently completed the annual health check-up appointments for the entire family and officially initiated a plan to learn Mandarin for career expansion. However, due to fatigue from working overtime the previous day, she went to bed early today to recover.

events.name: Schedule an annual family health check-up
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei took some time to book annual physical checkups for her family of four (herself, her husband, and their two children) through the mobile app of Hong Kong Sanatorium & Hospital. She selected Dr. Zhou Wenbin, a familiar doctor, and scheduled the appointments for next Friday morning (January 10). Since it was a weekday, she specifically requested half a day off. After the booking was confirmed, the system automatically generated a reminder with important notes.

events.name: Research and register for Mandarin courses
events.description: In the evening, after the children had fallen asleep, Yu Xiaowei opened her computer in the study. To achieve her goal of being promoted to regional manager within three years and better serving mainland clients, she believed it was crucial to improve her Mandarin proficiency. She searched and compared several well-known online language learning platforms, focusing on course flexibility, relevance to insurance business scenarios, and user reviews. After nearly an hour of comparison, she finally chose a platform offering a specialized "Insurance Business Mandarin" course and completed the registration and payment for the beginner-level program.

events.name: Preliminary browsing of course content
events.description: After signing up, Yu Xiaowei couldn't wait to download the mobile app of the learning platform and log in. She quickly browsed the course catalog for the first unit, which included basic pronunciation, insurance terminology, and simple conversations. She got a general idea of the learning format and decided to start the first lesson during her commute tomorrow.

events.name: Rest early due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to fatigue from working overtime yesterday, Yu Xiaowei did not engage in any extra activities tonight. She washed up early and rested to ensure her body recovers.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong
起始状态.心情: Focused, with a sense of planning.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Recovering, feeling excited about learning new skills.

2025-01.daily_overview: Saturday is a day for relaxation and socializing. In the morning, Yu Xiaowei enjoyed the tranquility of her personal hobby (Cantonese embroidery) at home. In the afternoon, she had a high-quality SPA gathering with her close friend Lin Jiaxin, which effectively relieved the fatigue accumulated over a week of work and deepened their friendship. However, she ate a bit more during dinner after the SPA, leading to a slight weight gain.

events.name: Weekend Cantonese Embroidery Practice Preparation
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei was organizing her Cantonese embroidery tools in the study. She arranged the various colored silk threads according to their color families and selected a piece of beige silk fabric, stretching it over the embroidery hoop. Recalling the "layered stitching" technique that her teacher Wu Xiuying had demonstrated the previous week, she decided to try embroidering a simple kapok flower as the start of her new work for the New Year. She first lightly sketched the outline on the fabric with a pencil.

events.name: Depart for the SPA appointment.
events.description: After a simple lunch with her family, Yu Xiaowei put on some comfortable clothes and left home around 1 p.m. She chose to take the subway to Tsim Sha Tsui, and on the way, she used her phone to review a few Mandarin vocabulary words she had studied the night before.

events.name: Enjoying SPA Time with My Best Friend
events.description: Yu Xiaowei and Lin Jiaxin met on time at the Japanese-style spa. They first enjoyed a 90-minute full-body aromatherapy massage in a fragrant room. The masseuse’s professional techniques greatly relaxed Yu Xiaowei’s stiff shoulders and neck, which had been strained from prolonged sitting and commuting. The subsequent facial treatment left her skin feeling refreshed and moisturized. The entire experience took place in a serene, elegant environment accompanied by soft music. The two occasionally whispered their thoughts to each other, but most of the time, they simply enjoyed a state of complete relaxation.

events.name: Heart-to-heart chat and dinner with bestie after care.
events.description: After the treatment, the two of them, dressed in bathrobes, enjoyed herbal tea and healthy light snacks in the spa’s relaxation area. As they unwound, they began to open up. Lin Jiaxin talked about the troubles caused by mischievous students at school, while Yu Xiaowei shared the pressure of her New Year work targets and the challenges of starting to learn Mandarin. They confided in each other and offered mutual encouragement—Lin Jiaxin cheered on Yu Xiaowei’s language learning, while Yu Xiaowei gave Lin Jiaxin some ideas for classroom management. Later, they decided to have dinner out and chose their favorite roast meat restaurant, where Yu Xiaowei couldn’t resist indulging in extra pineapple buns and roast meats.

events.name: Return home to share joy.
events.description: It was almost evening by the time the SPA session ended. Yu Xiaowei and Lin Jiaxin parted ways at the subway station and headed home separately. Upon returning home, Yu Xiaowei felt a sense of lightness in both body and mind. During dinner, she described the relaxing experience of the SPA to her husband and mother, remarking that deep conversations with a close friend truly were the best way to relieve stress.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, Anticipating

结束状态.所处地点: At home in the living room, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong.
结束状态.心情: Relaxed, joyful, with social needs fulfilled.

2025-01.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for family and planning. Yu Xiaowei spends the daytime with her family, and in the evening, she utilizes the quiet time for Cantonese embroidery, meticulously planning her newly initiated Mandarin studies, and preparing for the workweek. This reflects her ability to balance family life with personal development, and her weight has slightly decreased due to dietary control.

events.name: Family breakfast and a walk in the park.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei and her husband took their two children to a nearby teahouse for morning tea with their parents. Afterwards, the whole family went for a walk in Kowloon Walled City Park, enjoying the warm sunshine. Their son, Zhang Zixuan, played soccer in the open space, while their daughter, Zhang Yuxin, learned about plants and flowers from her grandmother.

events.name: Develop a detailed study plan
events.description: While the children were playing at home in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei spent an hour in the study crafting a detailed plan for her three-month Mandarin and insurance product learning journey. She sketched a calendar in her notebook, deciding to utilize the approximately two hours of daily commuting time for APP-based course learning, with a goal of completing one unit per week. Additionally, she organized several newly released electronic resource packages on the company's intranet for insurance products, preparing to study them simultaneously.

events.name: Evening Cantonese Embroidery Practice
events.description: In the evening, after the children had fallen asleep, the house grew quiet. Yu Xiaowei took out the embroidery hoop she had prepared the day before and began embroidering kapok flowers under the soft light in the living room. She focused on the "layered stitching" technique taught by her teacher, allowing the colors of the petals to transition naturally from deep to light. Throughout the process, she wore headphones and listened to soft music. This kind of handicraft, which required extreme patience and concentration, brought her a sense of inner peace.

events.name: Review insurance product materials
events.description: During a break from embroidery, Yu Xiaowei opened her tablet and browsed through the key points of the company's newly launched savings-type insurance product. She used a highlighter to mark key information such as the "guaranteed return portion" and "expected dividends" in the electronic document, preparing for the potential discussion of the new product at tomorrow's team meeting.

events.name: Organize Weekly Work Reports and Cases
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei spent about half an hour organizing last week's customer follow-up records and performance data on her computer. She specifically prepared a complex case she recently encountered regarding the integration of family trusts and insurance, planning to seek advice from her supervisor Liang Zhenhua and colleagues during tomorrow's team meeting in hopes of finding a better solution.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and well-planned, prepared for the upcoming week.

2025-01.daily_overview: At the start of the new workweek, Yu Xiaowei entered an efficient multitasking mode. She utilized fragmented time to begin learning Mandarin, actively participated in team meetings, and started planning for the marathon season, though her emotions fluctuated slightly due to work pressure.

events.name: Morning Commute Initiates Mandarin Learning
events.description: On the subway from her home in Kowloon City to her company in Wan Chai, Yu Xiaowei put on her headphones and opened a Mandarin learning app. She began studying the first unit, "Basic Pronunciation and Greetings," repeatedly practicing fundamental words such as "hello," "goodbye," and "thank you." She used the app's recording feature to compare her pronunciation with the standard one and realized that her tones, especially the third tone, required more practice.

events.name: Attend the team weekly meeting
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei attended a team meeting chaired by her supervisor, Liang Zhenhua, at the AIA Building. She clearly reported last week's performance and this week's key client follow-up plan, and presented a complex case she had prepared yesterday for discussion. Liang Zhenhua provided crucial guidance, and her colleague Su Lishan also shared similar experiences. During the meeting, the company’s upcoming flagship savings product was introduced. Yu Xiaowei took careful notes but felt the pressure brought by the new performance targets.

events.name: Deepening the Study of Insurance Terminology at Noon
events.description: During her lunch break, Yu Xiaowei did not go out for a meal with her colleagues. Instead, she bought a sandwich and ate it at her workstation while studying. Focusing on the new product mentioned in the morning meeting, she used a Mandarin app to specifically learn the pronunciation of key insurance terms such as "premium," "sum insured," "annuity," and "lifetime coverage." She also attempted to describe the product features in Mandarin, albeit with some hesitation. Nevertheless, she had taken the first step.

events.name: Browse marathon event information
events.description: Before leaving work, after handling the urgent emails at hand, Yu Xiaowei quickly browsed through the messages in the running enthusiasts group. A fellow runner had shared the calendar for half-marathon events in Hong Kong and surrounding areas (such as Macau and Guangzhou) for the first half of 2025. She paid special attention to the events around April, as the weather would be suitable then, and it would give her ample time to prepare.

events.name: Evening Commute Review and Family Time
events.description: On the subway ride home from work, Yu Xiaowei put on her headphones again to review the vocabulary and short sentences she had learned that day. After arriving home, she checked her son’s homework, accompanied her daughter in drawing, and shared a dinner prepared by her mother with the family. After the meal, she reminded everyone about the need to fast for the medical check-up scheduled for Friday.

起始状态.心情: Full of energy, ready to take on the challenges of the new week.

2025-01.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowei resumed her morning jogging routine, which had been paused due to holidays and social activities, starting the workday with a relaxed 5-kilometer run. She continued to use her commute time to reinforce her Mandarin learning, gradually returning to a regular and energetic pace of life, with her weight slightly decreasing due to exercise.

events.name: Resume morning running training
events.description: At 6 a.m., Yu Xiaowei changed into her sportswear and went for a 5-kilometer easy run in her neighborhood. This was her first morning run after the New Year, aimed at waking up her body and laying the foundation for gradually increasing her running distance. She maintained a steady pace, enjoying the cool morning air and the gradually awakening city. After the run, while stretching, she checked the data recorded by her sports watch. Her heart rate and pace were both within a comfortable range, and she felt great.

events.name: Commute Time Reading Practice
events.description: On the subway to work, Yu Xiaowei continued her Mandarin studies. She repeatedly practiced the short sentences from the first lesson, such as "Hello, I am Yu Xiaowei from AIA" and "It's a pleasure to serve you," focusing particularly on overcoming the challenges of tones. She played back her recordings, carefully identified the differences, and marked the syllables that needed improvement in her notebook.

events.name: Customer Follow-up and Case Handling
events.description: Today's work focus is on following up with several key clients. Yu Xiaowei made a call to client Mrs. Chan, offering a brief quarterly greeting and scheduling a policy anniversary review for next week. Meanwhile, based on the ideas discussed in yesterday's meeting, she further refined the solution for that complex case and prepared a preliminary proposal.

events.name: Communicate with running partners online.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei sent a message to her running friend Shen Peiwen via WhatsApp, sharing her feelings about resuming running this morning and asking if she was interested in signing up for the half marathon in April together. Shen Peiwen quickly replied, expressing her interest, and the two agreed to discuss the event choices in detail over the weekend.

events.name: Evening Study and Relaxation
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei completed all the exercises and a small test for the first lesson on the Mandarin app. After that, she watched half an hour of cartoons with the children, and then worked on some unfinished Cantonese embroidery while listening to music.

At the same time, she made progress in her Mandarin studies and actively maintained her close friendships by scheduling a deep conversation. However, due to the late yoga class, she returned home late and stayed up late.

events.name: Commuting Learning Scenario Dialogue
events.description: During the morning rush hour on the subway, Yu Xiaowei began studying the second unit, "Opening Lines for Customer Communication." She imitated the situational dialogues from the course, learning how to schedule client visits and engage in simple small talk in Mandarin. She found that memorizing entire dialogues was more interesting and practical than simply learning individual words.

events.name: Reconfirm the physical examination matters.
events.description: After arriving at the company, Yu Xiaowei sent a message to her husband, Zhang Weiming, during a work break, reminding him once again that the family’s medical check-up tomorrow required fasting, and asking him to remember to bring his ID card and their child’s vaccination record. She also wrote the reminders on the whiteboard of the family’s shared calendar.

events.name: Participate in community yoga classes
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowei went directly to the community center and attended the first yoga class in January. The class focused on basic postures and breathing exercises, and the stretching after a long day of sitting made her feel very comfortable. During the class, she also met a neighbor who lived in the same community, and they agreed to attend future classes together. The class ended later than scheduled due to extended discussions.

events.name: Confirming weekend afternoon tea with my best friend.
events.description: On her way home after the yoga class, Yu Xiaowei confirmed the Saturday afternoon tea arrangement with Lin Jiaxin via WhatsApp. They eventually settled on a quiet café in Kowloon Tong, which was perfect for chatting. Yu Xiaowei took the initiative to book a table and completed the reservation on her phone. She was looking forward to having a deeper conversation with Lin Jiaxin this time.

events.name: Evening Pronunciation Difficulties Breakthrough
events.description: After the children went to bed at night, Yu Xiaowei practiced the tones of Mandarin in her study. She repeatedly followed along with professional terms such as "理赔 (lǐ péi)" and "储蓄 (chǔ xù)," recording herself and listening back to mark the third and second tones she often confused. After practicing for about 40 minutes, she finally felt some improvement.

2025-01.daily_overview: It was an informative and productive day. In the morning, she completed the family's annual health check-up and received professional health advice. In the afternoon, after returning to work, she actively studied new products and preliminarily set a marathon goal event, as her fasting weight was slightly low during the check-up.

events.name: The whole family undergoes an annual health check-up.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming took their two children to the Hong Kong Sanatorium & Hospital. At Dr. Zhou Wenbin's clinic, the entire family underwent routine check-ups in sequence, including blood tests, blood pressure measurements, height and weight checks, as well as vision and hearing tests. The children cooperated well under the guidance of the nurses, and the process went smoothly.

events.name: Listen to the professional advice of a doctor.
events.description: Dr. Zhou Wenbin initially reviewed Yu Xiaowei's basic physical fitness data and affirmed her cardiovascular function, which benefited from long-term running training. However, he also inquired with concern about her recent running volume and knee sensations. Upon hearing Yu Xiaowei mention a slight knee reaction during her morning run, the doctor advised her to appropriately increase the proportion of low-impact exercises such as yoga or swimming while maintaining her marathon training. This would help balance muscle strength, enhance joint stability, and prevent injuries. Yu Xiaowei carefully noted this suggestion and decided to increase the frequency of her yoga sessions starting next week.

events.name: Midday Study on New Insurance Products
events.description: After the health check-up, Yu Xiaowei went straight back to the company. During the lunch break, instead of going out, she stayed at her workstation, eating her packed lunch while carefully reading the detailed product description of the savings-type insurance plan. She used different colored highlighters to mark key terms such as "guaranteed cash value," "non-guaranteed dividends," and "flexible withdrawals," striving to fully understand the product details.

events.name: Preliminary Selection of Marathon Events
events.description: During a work break, Yu Xiaowei compared several half marathon events scheduled for April once again. After considering factors such as event reputation (supplies, organization), dates (avoiding peak work periods), and the ease of registration, she initially leaned toward signing up for the "Hong Kong Green Half Marathon," known for its scenic route. She shared this option with her running friend Shen Peiwen to seek her opinion.

events.name: After-Work Shopping and Family Dinner
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowei went to the supermarket to buy some fresh ingredients to prepare for the family gathering over the weekend. In the evening, while having dinner with the whole family, she shared the doctor's advice on balancing exercise and joked that she would drag Zhang Weiming along for swimming in the future.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Saturday morning, Yu Xiaowei focused on reviewing and tackling challenges in Mandarin learning. In the afternoon, she enjoyed a high-quality, in-depth afternoon tea with her close friend Lin Jiaxin. The emotional exchange was profound, effectively alleviating stress, and they planned the next phase of parent-child social activities. Her weight increased slightly due to the afternoon tea.

events.name: Intensive review of Mandarin Chinese courses
events.description: On Saturday morning, Yu Xiaowei did not have any other activities scheduled. She concentrated on reviewing all the content from the first two units of Mandarin in her home study. For professional terms such as "claims settlement," "annuity," and "insurance application form," she engaged in intensive audio shadowing exercises until she felt her pronunciation was relatively natural. She also attempted to briefly summarize the features of the new insurance product in Mandarin.

events.name: Setting off to meet my best friend.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei left home and took the subway to Kowloon Tong. She deliberately set out twenty minutes early, and on the way, she reflected on the recent bottlenecks in learning Mandarin and the challenges of expanding her client base in mainland China at work, planning to share these concerns with Lin Jiaxin.

events.name: Deep Afternoon Tea Chat
events.description: Yu Xiaowei and Lin Jiaxin met at a quiet café they had reserved in advance. After ordering Hong Kong-style milk tea and pineapple buns, the two quickly delved into a deep conversation. Lin Jiaxin poured out the immense pressure she faced as a homeroom teacher when dealing with student conflicts and communicating with parents. Yu Xiaowei, on the other hand, shared her frustrations while learning Mandarin and the uncertainties she encountered when interacting with mainland clients due to language and cultural differences. They did more than just vent—they analyzed each other’s problems, offering practical encouragement and advice. For instance, Yu Xiaowei suggested that Lin Jiaxin try a more structured approach to parent-teacher communication, while Lin Jiaxin encouraged Yu Xiaowei to treat learning as a game and seek more opportunities to practice.

events.name: Scheduled Parent-Child Gathering
events.description: When discussing children's education, the two discovered that their sons were about the same age. To continue this friendship and help the children connect as well, they immediately agreed to find a weekend next month to get together with their sons, planning to visit either a science museum or an outdoor park. They took out their phones to check each other's schedules and tentatively marked two possible dates.

events.name: Return Home to Share and Enjoy Family Time
events.description: The afternoon tea lasted nearly three hours. After saying goodbye, Yu Xiaowei felt much more relaxed, as if a part of her psychological burden had been lifted. When she returned home for dinner, she briefly mentioned the afternoon gathering to her husband and mother, saying she had talked a lot with Lin Jiaxin and felt good about it. She also mentioned the plan to take the children out to play together next month. After dinner, she read a bedtime story to her daughter.

起始状态.所处地点: Home study at 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong.
起始状态.心情: Focused, with a slight sense of academic pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Relieved and warm, having gained deep emotional support.

2025-01.daily_overview: Sunday is the core family day. In the morning, Yu Xiaowei confirmed her marathon registration with her running friends. In the afternoon, she went shopping with her mother to prepare for the family dinner. The evening was marked by a warm New Year's gathering, where family members engaged in deep conversations about their annual goals, strengthening emotional bonds. However, the indulgent feast led to a noticeable weight gain.

events.name: Confirm event registration with running buddies.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei and Shen Peiwen finalized their participation in the "Hong Kong Green Half Marathon" (scheduled for April) through a video call. Together, they filled out the registration forms online, reviewed each other’s information, submitted the applications, and successfully paid the registration fees. After completing the registration, both of them were thrilled and agreed to start a more systematic training plan next week.

events.name: Cantonese Embroidery Practice and Exchange
events.description: After signing up, Yu Xiaowei relaxed and took out her Cantonese embroidery piece, continuing to embroider the kapok flower. While attempting the more complex "tearing stitch" technique to depict the flower's stamen, she encountered a slight difficulty. She took a photo of the unfinished work and sent it via WeChat to her teacher, Wu Xiuying, for advice. Teacher Wu quickly responded with a voice message, pointing out the key technique. After trying it, Yu Xiaowei found that the results had indeed improved.

events.name: Shopping for ingredients for a family gathering with mother.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei and her mother, Chen Meiling, went to the Kowloon City Market together. They carefully selected fresh white-cut chicken, live fish, large shrimp, and various vegetables. Yu Xiaowei also bought a bouquet of flowers and a bottle of her father's favorite wine as a token of gratitude for her family's support during the New Year. The mother and daughter chatted and laughed while shopping, returning home with their hands full.

events.name: Assist mother in preparing the grand feast.
events.description: Upon returning home, my mother began to showcase her culinary skills in the kitchen. Yu Xiaowei assisted by washing and chopping vegetables, learning the secrets of Cantonese cooking from her. The kitchen was filled with steam and an enticing aroma, creating a busy yet joyful family atmosphere.

events.name: New Year Family Dinner and Goal Sharing
events.description: In the evening, a sumptuous Cantonese New Year feast was served: poached chicken, steamed grouper, sliced abalone in oyster sauce, slow-cooked soup, and more. The whole family gathered around the table. Yu Xiaowei was the first to raise her glass, expressing gratitude for her family's support and sharing her three New Year's goals: continuing to study Mandarin for a promotion, completing a half marathon, and planning a family trip. She then encouraged her family to share their own aspirations. Her husband, Zhang Weiming, revealed his desire to attend training on new air conditioning technologies. Their son, Zhang Zixuan, excitedly talked about his school's soccer match. Their daughter, Zhang Yuxin, sweetly sang a newly learned nursery rhyme. Finally, Yu Guoqiang, her father, brought out a treasured bottle of aged liquor, reflecting on how family harmony is the most precious treasure of all.

events.name: Post-Meal Family Meeting and Emotional Bonding
events.description: After dinner, the family did not disperse immediately. Yu Xiaowei and her husband helped their mother clean up, while the children played around their grandparents. Later, everyone gathered in the newly refreshed living room to continue chatting. Yu Xiaowei listened attentively and responded to everyone's thoughts, discussing with her husband how to support his further education plans, encouraging her son to persist in his interest in football, and praising her daughter's singing voice. This open and supportive communication created an exceptionally warm and harmonious family atmosphere.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, pleasant

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong, living room at home.
结束状态.心情: Extremely satisfied and happy, with family cohesion reaching an unprecedented high.

2025-01.daily_overview: The new week began, and Yu Xiaowei channeled the energy from her weekend family gathering into her work. She used her commute time to study new courses, actively participated in business discussions during team meetings, and shared the joy of the family gathering. Her mindset was positive, and she had slightly lost weight due to mindful eating.

events.name: Commuting Learning Scenario Dialogue
events.description: During the morning rush hour on the subway, Yu Xiaowei studied the third lesson, "Appointments and Visiting Clients." She imitated the speaking pace and tone from the dialogue, repeating sentences such as, "Mr. Zhang, would it be convenient for you to meet next week to discuss the plan in detail?" She also attempted to practice role-playing by recording both sides of the conversation herself.

events.name: Organize and Share Family Photos
events.description: Upon arriving at the office, Yu Xiaowei took a moment before work to organize the warm photos and videos taken during last night's family dinner, selecting the best ones. She shared them in the family WeChat group "Happy Family" and wrote, "A wonderful New Year's dinner—thank you to every family member for your efforts and company! Let's work hard together in the new year!" Soon, her younger brother Yu Xiaofeng and other family members began liking and commenting on the post.

events.name: The team meeting focuses on business.
events.description: During the morning team meeting, Yu Xiaowei was in high spirits. She not only reported on last week's performance but also highlighted two challenging cases involving complex client insurance proposals, engaging in in-depth discussions with her supervisor Liang Zhenhua and colleague Su Lishan. Liang Zhenhua provided advanced insights on asset allocation, which greatly benefited Yu Xiaowei. The meeting also clarified the focus for this week: driving the sales of the new savings product.

events.name: Follow up on the medical examination report and doctor's recommendations.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei checked her phone and noticed that the Hong Kong Sanatorium & Hospital app had sent a notification that some electronic versions of her physical examination reports were now available for viewing. She quickly skimmed through her basic test results, such as the complete blood count, and found everything to be normal. Recalling Dr. Zhou's suggestion about increasing her yoga practice, she decided to start practicing yoga twice a week from this week onward and planned out the specific times.

events.name: Plan this week's work and study.
events.description: Before leaving work, Yu Xiaowei organized the list of clients to follow up with and the learning tasks for the week. She broke down the learning tasks for the third unit of Mandarin into her daily commute time and scheduled a review session after her Wednesday evening yoga class. At the same time, she adjusted her exercise plan to implement the doctor's recommendations.

起始状态.心情: Full of energy, with a clear plan for the week's work.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, well-organized, and satisfied with the progress of work.

2025-01.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowei increased the intensity of her morning running training and began targeted marathon preparation, but experienced soreness in her calf muscles after training. At the same time, she handled the parent-teacher meeting notice from her son's school and made progress in her Mandarin learning during work breaks. Her life rhythm is tight yet orderly, and her weight has slightly decreased due to training.

events.name: 8-kilometer run including pace training
events.description: During her morning run today, Yu Xiaowei extended her distance to 8 kilometers. Following her preliminary marathon training plan, she incorporated a tempo run (at a pace slightly faster than an easy run) between the 3rd and 5th kilometers to stimulate her cardiovascular system and enhance her speed endurance. After the run, she felt more tired than usual, but the sense of accomplishment from overcoming the challenge was strong. She carefully reviewed the data from her sports watch and noted that her average heart rate during the tempo run segment reached the upper limit of her aerobic endurance zone. However, during the final sprint, due to uneven road surfaces and insufficient warm-up, she experienced slight soreness and tightness in the muscles of her right calf.

events.name: Dealing with calf soreness
events.description: After the run, Yu Xiaowei immediately performed stretching exercises and later applied a warm compress to her calves at home. She noted this situation, planning to pay attention to it in subsequent training sessions and consider adjusting the training intensity.

events.name: Received notice of the parent-teacher conference.
events.description: While dropping her son Zhang Zixuan off at school in the morning, Yu Xiaowei received the official parent-teacher conference notice from him, scheduled for next Tuesday evening. She immediately marked it on her phone calendar and set a reminder.

events.name: Communicating Parent-Teacher Conference Matters with My Son
events.description: While checking her son's homework in the evening, Yu Xiaowei specifically talked to him about the parent-teacher conference. She asked him whether he was happy at school, how he got along with his classmates, and if there was anything in particular he wanted her to learn from or discuss with the teacher. Zhang Zixuan shyly mentioned that he had some trouble understanding certain math problems and hoped his mother could ask the teacher about them. Yu Xiaowei noted this point and encouraged him to take the initiative to ask more questions.

events.name: Commute Review and New Lesson Preview
events.description: During her commute to and from work, Yu Xiaowei repeatedly practiced the situational dialogue from Lesson Three. After returning home in the evening, she previewed some of the content from Lesson Four, "Explaining Insurance Clauses," and noticed it involved more long sentences and professional expressions. She realized the challenges were increasing, but this also sparked her competitive spirit.

events.name: Coordinate parent-teacher conference arrangements with husband.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming confirmed the arrangements for the parent-teacher meeting next Tuesday evening. Zhang Weiming indicated that he would take care of their younger daughter Zhang Yuxin's dinner and bedtime routine, allowing Yu Xiaowei to attend the meeting without worry.

起始状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, Home
起始状态.心情: Firm and ready for higher intensity training.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Feeling slightly tired but full of fighting spirit, prepared for both the training results and the parent-teacher meeting, with sore calves needing attention.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Yu Xiaowei continued her routine: attending a yoga class to balance training stress and aid calf recovery, completing the first unit of Mandarin learning challenge, and reinforcing insurance terminology before bed. Her multitasking abilities were fully demonstrated, with her weight reaching an end state due to training gains and recovery.

events.name: Commuting and reading aloud complex sentences
events.description: On the morning subway, Yu Xiaowei began to follow along with the complex long sentence from Lesson 4 that explains "non-guaranteed dividends." The sentence includes terms like "depends on" and "investment returns," so she needed to slow down her pace, imitating word by word and sentence by sentence to ensure the accuracy of her pronunciation and intonation.

events.name: Participate in yoga classes
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowei attended this week's yoga class on time. She paid special attention to stretching and relaxing her calves, following the doctor's advice to incorporate more low-impact exercises. The addition of several moderately difficult poses during the class made her feel an improvement in her body's flexibility and provided relief from the soreness in her calves. After the class, she exchanged practice tips with her neighbor friend who came along and decided to stick to practicing yoga twice a week.

events.name: Complete the Unit Comprehensive Recording Challenge
events.description: In the evening, after the children had fallen asleep, Yu Xiaowei completed the "Comprehensive Recording Challenge" for the first unit of the Mandarin app in the study. The task required simulating the introduction of an insurance product to a new client in Mandarin. She took a deep breath, tried to maintain a steady pace, and combined the vocabulary and sentences she had learned over the past few days to complete a two-minute recorded introduction. After submitting it, she let out a long sigh of relief, feeling as though she had accomplished an important task.

events.name: Strengthen Core Insurance Terminology
events.description: After completing the challenge, to reinforce her memory, Yu Xiaowei specifically opened her notebook and reviewed the Mandarin pronunciation and English equivalents of over a dozen core insurance terms, such as "premium," "sum insured," "claims settlement," "beneficiary," and "cash value." She realized that through this period of study, these terms had become increasingly familiar to her.

events.name: Review Training Plan and Health Status
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei reviewed her training progress and health status for the week. She noted that the soreness in her calves had mostly subsided, but she would continue to focus on balance training. She updated her training plan, officially launching her preparation for the half marathon in April 2025, with a steady increase in running volume and more frequent yoga sessions. She prepared her sportswear, dimmed the lights, and rested.

起始状态.心情: Smooth, preparing to face the midweek.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong, in the bedroom of the home.
结束状态.心情: A sense of achievement (completing learning challenges), the body is relaxed and soothed by yoga, and in good health.

2025-02.daily_overview: It was a peaceful Sunday. In the morning, Yu Xiaowei completed a half-marathon training session. In the afternoon, she and her husband took the children for a picnic at Kowloon Walled City Park, enjoying a rare family time over the weekend. In the evening, she cooked at home, spent time with the children as usual, listened to music, and took care of the pet cat, preparing for the upcoming workweek.

events.name: Half Marathon Weekend Long Distance Training Run
events.description: In the morning, following the training plan set by coach Zhao Zhiming, Yu Xiaowei met up with her running partner Shen Peiwen in the Kowloon Tong area and completed a long-distance slow run of approximately 15 kilometers. As they ran, they chatted about recent updates and agreed to continue training together next week, making a final push for the half marathon in April.

events.name: Family Park Picnic and New Year Outlook
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming took their son Zhang Zixuan and daughter Zhang Yuxin, along with their parents Chen Meiling and Yu Guoqiang who live with them, for a picnic at Kowloon Walled City Park. They prepared simple sandwiches, fruits, and Hong Kong-style milk tea. Yu Xiaowei discussed with her family the plan to adjust household expenses after the Spring Festival and looked forward to a future family trip to Japan. Her mother, Chen Meiling, seemed in good spirits and even ate a small portion of a pineapple bun. After the picnic, the children chased and played in the park, and the whole family enjoyed a relaxed and pleasant afternoon together.

events.name: Received an urgent work consultation call.

She patiently addressed the client's questions and scheduled a face-to-face meeting for the following week. Although this brief interruption affected her family time, it reflected her sense of professional responsibility.

Afterward, she checked her son Zhang Zixuan's weekend homework, read a bedtime story to her daughter Zhang Yuxin, and, together with her husband Zhang Weiming, refilled the food and cleaned the litter box for their pet cat. Before going to bed, as usual, she put on her headphones and listened to soothing music for half an hour to relax.

2025-02.daily_overview: This is the first working day after the Lunar New Year holiday. In the morning, Yu Xiaowei dives into a busy schedule, handling the backlog of customer inquiries and insurance policy matters that accumulated during the break. However, a family crisis erupts suddenly in the evening when her mother faints at home, completely disrupting all plans. Yu Xiaowei’s life shifts instantly from an orderly workday to an emergency medical crisis response mode.

events.name: Handling Post-Holiday Backlog and Team Communication
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei arrived punctually at her office in the AIA Building at 138 Gloucester Road, Wan Chai. She quickly immersed herself in work, starting by reviewing and responding to client emails and WeChat messages that had accumulated during the holiday. Afterward, she had a brief chat with her colleague Su Lishan in the pantry, sharing stories from their respective holidays and aligning on recent client follow-up arrangements. During her lunch break, she took the opportunity to review several common business dialogue scenarios on her Mandarin learning app, sitting alone at her desk.

events.name: Mother suddenly fell ill and was rushed to the hospital.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei was at the company preparing a client insurance policy proposal when she suddenly received a call from her father, Yu Guoqiang. His voice trembled as he told her that her mother, Chen Meiling, had suddenly fainted in the living room and lost consciousness. Yu Xiaowei’s heart instantly tightened. She immediately put aside all her work, calming her father over the phone and urging him to dial 999 for an ambulance right away, while quickly gathering her personal belongings to leave.

events.name: Urgently rush to the hospital for initial communication.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei rushed out of the office and hurriedly told her colleague Su Lishan at the next desk, [There's an emergency at home, I have to leave now. Please keep an eye out for any urgent clients.] She then took a taxi straight to Queen Elizabeth Hospital, as her father had informed her. On the way, she called her husband Zhang Weiming and her younger brother Yu Xiaofeng, who was in Shenzhen, to inform them of their mother's critical condition. Upon arriving at the hospital's emergency department, she found her anxiously waiting father and learned from the emergency doctor that her mother had regained consciousness but was unable to move her left limbs. A preliminary CT scan suggested a stroke, and immediate hospitalization was required. Suppressing her shock and worry, Yu Xiaowei assisted her father in completing the emergency admission procedures.

events.name: Late-night Family Emergency Meeting
events.description: In the evening, husband Zhang Weiming brought their two children to the hospital for a visit before heading home first. Yu Xiaowei had a brief discussion with her father in the hospital corridor. Considering her father’s advanced age and emotional instability, Yu Xiaowei decided to stay overnight herself, allowing her father to go home and rest. She also informed her husband that he might need to take on more household chores and childcare responsibilities in the coming days. Outside the ward, she sent a brief message to her supervisor, Liang Zhenhua, via WeChat, explaining the sudden major family situation and applying for emergency leave for the next few days.

起始状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, at home
起始状态.心情: Focus, with the drive of returning to work after the holiday.

结束状态.所处地点: Neurology Ward, Queen Elizabeth Hospital, Hong Kong
结束状态.心情: Highly tense, anxious, exhausted

2025-02.daily_overview: The entire day revolved around my mother's stroke condition. Yu Xiaowei stayed in the hospital room all day, engaging in in-depth discussions with doctors about the treatment plan, learning basic caregiving skills, and coordinating responsibilities within the family. It was a day filled with immense pressure and a flood of information, as she began to deeply understand the weight of being the family pillar in times of crisis.

events.name: All-day Hospital Accompaniment and Condition Follow-up
events.description: After staying overnight in the ward, Yu Xiaowei freshened up briefly at the nurse's station in the morning. In the afternoon, the attending neurologist came for rounds, explaining her mother's CT results in detail. The diagnosis confirmed a mild ischemic stroke, and the doctor outlined the subsequent medication plan and rehabilitation program. Yu Xiaowei carefully noted all the medical instructions and asked the doctor numerous questions regarding recovery expectations and daily care details.

events.name: Assist the mother in early rehabilitation activities.
events.description: Under the guidance of the nurse, Yu Xiaowei began learning how to assist her bedridden mother with passive exercises. She carefully helped her mother slowly bend and extend her legs, and moved her ankles and wrists to prevent muscle atrophy and joint stiffness. Throughout the process, she continuously offered gentle words of encouragement and observed her mother's reactions.

events.name: Arrange mother's diet and soothe her emotions.
events.description: Following the hospital's dietary advice for a light meal, Yu Xiaowei bought fish congee from the cafeteria. She patiently fed her mother spoonful by spoonful and made sure she drank enough water. Noticing her mother's limited mobility in her left arm, she gently comforted her and promised to stay by her side throughout the rehabilitation process.

events.name: Formally adjust work arrangements.
events.description: While her mother was taking an afternoon nap, Yu Xiaowei made a phone call and sent a WeChat message to her supervisor Liang Zhenhua in a corner of the hospital ward. She provided a detailed explanation of her mother’s hospitalization due to a stroke, formally requested a short-term adjustment to her work arrangements, and conducted a preliminary handover of the most urgent client matters she was handling. Liang Zhenhua expressed full understanding and support, advising her to focus on handling family affairs with peace of mind.

events.name: Family Division of Labor Refinement Meeting
events.description: In the evening, after work, husband Zhang Weiming brought a pot of soup to the hospital. Yu Xiaowei, her father, and her husband held a more detailed family meeting at a café near the hospital. It was finally decided: Yu Xiaowei would primarily be responsible for daytime hospital companionship and external coordination (with doctors and insurance); her father, Yu Guoqiang, would handle daily meal deliveries and some afternoon companionship; while Zhang Weiming would take full charge of evening household chores, helping the children with their homework, and providing full-day care on weekends. The meeting made Yu Xiaowei feel that the pressure was being shared, but she also realized that family life would enter a long-term period of adjustment.

events.name: Temporarily forgot the yoga class.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowei had originally planned to do some nighttime yoga, but due to excessive fatigue and a chaotic state of mind, she completely forgot about it and went straight to bed to rest.

起始状态.所处地点: Neurology Ward, Queen Elizabeth Hospital, Hong Kong
起始状态.心情: Tired, worried, but striving to remain calm.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, at home
结束状态.心情: Physically and mentally exhausted, but feeling slightly more at ease after clarifying the division of household responsibilities.

2025-02.daily_overview: After her mother's condition had largely stabilized, Yu Xiaowei began to address the chain reaction triggered by the crisis. During the day, she continued to provide care at the hospital while handling urgent work during breaks; in the evenings, she held serious family financial discussions with her husband. The pressures of real-life financial burdens and the anxiety of career interruption began to surface.

events.name: Handling Interstitial Work in the Ward
events.description: During the morning care period, Yu Xiaowei used her phone to reply to several urgent emails from important clients, confirming policy details. Subsequently, she contacted her close colleague Su Lishan, formally entrusting her to temporarily follow up on daily inquiries and some policy service matters for several key clients. She also transmitted necessary client information and follow-up points via WeChat.

events.name: Consultation on Rehabilitation Training Methods
events.description: In the afternoon, the hospital's rehabilitation therapist came to assess my mother. Yu Xiaowei proactively asked the therapist for home-based rehabilitation training methods suitable for her mother's current condition. She carefully learned a set of simple upper limb and finger exercises designed for post-stroke recovery and recorded the key movements on her phone.

events.name: Family Financial Meeting and Utilization of Emergency Savings
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming held a serious family financial meeting in the living room. They meticulously reviewed their emergency savings and current deposits, and based on their current understanding of the estimated costs for treatment and rehabilitation, they decided to first utilize the family emergency savings to cover the initial medical expenses. The couple also reached a preliminary agreement to suspend all non-essential spending in the coming months and implement a strict cost-cutting plan.

events.name: Emotional Release and Couple Communication
events.description: After the financial meeting, the continuous stress over several days left Yu Xiaowei feeling somewhat low-spirited. She confided in her husband about her concerns regarding her mother's illness and her anxiety that the work interruption might affect her promotion. Her husband, Zhang Weiming, listened patiently and reassured her that family comes first, and they should face the difficulties together. This deep conversation provided Yu Xiaowei with some emotional release.

events.name: Staying up late to handle insurance documents.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei stayed up until midnight organizing relevant medical documents due to concerns about her mother's insurance claim, resulting in insufficient sleep.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong
起始状态.心情: Heavy, laden with thoughts of the day's affairs.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong
结束状态.心情: Anxiety eases but economic pressure intensifies, feeling warmth from husband's support.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with occasional clouds

2025-02.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowei began systematically dealing with the specific tasks brought about by the medical crisis. In the morning, she handled payment and claims consultations at the hospital; in the afternoon, she guided her mother in attempting rehabilitation exercises; and in the evening, she followed up on how her children were adapting after the start of the school year. Like a multitasking processor, she swiftly switched between different roles.

events.name: Pay medical expenses and inquire about installment plans.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei went to the hospital's finance department and used funds withdrawn from the family emergency savings to pay the deposit and some of the initial costs for her mother's hospitalization. At the same time, she inquired in detail about the breakdown of the total expenses and, based on the family's cash flow situation, negotiated a payment plan with the financial staff. She signed the relevant agreement to alleviate the pressure of making a lump-sum payment.

events.name: First time guiding the mother through rehabilitation exercises.
events.description: In the afternoon, when her mother was in a relatively good mental state, Yu Xiaowei took out her phone to record a video. She patiently guided and assisted her mother through a set of simple upper limb and finger exercises taught by the rehabilitation therapist. As she demonstrated the movements, she encouraged her mother with words like, "Take it slow, we can do this." Seeing her mother barely manage to complete a few actions like making a fist or raising her hand, Yu Xiaowei felt a glimmer of relief.

events.name: Preliminary Consultation for Initiating the Insurance Claims Process
events.description: During the intervals of caregiving, Yu Xiaowei used the company's internal communication software to contact colleagues from the claims department of AIA Insurance. She inquired in detail about the coverage of her mother's medical insurance product, the required documentation, the application process, and the estimated processing time. She took detailed notes to prepare for the formal application later on.

events.name: Pay attention to children's adaptation to the new semester.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowei asked her husband about how their son Zhang Zixuan and daughter Zhang Yuxin had been doing in the first two days of the new school term. Zhang Weiming mentioned that their son seemed a bit distracted, possibly still worried about his grandmother. Yu Xiaowei then went to her son’s room specifically to chat with him about the new things at school and gently explained once again that his grandmother’s condition was improving, emphasizing that the whole family needed to work together to help him focus on his studies.

events.name: A brief call with a close friend helps relieve stress.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei received a call from her close friend Lin Jiaxin. They chatted briefly for ten minutes, sharing recent updates and providing emotional support, which helped her feel slightly more at ease.

2025-02.daily_overview: As her mother's hospital stay extended, Yu Xiaowei's tasks shifted from emergency responses to medium-term planning. She began systematically collecting claim documents, preparing for her mother's home care after discharge, and had to confront the temporary suspension of her personal hobbies and goals.

events.name: System collects and organizes medical documents.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei went to the hospital's medical records room and photocopied her mother's complete hospitalization records, surgical notes, various examination reports, and detailed expense statements. She also requested the attending physician, Zhou Wenbin, to issue an official medical diagnosis certificate. In the evening at home, she organized all the documents into categories, scanned them one by one, and created a dedicated electronic folder for archiving.

events.name: Formally suspend personal yoga classes
events.description: Considering that her focus would be on family matters for the foreseeable future, Yu Xiaowei called the fitness center to explain the sudden family situation and applied to suspend the yoga classes she had already signed up for. After hanging up the phone, she looked at the photos of the yoga classes on her phone and let out a soft sigh.

events.name: Discuss long-term care arrangements with family members.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei held another family meeting with her husband and father. Based on the doctor's feedback that her mother might require several months of recovery, they discussed longer-term care arrangements and financial planning. Yu Xiaowei explicitly stated that she might need to invest a significant amount of time, and her personal running training and competition plans would have to be put on hold. Both her father and husband expressed understanding and support.

events.name: Withdraw funds and consult on financial adjustment
events.description: Yu Xiaowei took time out to visit HSBC, withdrawing another sum from the family emergency savings account to cover the next phase of medical expenses. At the same time, she consulted with account manager Li Guodong to convert a soon-to-mature fixed deposit into a current account, thereby increasing the liquidity of family funds to prepare for potential long-term rehabilitation costs.

events.name: Slight headache due to stress, going to bed early.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei, feeling a slight headache due to ongoing stress, decided to rest early and gave up on the planned document organization.

起始状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong, at home.
起始状态.心情: Methodical, yet with a sense of loss from abandoning personal plans.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong.
结束状态.心情: Having gained a clearer understanding of the family responsibilities in the coming months, I feel a mix of emotions.

2025-02.daily_overview: Saturday, but the family crisis left no room for a day of rest. Yu Xiaowei made a difficult decision—to give up the half marathon she had been preparing for months. It was a symbolic moment, marking the complete surrender of personal pursuits to family responsibilities. In the evening, she tried to organize a simple family dinner to bring everyone together.

events.name: Difficult Decision: Withdrawing from the Half Marathon Event
events.description: After an internal struggle and discussion with her husband, Yu Xiaowei logged onto the marathon event's official website, searched for and filled out the withdrawal application form, specifying the reason as [a family member's sudden serious illness requiring long-term care]. Subsequently, she formally submitted the application via email and called the event's customer service to confirm. After hanging up the phone, she felt heavy-hearted, as this event had been a significant part of her annual health goals.

events.name: Organizing Running Gear and Informing Running Buddies
events.description: After submitting her withdrawal application, Yu Xiaowei carefully cleaned her beloved running shoes, sports watch, heart rate monitor, and other training gear, then solemnly placed them in a storage box. This act felt like a ritual, symbolizing her temporary farewell to a disciplined running life. Following that, she sent a long message via WhatsApp to her running partner and close friend Shen Peiwen, detailing her mother's situation and her decision to suspend all running training and social activities.

events.name: Create a Claims Follow-up File
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei set up a physical file folder and a corresponding electronic record in her home study, systematically organizing all documents related to the claim. She created a detailed follow-up timeline, marking the submission deadlines for various materials and the tasks that needed follow-up, ensuring a seamless claims process.

events.name: Simple Weekend Family Dinner
events.description: In the evening, to maintain a warm family atmosphere, Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming decided to organize a simple family dinner at home. Zhang Weiming cooked wonton noodles and roasted meats. At the dinner table, they encouraged the children to share interesting stories from their week at school and once again engaged in positive communication about their grandmother’s recovery, emphasizing that the whole family would get through the difficulties together. Seeing the children gradually calm down, Yu Xiaowei felt a sense of relief.

events.name: Try new light recipes
events.description: After the gathering, Yu Xiaowei attempted to prepare a low-fat vegetable salad for tomorrow's lunch to adapt to dietary adjustments under pressure.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong.
起始状态.心情: Hesitant, feeling reluctant about the impending decision to give up.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, at home
结束状态.心情: Relief and regret intertwine, as the family gathering brings a fleeting warmth.

2025-02.daily_overview: After a week of high-pressure caregiving and handling various tasks, Yu Xiaowei's physical and mental exhaustion reached its peak, culminating in an outburst during a routine moment. This Sunday, she was compelled to pause and reflect on her own state, exploring new ways to manage stress. Mindful breathing exercises became a glimmer of light in her weary life.

events.name: Emotional breakdown under physical and mental exhaustion.
events.description: In the morning, while preparing lunch in the kitchen, Yu Xiaowei accidentally broke a porcelain bowl due to her distracted state of mind. The crisp sound of shattering became the final straw that broke her. She stood still for a few seconds, then crouched down to silently pick up the pieces, tears streaming down her face uncontrollably. When her husband, Zhang Weiming, returned home in the evening, she finally broke down emotionally, leaning on his shoulder and crying as she poured out her exhaustion, stress, and fear over her mother's illness from the past few days. She felt the muscles in her shoulders and neck were as stiff as stone, unable to relax.

events.name: Try mindful breathing and shoulder-neck relaxation.
events.description: Under the comfort and advice of her husband, Yu Xiaowei realized that she must self-regulate. After the children fell asleep at night, she opened the mindfulness app on her phone on the living room carpet and followed a 15-minute guided meditation for mindful breathing practice, striving to focus her attention on the flow of her breath. Subsequently, she tried some targeted shoulder and neck relaxation exercises, slowly rotating her neck and stretching her trapezius muscles.

events.name: Reflection and Planning of New Health Management Approaches
events.description: After the practice, the tension in her body eased slightly, and her chaotic thoughts settled a bit. Yu Xiaowei reflected that during periods when high-intensity training was not possible, this gentle, equipment-free method of physical and mental adjustment could perhaps be incorporated into her daily routine to help her cope with stress. She noted this idea in her phone's memo.

events.name: Pay the hospital rehabilitation costs
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei went to the hospital and used the previously withdrawn funds to pay for her mother's newly incurred rehabilitation treatment expenses. While handling the payment procedures, she felt that every expense was a reminder of the changes in her family's financial situation.

events.name: Brief online meeting with colleagues
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei held a brief video meeting with her colleague Guo Junwei to discuss an urgent product inquiry, which briefly brought her back into work mode.

起始状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong, at home
起始状态.心情: Extremely exhausted, emotions on the verge of collapse.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, at home.
结束状态.心情: After releasing and attempting to adjust, the mood has slightly calmed down, but there is still a feeling of weakness.

state.今日运动: Engaged in 15 minutes of mindful breathing and shoulder-neck stretching.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy to clear.

2025-02.daily_overview: As the new week began, with her mother's condition stabilizing, Yu Xiaowei cautiously began to reintegrate some work into her life while balancing caregiving and family responsibilities. She started following up on tasks temporarily managed by her colleagues and utilized fragmented time to reinforce her previous professional studies. Signs of a transition from full-scale emergency mode to a "new normal" began to emerge in her life.

events.name: Follow up on temporary management work and communicate with clients.
events.description: During the morning while accompanying someone at the hospital, Yu Xiaowei contacted her colleague Su Lishan via phone and WeChat to inquire in detail about the follow-up status of several key clients temporarily managed by Su over the past week, and received relevant electronic file reports. In the afternoon, she personally called two of her closest clients (such as Mrs. Chen) to thank them for their understanding during her leave, briefly explained that the family situation had stabilized, and scheduled follow-up appointments for policy reviews.

events.name: Integrate Learning Progress and Questions
events.description: While her mother was taking an afternoon nap, Yu Xiaowei sat in the corner of the hospital ward, opening her phone and laptop. She systematically organized the knowledge points she had learned over the past month from the Mandarin learning app, as well as the questions she had encountered while studying the new insurance product materials, into electronic notes. She also marked the issues she would need to consult with her colleague Guo Junwei or her supervisor in the future.

events.name: Consultation on Professional Advice for Post-Discharge Rehabilitation
events.description: Yu Xiaowei proactively approached her mother's rehabilitation therapist to inquire in detail about suitable rehabilitation exercises, frequency, and precautions for her mother to continue at home after discharge. The therapist commended her active involvement as a family member and provided some preliminary suggestions for modifying the home environment.

events.name: Plan Stress Management
events.description: Based on the positive experience from the previous night's mindfulness practice, Yu Xiaowei marked 9 p.m. every Tuesday, Thursday, and Sunday on her phone calendar as a fixed [15-minute mindfulness relaxation session], deciding to use it as a regular tool to cope with long-term stress.

events.name: Staying up late to handle work emails.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowei stayed up until the early hours of the morning to handle an urgent work email, which delayed her sleep time.

2025-02.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowei accelerated the pace of returning to work, becoming more proactive in contacting clients and maintaining relationships. Meanwhile, her mother's recovery progressed well, with discharge from the hospital being put on the agenda. She began to have in-depth discussions with the doctor about detailed arrangements after discharge and prepared for home-based rehabilitation.

events.name: Submit an insurance claim application.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei logged into the company's internal claims system. Following the guidance she had previously consulted, she uploaded all the scanned medical documents, filled out a detailed online claims application form, and formally submitted her mother's medical insurance claim. After completing the submission, she felt a small weight lift from her shoulders.

events.name: Discuss the discharge plan in detail with the doctor.
events.description: In the afternoon, during attending physician Zhou Wenbin's ward rounds, Yu Xiaowei engaged in a lengthy discussion with him. She thoroughly inquired about the specific criteria for her mother's discharge, guidance on subsequent medication, follow-up appointment schedules, and detailed plans for home-based rehabilitation training. She diligently noted down all the key points and the necessary assistive devices to purchase, such as bathroom handrails and non-slip mats, in her notebook.

events.name: Prepare a meal that suits mother's taste.
events.description: To help her mother, who had been hospitalized for many days, regain her appetite, Yu Xiaowei made a special effort to return home early. Using ingredients brought from home, she prepared a light chicken soup and steamed eggs. In the evening, she brought the food to the hospital and carefully fed her mother. Seeing her mother’s improved appetite and watching her finish most of the bowl, Yu Xiaowei felt deeply relieved.

events.name: Reviewing Mandarin and Connecting with Work
events.description: While her mother was resting, Yu Xiaowei put on her headphones and used a mobile app to review the Mandarin lessons she had previously learned. She focused on practicing professional vocabulary and dialogue scenarios highly relevant to her current situation and work, such as [medical insurance], [rehabilitation therapy], and [family financial planning].

events.name: Short-distance walking attempt
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei took a 10-minute short walk in the hospital garden to alleviate the discomfort from prolonged sitting while accompanying a patient. This was her first attempt at gentle exercise after the crisis.
