2025-02.daily_overview: The core tasks are procurement and planning, creating a safe and comfortable recovery environment for the mother's return home. Meanwhile, Yu Xiaowei has also begun formally discussing her return-to-work plan with her supervisor. Her life focus is clearly shifting from the hospital to the family, and she is starting to look forward to resuming work.

events.name: Purchase Home Rehabilitation Assistive Devices
events.description: Based on the list of recommendations from doctors and rehabilitation therapists, Yu Xiaowei went to a medical supply store and a large home goods mall in the morning. She purchased items such as a non-slip bath mat, handrails for the toilet and shower area, a comfortable recliner with armrests, a bedside table, and a mattress that makes it easier to get up. She carefully compared the safety and practicality of the products.

events.name: Communicate with the supervisor about the gradual resumption of work plan.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei held a video conference with her supervisor, Liang Zhenhua. She reported that her mother's condition had stabilized and was expected to be discharged from the hospital within the week. She also proposed a specific plan to gradually resume full-time work starting in early March, including returning to the company for weekly meetings and gradually taking over her original clients. Liang Zhenhua expressed his full support and discussed transitional work arrangements with her.

events.name: Planning home renovations with my husband.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming discussed specific home renovation plans based on the items they had purchased. They decided to clear out the corner of the living room with the best natural light to place a recliner and a small side table, creating a daytime rest and activity area for her mother. They also planned to renovate the bathroom and her mother's bedroom over the weekend.

events.name: Learn about first aid course information
events.description: After experiencing this family emergency, Yu Xiaowei deeply realized the importance of mastering first aid knowledge. In the evening, she took the time to search online and learned about the Basic First Aid Certificate Course offered by the St. John Ambulance in Hong Kong at the Kowloon City District Community Centre. She also noted down the registration method and course schedule.

events.name: Mindful Breathing Exercise
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei followed her plan and engaged in 15 minutes of mindful breathing exercises to help relax her body and mind.

2025-02.daily_overview: Final preparations before discharge. While Yu Xiaowei was handling the final documents and procedures at the hospital, she and her husband began making substantial environmental modifications at home. The insurance claim process she personally experienced also triggered professional reflections.

events.name: Handling Pre-discharge Procedures and Inquiries
events.description: Yu Xiaowei spent the entire day at the hospital, where she inquired in detail and documented the medications her mother would need to continue taking after discharge, the specific key points for home rehabilitation exercises, daily care considerations (such as fall prevention and nutritional balance), and the appropriate responses for emergency situations.

events.name: Assist the mother in attempting short-distance assisted walking.
events.description: Under the guidance and protection of the rehabilitation therapist, Yu Xiaowei supported her mother and attempted a very short-distance assisted walk within the hospital room. Although it was just a walk from the bedside to the door and back, this marked an important milestone in the recovery process, filling both mother and daughter with a mix of nervousness and anticipation.

events.name: Implementation of Home Environment Renovation
events.description: In the evening, after returning home, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming thoroughly cleaned the corner of the living room near the window, removing unnecessary furniture to ensure the passageway was spacious and well-lit. They arranged the newly purchased recliner and side table, setting up a preliminary resting corner for her mother.

events.name: Recording Claims Experience and Professional Reflection
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei, drawing from her personal experience as a family member of a patient navigating the insurance claims process, meticulously documented the entire journey in her note-taking app. This included details from seeking medical care and preparing documents to submitting the application, as well as the challenges she encountered and her emotional experiences. She reflected on how she could translate these [client perspective] insights into key communication points and service improvement suggestions for assisting clients with similar needs in the future.

events.name: Rehabilitation-Assisted Motor Learning
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei learned from the rehabilitation therapist how to guide her mother through simple upper limb exercises and practiced on her own to prepare for home-based rehabilitation.

2025-02.daily_overview: The day of mother's discharge from the hospital. Yu Xiaowei completed a series of tasks, including picking up her mother, settling her in, and holding a family meeting, bringing this period of hospital care to a close. Family life is about to enter a new phase centered on home rehabilitation, and Yu Xiaowei's mindset has shifted from crisis management mode to planning for long-term care and restarting life.

events.name: Take mother home from the hospital.
events.description: In the morning, after the doctor confirmed that she could be discharged, Yu Xiaowei and her father Yu Guoqiang went through the discharge procedures for her mother, settled all the expenses, and listened to Dr. Zhou's final instructions. They carefully brought their mother back to their home on Prince Edward Road West and settled her into bed, which had been prepared with a new mattress. Seeing the familiar room, her mother smiled with relief.

events.name: Complete bathroom safety renovation.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming worked together to lay non-slip mats on the bathroom floor and securely installed handrails beside the toilet and shower area. They repeatedly tested the stability of the handrails to ensure they were safe and secure.

events.name: Hold a Family Rehabilitation Period Division of Labor Meeting
events.description: In the evening, the entire family (including Yu Xiaowei and her husband, her parents, and their two children) held a brief but important family meeting. Yu Xiaowei clarified the dietary requirements, medication schedule, and daily rehabilitation training arrangements for her mother during the recovery period. She also reconfirmed everyone’s responsibilities: she would be in charge of guiding the main rehabilitation training and handling external communication; her father would be responsible for daytime companionship and reminding her mother to take medication; her husband would handle household chores, childcare, and preparing nutritious meals; and the children would be tasked with telling jokes to their grandmother to bring her joy.

events.name: Show the renovated home to mother.
events.description: After the meeting, Yu Xiaowei pushed her mother's wheelchair and showed her around the renovated bathroom and the resting corner in the living room. She explained the purpose of each facility in detail and told her, "Mom, everything at home is ready for you. Just focus on resting and recovering—we're all here for you." Her mother, Chen Meiling, was deeply moved and patted her daughter's hand affectionately.

events.name: Sign up for a first aid course
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei completed the registration and payment for the St. John Ambulance Basic First Aid Course online. She decided to make mastering first aid skills a positive change after the family crisis.

events.name: Engage in mindful breathing and take short walks.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei practiced 15 minutes of mindful breathing in the living room at home and took a 10-minute short walk on the neighborhood street to maintain basic exercise habits and relieve stress.

2025-03.daily_overview: As an ESFJ personality, Yu Xiaowei, after experiencing family changes, was driven by a sense of responsibility to shift her focus toward long-term planning. This Sunday, she took advantage of a rare day at home to begin examining family risks from a professional perspective and started making concrete preparations for her mother's return. The day was filled with both calm financial planning and warm moments of collaboration with her husband.

events.name: Plan for Long-term Family Health Security
events.description: The sudden hospitalization of her mother due to a stroke made Yu Xiaowei, an insurance agent, deeply realize the importance of being prepared. Using her professional expertise, she carefully reviewed the terms of her family's existing medical insurance policies in her study, assessing any gaps in coverage. She began researching supplementary medical insurance and long-term care insurance products available on the market, specifically tailored for elderly individuals recovering from strokes. Based on her findings, she drafted a preliminary proposal to upgrade the insurance coverage for her entire family, including her parents. She plans to make this proposal a key topic for discussion with her husband next week and intends to incorporate regular family health risk assessments into their future routine household matters.

events.name: Engage in morning mindfulness breathing exercises.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei adhered to the habits from her initial healthy state, performing 15 minutes of mindful breathing and shoulder-neck stretching in the living room using a mobile app to alleviate the physical and mental fatigue caused by recent stress.

events.name: Discussing home rehabilitation environment modification plans with the husband.
events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming had a serious discussion in the living room about the care arrangements for her mother after her discharge from the hospital. She took out a tape measure and, together with her husband, measured the dimensions of the area near the window in the living room, carefully planning the space needed for wheelchair turns and walker movement. The two discussed the specifications of the anti-slip mats to be purchased, the type of walker required, and how to rearrange the sofa and coffee table to ensure safe movement without making the space feel too crowded. Throughout this process, they clearly divided their responsibilities: Yu Xiaowei was in charge of research and purchasing, while Zhang Weiming handled the moving and installation tasks, demonstrating the couple's默契 and sense of responsibility.

events.name: A routine phone call to greet mother before bed.
events.description: At ten o'clock in the evening, after putting her child to sleep, Yu Xiaowei made her routine pre-bedtime call to her mother, Chen Meiling, who was still hospitalized. She softly updated her on the preparations being made at home for her return and asked how her mother was feeling that day. Though her mother's speech was still somewhat unclear over the phone, Yu could hear the warmth and relief in her tone. This brief exchange served as an important source of emotional comfort for Yu Xiaowei at the end of her day.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the second day of the weekend, Yu Xiaowei put her plan into action. Considering the slippery floors caused by the humid weather, purchasing anti-slip equipment was particularly urgent. She moved between shops of all sizes in Kowloon City, securing the items needed for the home renovation. Her husband, Zhang Weiming, stayed at home to look after the children and, upon her return from shopping, joined her in the initial organization work.

events.name: Purchase home rehabilitation supplies
events.description: Considering her mother's upcoming discharge from the hospital and the slippery conditions during the humid spring season, Yu Xiaowei decided to act immediately. She first compared prices online and then drove to several large home goods stores and medical equipment specialty shops in Kowloon City. She carefully selected thick anti-slip floor mats and a sturdy walker with brakes and adjustable height. In the store, she repeatedly confirmed the folding dimensions of the wheelchair to ensure it could be conveniently placed near the entrance of her home. The shopping process took the entire morning, and she not only purchased all the items on her list but also bought several additional anti-collision corner protectors.

events.name: Organize Purchased Items and Conduct Preliminary Cleaning
events.description: After returning home from shopping, Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming unpacked and inspected the newly purchased items together. They temporarily rolled up the non-slip floor mats and set them aside, placing the walker and wheelchair in a corner of the living room. Next, the two began to clear away the miscellaneous items and small furniture in the planned renovation area, making space for the subsequent movement of larger furniture. Although it was only a preliminary cleanup, seeing the living room begin to change in preparation for welcoming her mother made Yu Xiaowei feel that things were progressing step by step.

events.name: Online Consultation for Rehabilitation Nutrition Meals
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei recalled the doctor's mention of nutritional needs during the recovery period. Using a mobile app, she conducted a brief online consultation with a registered dietitian, obtaining preliminary advice on low-salt, high-protein, and easy-to-swallow liquid foods. She also noted down the ingredients she needed to purchase, such as pumpkin, broccoli, and sole fish.

2025-03.daily_overview: As the new week began, Yu Xiaowei returned to the workplace, carrying the weight of thoughts about her career development and the pressures of family responsibilities. She proactively sought guidance from her supervisor, attempting to find a new foothold in her career amidst the family upheaval. Meanwhile, preparations for family care were also in full swing. Due to work pressure, she stayed up late handling materials.

events.name: Conducting Work Reports and Career Development Discussions with Supervisors
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei held a one-on-one meeting with her supervisor, Liang Zhenhua, in her office at the AIA Tower in Wan Chai. She did not hide the difficulties her family was facing but focused more on demonstrating her proactive approach. She reported on her recent progress in using fragmented time to learn Mandarin and study new insurance products. She candidly expressed her hope that by enhancing her ability to serve mainland clients, she could compensate for the potential reduction in time spent on local business due to family matters. She also viewed this as a strategic preparation for her future promotion to regional manager, aiming to differentiate herself from others. She sincerely sought Liang Zhenhua’s advice and support. Liang Zhenhua praised her planning and agreed to provide her with some learning resources and potential client leads.

events.name: Contact community rehabilitation resources.
events.description: During her lunch break, Yu Xiaowei began calling several community rehabilitation centers in Kowloon City, based on the list provided by the doctor and her own online research. She inquired in detail about the services, costs, whether a doctor's referral was required, and the waiting period for physical therapy and occupational therapy. After preliminary screening, she shortlisted two or three options, planning to visit them in person after her mother’s discharge from the hospital.

events.name: Handle the backlog of work emails and stay up late preparing materials.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei focused on handling the backlog of client emails and company notifications that had accumulated due to her frequent trips to the hospital over the past few days. She prioritized responding to inquiries from several key clients and updated her work schedule. In the evening, she stayed up until 1 a.m. to prepare an urgent client proposal, which resulted in insufficient sleep.

events.name: Skip rehabilitation assistance exercises
events.description: Due to a busy schedule and staying up late, Yu Xiaowei temporarily set aside her usual habit of guiding her mother through rehabilitation exercises today, opting instead for a brief session of mindful breathing.

结束状态.心情: After communicating with my supervisor, I gained some support, but staying up late has led to fatigue and mild anxiety.

2025-03.daily_overview: Today is Information Gathering and Medical Communication Day. Yu Xiaowei demonstrates the practical and meticulous traits of her ESFJ personality. In order to provide the best rehabilitation support for her mother, she shuttles between hospitals and clinics, striving to gather all the key information. Due to fatigue, she goes to bed early to regain her energy.

events.name: Have an in-depth communication with the mother's attending physician.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei scheduled a face-to-face meeting with her mother's attending physician. She prepared a list of questions in advance, including an assessment of the treatment effectiveness over the past two weeks, her mother's current muscle strength and language function recovery levels, the medication plan for the next phase, the ideal discharge criteria, and the possibility of a referral to a rehabilitation hospital. The doctor addressed her questions in detail and emphasized the importance of preventing falls and bedsores, as well as performing passive joint exercises in home care. Yu Xiaowei took careful notes and received a home rehabilitation guidance manual prescribed by the doctor.

events.name: Consult with your family doctor about dietary recommendations during the recovery period.
events.description: After leaving the hospital, Yu Xiaowei took her mother's recent examination reports and stopped by the clinic of their family doctor, Zhou Wenbin, for a follow-up consultation. She focused on inquiring about dietary and nutritional arrangements for stroke patients during the recovery period, particularly how to make food delicious without adding salt and which ingredients are beneficial for nerve recovery. Dr. Zhou provided professional dietary suggestions and a list of contraindications, reminding her to pay attention to potential swallowing difficulties her mother might experience.

events.name: Preliminary Screening of In-Home Rehabilitation Therapy Services
events.description: Based on communication with the attending physician, Yu Xiaowei recognized the necessity of professional rehabilitation therapy. Continuing her research from yesterday, she began contacting several home-based physical therapy service providers by phone to inquire about therapist qualifications, home visit fees, service frequency, and whether the costs could be combined with medical insurance for reimbursement. This was in preparation for establishing a three-tier rehabilitation network—hospital, community, and home—for her mother.

events.name: Going to bed early due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to staying up late the night before and being on the go all day today, Yu Xiaowei felt extremely fatigued. She went to bed early in the evening to regain her energy, temporarily skipping the evening activities.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Focus, ready to absorb a large amount of information.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Feeling mentally clear due to obtaining clear professional guidance, but physically exhausted.

state.今日运动: none

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy

2025-03.daily_overview: Today marks a significant turning point—my mother was discharged from the hospital and returned home. Yu Xiaowei spent the entire day shuttling between the hospital and home, transitioning from a patient's family member to the primary caregiver at home. Life has officially entered a new phase centered around recovery.

events.name: Handling the discharge procedures for my mother.
events.description: Early in the morning, Yu Xiaowei arrived at the hospital. She carefully reviewed the expense list and completed the discharge settlement. The head nurse explained in detail the usage and dosage of the medication to be taken home, as well as the follow-up appointment schedule. Additionally, the nurse demonstrated basic care techniques, such as how to assist a bedridden patient in turning over and massaging pressure points. Yu Xiaowei recorded the key steps on her phone and repeatedly asked questions to ensure she understood everything clearly.

events.name: Pick up mother and help her settle in.
events.description: Husband Zhang Weiming took leave and drove to meet them. Supported by Yu Xiaowei and a nurse, mother Chen Meiling was wheeled out of the hospital room in a wheelchair. On the way home, Yu Xiaowei held her mother's hand the entire time. Upon arriving at their home on Prince Edward Road West, she and Zhang Weiming carefully transferred her mother from the car to the wheelchair and then wheeled her into the house. Although the living room was not yet fully renovated, seeing the familiar home and her waiting grandchildren, the mother’s eyes welled up with tears.

events.name: Formally submit an application for flexible working mode.
events.description: After settling her mother down for an afternoon nap, Yu Xiaowei went to the study and formally submitted her pre-prepared flexible work arrangement application through the company’s system (working in the office in the morning to handle core tasks and working from home in the afternoon to assist with her mother’s recovery). She attached a concise explanation of her situation along with a commitment to her work responsibilities. Following that, she sent a reminder to her supervisor, Liang Zhenhua, via the internal communication software, notifying him that the formal application had been submitted and once again expressing her gratitude.

events.name: Prepare for the first first aid class.
events.description: In the evening, after making sure her mother was resting peacefully, Yu Xiaowei took out her notebook and pen. She checked the first-aid course notification sent by the community center, confirming the class time, location, and required items for the next day. She understood the importance of learning first aid, especially for a family with an elderly person in recovery.

events.name: Adjust Morning Running Plan (Implicit Event)
events.description: While checking her phone before bed, Yu Xiaowei saw a message from her running friend Shen Peiwen, asking if they were still on for their morning run as planned the next day. Considering that her mother had just returned home and needed care, and feeling both physically and mentally exhausted, she replied to Shen Peiwen, explaining her family situation, politely declining the morning run, and expressing her apologies. This marked the beginning of her marathon hobby being put on hold due to family changes.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Nervous, busy, and filled with a sense of mission.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: My body and mind are utterly exhausted, but seeing my mother safely home, a heavy weight lifts from my heart. At the same time, I feel the pressure of long-term care officially setting in.

state.今日运动: Rehabilitation auxiliary exercise for 15 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with occasional clouds

2025-03.daily_overview: On the first day after her mother returned home, Yu Xiaowei began to implement the rehabilitation plan into specific daily actions. From purchasing equipment to creating recipes, she worked hard to build a safe and scientifically sound home rehabilitation environment for her mother.

events.name: Research and place an order for purchasing rehabilitation assistive devices.
events.description: Based on the nursing key points learned at the hospital yesterday, Yu Xiaowei believed that some additional equipment was still needed at home. She conducted in-depth research online regarding the comfort and portability of different brands of wheelchairs and discussed the budget with her husband, Zhang Weiming, over the phone. Ultimately, she placed an order for a more lightweight spare wheelchair, a shower chair for bathing, and bed rails to ensure her mother's safety in all aspects.

events.name: Develop a nutritional meal plan for the mother during the recovery period.
events.description: Combining Dr. Zhou Wenbin's advice and the guidance of an online nutritionist, Yu Xiaowei sat at the kitchen table and began crafting a detailed one-month nutrition plan. She took into account her mother's swallowing ability (starting with a focus on pureed foods), the requirements for low salt and low fat, and the need for a balanced intake of protein and vitamins. The plan specified the types of ingredients, precise weights, and simple cooking methods (primarily steaming and boiling) for each of the three daily meals, and noted which meals required the use of a blender.

events.name: Procurement of nutritious meal ingredients and kitchenware
events.description: After finalizing the recipe, Yu Xiaowei immediately went with her husband Zhang Weiming to the street market and supermarket for a major shopping trip. They bought fresh sole, chicken breast, a large amount of broccoli, carrots, pumpkin, and spinach, and also selected coarse grains such as brown rice and oats. To ensure the food could be blended into a smooth paste, they also purchased a more powerful multifunctional blender.

events.name: Evening Gathering with My Best Friend
events.description: In the evening, my close friend Lin Jiaxin paid an unexpected visit. We had milk tea and chatted near the residential area. Yu Xiaowei confided about her caregiving stress, and Lin Jiaxin offered comfort and support, which led to Yu Xiaowei staying up late.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home (awakened by mother's slight movements)
起始状态.心情: Sleep-deprived, yet immediately entering a state of care.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment arises from completing specific preparatory tasks, yet a feeling of relaxation mixed with fatigue follows after socializing.

state.今日运动: Take a short walk for 15 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with showers.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Friday, after completing some of her morning work, Yu Xiaowei focused entirely on transforming the home environment. Together with her husband and father, they worked to completely renovate the living room into a functional area suitable for rehabilitation. This was a challenge of both physical effort and teamwork.

events.name: Work together to move furniture and create a barrier-free space.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei's flexible work schedule had not yet begun, but she had already entered the state in advance. Together with her husband Zhang Weiming and her father Yu Guoqiang, she gradually moved the heavy sofa, glass coffee table, TV cabinet, and other large furniture in the center of the living room to the walls or other corners of the room. They repeatedly adjusted the positions to ensure that the passage from the entrance to the bedroom and bathroom was wide, flat, and free of any obstacles, allowing a wheelchair to pass through smoothly.

events.name: Laying anti-slip mats and installing auxiliary equipment.
events.description: After clearing the space, the three of them worked together to lay out large anti-slip floor mats, covering the main areas where the mother would be active. Based on her mother’s height, Yu Xiaowei carefully adjusted and locked the handle height of the newly purchased walker. She placed the wheelchair near the entrance of the living room for easy access. Meanwhile, her father, Yu Guoqiang, took charge of inspecting and tidying up all the scattered wires on the floor, securing them along the base of the wall with cable clips to completely eliminate any tripping hazards.

events.name: Post the rehabilitation schedule and prepare the ingredients.
events.description: As the renovation neared completion, Yu Xiaowei posted a handwritten, simple rehabilitation training schedule and medication reminder in a prominent position on the wall of the rehabilitation area. Meanwhile, her husband, Zhang Weiming, went to the Kowloon City Market in the evening to purchase fresh fish, meat, and vegetables for the next two or three days based on the recipe list she had written, ensuring the continuous supply of nutritious meals.

events.name: Muscle soreness due to labor
events.description: All-day physical labor caused slight soreness in Yu Xiaowei's shoulders, neck, and lower back. She alleviated it through stretching, but it affected her athletic performance.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Determined to complete the environmental transformation, slightly impatient.

结束状态.所处地点: A completely renewed living room
结束状态.心情: My body aches from the labor, but seeing the carefully prepared recovery corner for my mother beginning to take shape fills my heart with satisfaction and hope.

state.今日运动: Light household chores (moving furniture), mindful breathing for 10 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy

2025-03.daily_overview: On Saturday, Yu Xiaowei embarked on a mode of self-improvement and family management in parallel. She went out to learn first aid skills, while with the help of her family, she institutionalized her mother's rehabilitation schedule. She also began to make preparations for the long-term financial stability of her family.

events.name: Attend the first lesson of the community first aid course.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei went to the Kowloon City District Community Center to attend the first session of a first aid course. She learned the principles and steps of cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), understood the importance of AED (automated external defibrillator), and mastered the Heimlich maneuver. During the class, she actively asked questions and exchanged caregiving experiences with several other participants who also had elderly family members, demonstrating a strong motivation to learn.

events.name: Develop a Family Rehabilitation Division of Labor and Schedule
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei called a brief family meeting with her husband Zhang Weiming and her father Yu Guoqiang. She presented the hospital's rehabilitation guide and, based on her mother's actual condition, discussed and drafted a preliminary daily rehabilitation schedule with her family. The schedule clearly outlined tasks such as passive limb exercises in the morning, speech training in the afternoon, and walker practice in the evening. Responsibilities were assigned according to each person's work and rest schedules to ensure that someone would always be by her mother's side.

events.name: Research on Stable Investment Options for Families
events.description: In the evening, after the children had gone to sleep, Yu Xiaowei, considering potential future medical expenses and income fluctuations, began researching stable investment methods. She went online in her study and gained a preliminary understanding of regular fund investments, particularly those focused on the healthcare sector, through financial websites. She also briefly consulted her close friend Huang Wenhui, a product manager at an internet company, and her colleague Guo Junwei, who is knowledgeable about actuarial science, via WeChat, asking them to provide reference opinions from different perspectives.

events.name: Evening phone chat with friends
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei had a phone call with her high school classmate He Junjie, discussing the latest trends in the insurance industry, which caused her to stay up late.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to learning new knowledge to enhance security for the family.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: I feel fulfilled because I have learned practical first aid knowledge, and the clear division of household responsibilities has also alleviated some psychological burden.

state.今日运动: Rehabilitation-assisted exercise for 20 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny

2025-03.daily_overview: Sunday is a day of intensive learning and communication. Yu Xiaowei continues to consolidate her first aid skills while making final written preparations for the upcoming adjustments to her work schedule. She successfully scheduled a crucial meeting with her supervisor. Family rehabilitation progresses gradually in the details.

events.name: Participate in practical exercises of first aid courses.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei returned to the community center to learn hemostatic bandaging techniques. Under the guidance of her instructor, she practiced circular bandaging, spiral bandaging, and figure-eight bandaging on a simulated human arm using bandages and triangular bandages, aiming to handle wounds in different areas. She studied diligently, repeating the exercises until her movements became proficient.

events.name: Improve the written application for flexible work arrangements.
events.description: Upon returning home, Yu Xiaowei formally drafted a detailed application for a flexible work arrangement in her study, based on her assessment of household affairs over the past few days. She outlined the reasons for the adjustment (her mother’s need for home rehabilitation after being discharged following a stroke), the specific model (working in the office on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday mornings, with flexible remote work on Tuesdays and Thursdays for the entire day and afternoons), and a trial period (three months). She also included a preliminary plan to ensure work effectiveness, such as daily online work logs and weekly performance reports.

events.name: Schedule a formal meeting with your supervisor.
events.description: After preparing her application, Yu Xiaowei sent a carefully worded yet firm message to her supervisor, Liang Zhenhua, via the company's internal communication software. She explained that there were important matters regarding family and work arrangements that needed to be discussed in person, and she hoped to take up half an hour of his time the following morning. Liang Zhenhua quickly replied, agreeing to the meeting.

events.name: Prepare a special nutritious breakfast for mother.
events.description: In the early morning, Yu Xiaowei woke up an hour earlier than her family. Following the recipe she had prepared, she washed the broccoli and carrots, cut the chicken breast into pieces, and steamed them all together in a steamer. Then, using her newly purchased blender, she pureed them into a very smooth paste, adding just a few drops of olive oil for seasoning. This was the first breakfast she had prepared entirely according to the nutritional meal plan since her mother returned home.

起始状态.所处地点: Kitchen at home
起始状态.心情: Calm, focused on the task at hand.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Feeling a bit nervous about the crucial communication tomorrow, but the preparations are all set, so I have confidence in my heart.

state.今日运动: Take a short walk for 20 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with scattered light rain in the afternoon.

2025-03.daily_overview: This is a milestone day. Yu Xiaowei successfully negotiated a flexible work arrangement with her supervisor, marking the beginning of a new, family-centered phase in her work-life balance. Encouraged by her family, her mother also started home-based rehabilitation training. A visit from her close friend brought warm comfort to their tense lives.

events.name: Reached a flexible work arrangement with supervisor Liang Zhenhua.
events.description: In the morning, at Liang Zhenhua's office, Yu Xiaowei personally provided a detailed explanation of her mother's situation and the challenges faced by her family, and submitted a written application. She committed to maintaining core client services and using her time at home to deepen her online skills and learning. Liang Zhenhua expressed understanding and support, and after setting requirements for ensuring performance and submitting weekly reports, he agreed to her application in principle. The success of this communication earned Yu Xiaowei valuable breathing space.

events.name: Formally submit the application and inform colleagues.
events.description: After the communication, Yu Xiaowei promptly refined the application documents based on the discussion outcomes and submitted them through the company's formal procedures. Subsequently, she briefly informed close colleagues, such as Su Lishan, in the team group chat about her adjusted work mode for the next three months to ensure a smooth workflow transition. Su Lishan immediately sent her a private message expressing support and arranged to teach her some online presentation techniques during the lunch break.

events.name: Mother uses the home rehabilitation corner for the first time.
events.description: In the afternoon, with the careful support and protection of Yu Xiaowei, her mother Chen Meiling stood up shakily with the help of a walker in the brand-new rehabilitation corner and attempted to take a tiny step. Her father, husband, and children were all cheering her on. Though it was just a small step, it marked the formal and orderly beginning of the family’s rehabilitation journey.

events.name: Confide in your best friend about your stress and seek support.
events.description: In the evening, feeling physically and mentally exhausted, Yu Xiaowei confided in her best friend Lin Jiaxin via WeChat about the stress of caring for her mother and her worries about her family. Without a second thought, Lin Jiaxin went home after work to prepare a pot of nourishing soup, bought some children's snacks, and personally delivered them to Yu Xiaowei's home. The two chatted for half an hour in Yu Xiaowei's kitchen while enjoying the soup. Lin Jiaxin's attentive listening and her offer to help pick up and drop off the children moved Yu Xiaowei almost to tears.

events.name: Rediscovering Cantonese Embroidery Late at Night to Seek Inner Peace
events.description: Late at night, after all her family members had fallen asleep, Yu Xiaowei sat alone in the living room with a small desk lamp on. She took out her long-unused Cantonese embroidery toolkit, smoothed a piece of fabric, and began stitching a simple floral pattern. At this moment, embroidery was no longer about honing her skills or completing a piece. Instead, with every stitch, she focused on the present, temporarily escaping the dual pressures of the day and finding inner peace and concentration.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Nervous, decisive communication is about to take place.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: Complex. On one hand, there is a sense of relief from gaining support at work, and on the other, a warm gratitude for the care of a close friend. The late-night embroidery brings a moment of tranquility, yet the long-term exhaustion remains profound.

state.今日运动: Mindful breathing for 15 minutes, rehabilitation assistance exercises for 15 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast, humid and stuffy

2025-03.daily_overview: The first day of the flexible work model officially in operation. Yu Xiaowei began to try balancing morning office work with afternoon family care under the new rhythm. She made every effort to arrange everything in an orderly manner and continued to use embroidery for self-healing late at night. Due to fatigue, she went to bed early, skipping the evening activities.

events.name: Implement the new schedule in sync with the division of household responsibilities.
events.description: Based on the approved flexible arrangement, Yu Xiaowei reorganized her daily schedule for the next three months. In the mornings, she goes to the Wan Chai office to handle urgent matters and client meetings, while in the afternoons, she works from home. She synchronized the new timetable with her husband and father, clarifying their respective responsibilities for household chores, childcare, and caring for her mother during the afternoon hours to ensure the smooth functioning of the family.

events.name: Optimize the Home Rehabilitation Environment
events.description: Before starting her afternoon work-from-home session, Yu Xiaowei first inspected the rehabilitation corner. She used a damp cloth to clean the anti-slip floor mat, ensuring there were no water stains that could cause slipping. Based on her mother’s performance during her first training session yesterday, she made slight adjustments to the content of the wall schedule, adding two short rest reminders to make the arrangement more user-friendly.

events.name: Prepare and feed a nutritious lunch for mother.
events.description: After rushing home from the company during her lunch break, Yu Xiaowei immediately headed into the kitchen. She steamed the fish and pumpkin she had prepared before leaving in the morning, then blended them into a smooth puree using a mixer. She mixed it with a small amount of rice paste to create a lunch rich in protein and fiber. Patiently, she fed her mother spoonful by spoonful, carefully observing her swallowing.

events.name: Due to fatigue, went to bed early and skipped embroidery.
events.description: Due to a full day of busyness and stress, Yu Xiaowei felt extremely fatigued, went to bed early at night, and temporarily set aside her embroidery healing habit.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Trying to adapt to the new rhythm, with a touch of exploration.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: On the first day of the new model, it felt somewhat manageable, but the persistent lack of sleep and increasing fatigue were noticeable.

2025-03.daily_overview: A typical flexible workday intertwined with work and family. In the morning, she handles urgent work tasks, while in the afternoon, she works from home and juggles family matters. At the same time, she and her running partner canceled their morning run due to the weather, which further reinforced the reality of her shifting exercise patterns. She begins preparing for an online client workshop (a cross-day event begins).

events.name: Online Team Regular Meeting and Work Planning
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei logged into the video conference on time from her home study to attend the team's weekly meeting. She attentively listened to the performance review and proactively shared her insights on serving clients online under the flexible work model. After the meeting, she promptly compiled the key points and tasks into digital notes and began planning the list of key clients to follow up with online this week.

events.name: Assist the mother with home-based rehabilitation training.
events.description: Before leaving in the morning and during breaks in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei, with the assistance of her husband, conducted rehabilitation exercises for her mother according to the schedule. The activities included short-distance walking with the aid of a walker, helping her mother move her upper limb joints, and encouraging her to practice simple single-word pronunciation. Yu Xiaowei carefully observed her mother's reactions and level of fatigue, adjusting the intensity of the exercises accordingly.

events.name: Schedule a video consultation with a rehabilitation therapist
events.description: To ensure the correctness of the home rehabilitation methods, Yu Xiaowei scheduled an initial video consultation with a rehabilitation therapist through a platform recommended by the hospital. She planned to use the camera during the consultation to show the home rehabilitation environment and her mother's activities, in order to obtain professional advice on correcting movements.

events.name: Handling core customer business
events.description: Today's specific itinerary is as follows: In the morning, head to the office to attend the morning meeting and handle urgent emails, followed by an outbound visit to a key client. In the afternoon, return home to discuss the details of a joint client proposal with colleague Su Lishan via a conference call, and handle desk work such as policy documents.

events.name: Share Works in the Embroidery Friends Group
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei took a photo of the unfinished embroidery from the previous night with her phone and shared it in the Cantonese embroidery interest group on WeChat. She wrote simply: "Picking up the needle and thread again has brought me a lot of peace." Embroidery friends He Meiling and teacher Wu Xiuying quickly liked and left encouraging comments, and this sense of recognition from afar made her feel warm.

events.name: Start preparing materials for the online client workshop.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei began preparing materials for a three-day online client seminar, which was her attempt at business expansion under the new work model.

起始状态.心情: Follow the steps to deal with the inconveniences brought by rainy days.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room
结束状态.心情: A busy yet fulfilling day, the new pattern of balancing work and family is beginning to take shape, but it consumes a great deal of energy.

date_attribute.weather: Heavy rain

2025-03.daily_overview: On a day of heavy rain, all outdoor activities were completely canceled. Yu Xiaowei worked from home all day and had her first remote consultation with a rehabilitation therapist, bringing professional guidance into the home. She also began preparing for her upcoming birthday and the first aid course exam. Unfortunately, she suffered a minor back strain while assisting her mother in her recovery.

events.name: First video consultation with a rehabilitation therapist
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei connected with the rehabilitation therapist on time. Through her phone camera, she showed the environment of the rehabilitation corner in the living room and had her mother try a few movements beside the walker. The therapist provided immediate guidance online: the position of support could be moved further back, the angle of this footstep could be a bit larger, and taught several new, safe limb movement methods for the bed. Yu Xiaowei felt that this consultation was very worthwhile.

events.name: Review the theoretical knowledge of the first aid course.
events.description: In the evening, after completing her weekly work report, Yu Xiaowei took out the textbooks and notes from her first aid course and began reviewing the theoretical essentials of CPR, AED usage, and bandaging and immobilization. Aware that the practical assessment was approaching, she did not dare to slack off, repeatedly memorizing the key steps and figures (such as a compression depth of 5–6 centimeters and a frequency of 100–120 compressions per minute).

events.name: Minor Back Strain Incident
events.description: While assisting her mother with rehabilitation exercises in the morning, Yu Xiaowei suffered a minor strain in her lower back muscles due to improper posture. It is expected that she will need to rest for 3-5 days. She immediately ceased high-intensity activities and is alleviating the pain through gentle stretching.

events.name: Family secretly prepares a birthday surprise.
events.description: While Yu Xiaowei was busy with work and study, her husband Zhang Weiming quietly discussed with his father and children in the family group chat (excluding Yu Xiaowei), planning to prepare a simple and heartwarming celebration for her birthday the next day. They decided to buy a small cake and have the children draw birthday cards. Zhang Weiming reminded the children to keep it a secret to surprise their mother.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home (Awakened by the Sound of Rain)
起始状态.心情: Feeling a bit gloomy due to the rainy weather, but work arrangements remain as usual.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room
结束状态.心情: After receiving professional rehabilitation guidance, I feel more confident, but the discomfort and concerns from the back strain persist.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy to overcast

2025-03.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowei's 39th birthday. Against the backdrop of family financial constraints and the pressures of recovery, this birthday was not marked by a grand celebration, but rather a simple, heartfelt gathering carefully prepared by her family. This precious moment of warmth infused her with strength amid the exhaustion of recent days. At the same time, she also reflected on how to bring more joy into her mother's life.

events.name: Conduct quarterly policy reviews with clients.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei, following a flexible work arrangement, went to Causeway Bay to have afternoon tea with a long-term client, Mrs. Chen. They conducted a routine quarterly policy review and discussed new savings products. The professional work allowed her to temporarily step away from her family role.

events.name: Submit the first flexible work weekly report.
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei organized this week's work records, client follow-up details, and sales data, and carefully prepared her first weekly report under the flexible work arrangement. In the report, she summarized her adaptation to the new model this week, noting that it had improved her focus while working from home in the afternoons and allowed her to better support her mother’s recovery. She submitted the weekly report to her supervisor, Liang Zhenhua, through the company’s system.

events.name: The surprise birthday celebration prepared by family members.
events.description: After dinner, husband Zhang Weiming and the children suddenly brought out a small fruit cream cake and began singing "Happy Birthday." Father pushed Mother, who was in a wheelchair, out of the room. Mother clapped her hands with effort, her face beaming with a loving smile. Yu Xiaowei made a wish in the candlelight, hoping for her family's health and safety. The whole family shared the cake while the children chattered about funny stories from school. The warmth of this moment temporarily dispelled all the stress and gloom.

events.name: Propose a weekend family outdoor activity
events.description: Sensing her mother's low spirits from staying at home for a long time, Yu Xiaowei discussed with her husband after the birthday celebration and proposed organizing a family outdoor activity on Sunday when the weather improved. They chose Kowloon Walled City Park, which has good accessibility and is close to home, and made preliminary plans regarding the participants, timing, and items to bring (wheelchair, water, snacks, etc.), hoping to let her mother get some fresh air outside.

events.name: Due to changes in diet for birthday celebrations.
events.description: Birthday cake and celebrations led to Yu Xiaowei consuming slightly more food today, resulting in a slight increase in weight.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Focused on the day's work schedule, I almost forgot my birthday.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: Deeply moved by the love of family, my heart is filled with warmth and strength; the close bond of family is the cornerstone for overcoming all difficulties.

state.今日运动: Gentle Yoga Trial for 20 Minutes (Due to lower back strain, opting for low-intensity exercise)

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, the weather is warming up, but the humidity persists (the "return of the south" weather continues).

2025-03.daily_overview: Saturday was a day for learning, socializing, and exploring. Yu Xiaowei completed the final practical assessment of her first aid course, had her weekly routine video call with her younger brother, engaged with cutting-edge technology product concepts, and explored new possibilities for her physical and mental well-being by signing up for a meditation class. The first step in family financial planning was also taken.

events.name: Complete the practical assessment of the first aid course.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei completed the final practical session of the first aid course at the community center. She skillfully performed the entire process of CPR on a dummy model, accurately used the AED training device, and simulated with her partner the application of triangular bandages for sports injuries and household accidental wounds, as well as fracture immobilization. Her performance was commended by the instructor.

events.name: Conduct a weekly video call with younger brother Yu Xiaofeng.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei had her usual video call with her younger brother, Yu Xiaofeng, who lives in Shenzhen. As a tech product manager, he excitedly shared his experience with the Apple Vision Pro, describing the wonders of immersive movie-watching and virtual travel. He suggested that his sister, who often feels stressed from work, could try using it to relax. Although Yu Xiaowei jokingly remarked that it was too expensive and high-end for her to handle, she couldn’t help but feel a flicker of curiosity about this new technology that offered a brief escape from reality.

events.name: Sign up for the Community Meditation Retreat Experience Day
events.description: While browsing the community center website to check information about collecting her first aid certificate, Yu Xiaowei stumbled upon a free retreat meditation experience day scheduled for the next week. Reflecting on her recent high-pressure lifestyle and the difficulty of engaging in intense physical exercise, she thought this might offer a new way to relax and promptly completed the online registration.

events.name: Start a family fund regular investment plan
events.description: After several days of research and discussions with her husband, Yu Xiaowei decided to launch a long-term family investment plan. Drawing on advice from her colleague Guo Junwei and close friend Huang Wenhui, she set up a monthly fixed investment in a historically stable healthcare-themed fund through an investment app. The amount was modest, but it marked a small step for the family’s financial management—shifting from a completely conservative approach toward steady growth, with the aim of preparing for future health-related expenses.

events.name: Engage in gentle yoga practice
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei performed a 20-minute gentle yoga stretch at home, focusing on relaxing the shoulders, neck, and back, to align with the exercise habits outlined in the conclusion of the health status.

events.name: Demonstrate simple first aid techniques to family members.
events.description: After returning home from the course, Yu Xiaowei demonstrated the head bandaging method she learned today to her husband and father, and shared the importance of learning first aid. She plans to place the family first aid kit, which was given as a gift from the course, in a prominent spot in the living room and teach her children to recognize the items inside.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Feeling a bit nervous about the upcoming practical assessment, but also full of confidence.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Completing the first aid course brings a strong sense of accomplishment and security; chatting with my younger brother broadens my horizons; I look forward to new attempts (such as meditation). Overall, my state has shifted from purely passive coping to showing a hint of active exploration and planning.

state.今日运动: Gentle yoga for 20 minutes, short-distance walk for 15 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Partly cloudy with occasional sunshine, a gentle breeze, it's a rare dry and pleasant weather in early spring.

2025-03.daily_overview: This was the first Sunday after Mother was discharged from the hospital and returned home. Yu Xiaowei and her family carefully planned an outing, aiming to take Mother, who was in a wheelchair, to the nearby Kowloon Walled City Park to enjoy the sunshine and fresh air, and to alleviate the oppressive atmosphere of recent home recovery. The day’s itinerary was slow-paced and heartwarming, and the interactions among family members allowed her to temporarily set aside the pressures of work and caregiving, rediscovering the joys of family life.

events.name: Preparing for a family outing
events.description: On Sunday morning, Yu Xiaowei and her family prepared for their outing. Yu Xiaowei was responsible for preparing simple picnic food and water, while Zhang Weiming checked the vehicle's condition and helped securely fasten his mother's wheelchair inside the car. The two children, Zhang Zixuan and Zhang Yuxin, also excitedly helped pack their own small backpacks. With everyone's assistance, Grandma Chen Meiling changed into a comfortable and decent outfit for the outing, her expression filled with anticipation.

events.name: Drive to the park
events.description: The family set off from their home on Prince Edward Road West in a private car, driven by Yu Xiaowei, heading to the nearby Kowloon Walled City Park. Along the way, the children were filled with anticipation, while Yu Xiaowei drove and introduced to her mother the recent renovations and distinctive gardens of the park.

events.name: Strolling in the Park and Catching Up
events.description: Upon arriving at the park, Zhang Weiming pushed his mother, Chen Meiling, who was seated in a wheelchair, while Yu Xiaowei held their son Zhang Zixuan with one hand and their daughter Zhang Yuxin with the other. They strolled leisurely under the shade of the trees, admiring the garden scenery. Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming chatted with their mother, reminiscing about family anecdotes from when the children played here as toddlers. Although her speech was not fluent, the mother looked delighted and showed a long-lost smile.

events.name: Children play and frolic.
events.description: On the premise of ensuring safety, Yu Xiaowei let her son Zhang Zixuan and daughter Zhang Yuxin play freely and frolic in the children's play area of the park. She and Zhang Weiming watched over the children from a distance while continuing to accompany their mother in enjoying the sunshine.

events.name: Lawn Picnic Time
events.description: The family found a cool, comfortable patch of grass, spread out a picnic mat, and shared the snacks and drinks they had brought. Yu Xiaowei had specially prepared easy-to-swallow mashed bananas and warm soy milk for her mother. As they ate and chatted, the atmosphere was relaxed, and the mother enjoyed the joy of having her children and grandchildren gathered around her.

events.name: Returning home after the outing.
events.description: In the afternoon, the family finished their park outing and drove back home. Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming helped their mother rest in the rehabilitation corner of the living room, tidied up the items they had brought along, and washed the water bottles. Meanwhile, the children sat on the sofa, sharing their excitement about the outing and chattering nonstop.

events.name: Review and Plan
events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming tidied up the kitchen while reflecting on their daytime park outing, feeling that the family atmosphere had been effectively eased. They discussed their mother's good condition today and the children's happiness, agreeing that such moderate outdoor activities were beneficial for both family bonding and their mother's recovery. They also considered organizing similar family outings once a month in the future, provided the weather and their mother's health allowed.

events.name: Record Rehabilitation and Emotions
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei briefly recorded in her notebook her mother's performance during the day's outdoor activities (in a pleasant mood, with no obvious discomfort), and noted the sense of fulfillment and relaxation she felt from successfully organizing a family event.

起始状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, bedroom at home
起始状态.心情: Tired but expectant, carrying the responsibility of organizing family activities.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong.
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and content, the warmth of family bonds alleviates recent stress, yet physical fatigue persists.

state.今日运动: Take a walk in the park for about an hour, mainly with slow-paced accompaniment.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, slightly humid, typical on the eve of the return of the south wind.

2025-03.daily_overview: The first full workweek after implementing flexible working hours. Yu Xiaowei goes to the office in the morning to handle core business tasks and schedules family health-related matters in the afternoon. She stays up late working on urgent client proposals, which leads to a later bedtime and increases work pressure.

events.name: Handle core tasks in the morning.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei arrived punctually at the AIA Tower office in Wan Chai in the morning. She efficiently dedicated two hours to handling emails, responding to urgent client inquiries, and quickly discussing recent client follow-ups with her colleague, Su Lishan. Before the lunch break, she had a brief communication with her supervisor, Liang Zhenhua, and submitted the initial draft of her first work report after implementing the flexible working schedule.

events.name: Chatting with friends at noon.
events.description: During lunch break, Yu Xiaowei and her colleague and good friend Su Lishan had a meal at a tea restaurant near the company. She talked about the Apple Vision Pro recommended by her younger brother Yu Xiaofeng, sharing her curiosity but also admitting that she found the price expensive and that her family’s current expenses were tight, so she wouldn’t consider it for the time being. Su Lishan also agreed and shared information about alternative tech products.

events.name: Go to the clinic for consultation on home care.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei visited Dr. Zhou Wenbin's clinic to seek detailed advice on home care for her mother after a stroke. She brought a prepared list of questions, covering aspects such as nutritional balance, medication management, fall prevention details, and how to handle emotional fluctuations.

events.name: Obtain Professional Guidance
events.description: Dr. Zhou Wenbin patiently and thoroughly explained the key points of post-stroke care, emphasizing the importance of balanced nutrition and preventing complications. He recommended an experienced community physical therapist and provided relevant contact information and materials. Yu Xiaowei listened attentively and took careful notes.

events.name: Organize consultation notes
events.description: After the consultation, Yu Xiaowei stayed for a while in the waiting area outside the clinic, organizing the key points explained by the doctor and her own questions into clearer notes. She also carefully stored the brochures and referral letters provided by the doctor, preparing for the subsequent arrangements of rehabilitation resources.

events.name: Staying up late to handle urgent client proposals
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowei received an urgent request from a high-end client to revise an insurance proposal. She sacrificed her sleep time and worked late into the early hours of the morning to handle it, which led to increased fatigue.

events.name: Discussion on Family Rehabilitation Plan
events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei shared the professional care guidance she received from the doctor with her husband Zhang Weiming and her mother Chen Meiling. Together, they discussed how to incorporate the doctor's advice into their daily routine and made preliminary arrangements to contact a community physical therapist.

events.name: Reflection and Adjustment of Movement Patterns
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Yu Xiaowei reflected on the physical fatigue and anxiety she had been experiencing recently due to family caregiving pressures. Looking at the photo on the wall from her past marathon finish, she realized that her current high-intensity training plan was severely out of sync with her life rhythm. Not only was it difficult to maintain, but it could also worsen her physical and mental burden. She began to seriously consider shifting her exercise routine toward a gentler, recovery-focused approach.

起始状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, China
起始状态.心情: Slightly tense, facing the dual challenges of work and family tasks in the new week.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet extremely exhausting, gaining professional guidance brings a sense of reassurance, while working late into the night adds to the stress.

state.今日运动: Commuting to and from work by walking, no specific exercise.

date_attribute.weather: It's cloudy and foggy, with obvious signs of the "returning south weather." The indoor walls are damp.

2025-03.daily_overview: Continuously exploring personal health management solutions under family pressure. Yu Xiaowei proactively consulted a doctor for advice on adjusting her exercise routine and began researching alternative approaches. Meanwhile, due to headaches caused by staying up late, she temporarily canceled her exercise plans.

events.name: Telephone Consultation for Exercise Adjustment
events.description: During a break from working from home in the morning, Yu Xiaowei contacted her family doctor, Zhou Wenbin, via phone to seek advice on adjusting her high-intensity marathon training to a gentler, more restorative form of exercise during a period of heightened family stress. Dr. Zhou suggested she could start with low-impact activities such as yoga, tai chi, or swimming, emphasizing relaxation and maintaining basic fitness rather than focusing on intensity.

events.name: Learn New Insurance Regulations (Savings Products)
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei used a computer-based learning platform at home to complete a course module on the specific terms of savings-type insurance affected by new regulations, changes in product design, and sales considerations. She took notes while listening, organizing key points, with particular attention to the impact on existing customer policies and adjustments to future sales pitches.

events.name: Temporary rest due to headache
events.description: Due to staying up late the night before, Yu Xiaowei experienced a slight headache and decided to cancel her evening exercise plan, opting instead to rest at home and drink some hot tea for relief.

events.name: Seeking financial advice
events.description: After the child fell asleep in the evening, Yu Xiaowei reached out to her childhood friend Huang Wenhui, who works as an internet product manager in Shenzhen, via WeChat to seek advice on long-term investments in the technology and healthcare sectors. At the same time, she also sent a message to her bank relationship manager, Li Guodong, politely inquiring whether HSBC offers any recommended low-risk healthcare-themed fund products and scheduled a follow-up phone call. She emphasized that this was merely a preliminary inquiry to build knowledge for the long-term health security of her family.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong.
起始状态.心情: Calm but with a headache, focused on solving the problem.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong, in the bedroom of the home.
结束状态.心情: There is a slight sense of progress, but physical discomfort brings irritability.

2025-03.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowei initiated a fundamental shift in her personal exercise regimen. On a humid evening, she tried gentle home yoga for the first time, marking her transition from a runner who pursued challenges and achievements to a caregiver seeking physical and mental balance. Concurrently, she began a three-day follow-up project for a client.

events.name: First At-Home Gentle Yoga Experience
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei laid out her yoga mat in the living room, turned off the main light, leaving only a warm desk lamp on. She followed a gentle yoga session on her phone app, lasting about 30 minutes, focusing on relaxing her tense shoulders, neck, and back caused by long hours of desk work and stress. Moving slowly, she tried to concentrate on her breathing and the subtle sensations in her body. After the practice, she sat quietly for five minutes, engaging in mindful breathing to focus on the calm of the present moment, alleviating the accumulated anxiety and physical fatigue.

events.name: Study the New Insurance Regulations (Medical Products)
events.description: During the afternoon home office hours, Yu Xiaowei continued studying the impact of the new regulations on medical insurance products, including adjustments to coverage, optimization of the claims process, and mechanisms for rate adjustments. She reflected on several common client cases she had previously handled, simulating how to explain these changes to clients and considering how to turn the new regulations into new sales opportunities.

events.name: Prepare a nutritious dinner for mother.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowei used a blender to puree steamed tofu, blanched spinach, and a small amount of shrimp into a smooth paste. She carefully adjusted the consistency to create a nutritious dinner, patiently feeding her mother, Chen Meiling, while observing her swallowing ability.

events.name: Communicating with running partners about changes in exercise routines
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei contacted her running friend Shen Peiwen via WeChat and honestly explained that due to family caregiving responsibilities, she needed to temporarily shift from high-intensity running training to gentler yoga practice. Shen Peiwen expressed complete understanding and shared her own experience of adjusting her exercise routine during her menstrual period. The two exchanged new perspectives on balancing exercise and life, and agreed to try yoga classes together in the future.

events.name: Start Customer Project Follow-up (Day 1)
events.description: Yu Xiaowei initiated a new high-end client insurance planning project, which requires three consecutive days of data collection and communication. Today, a preliminary needs analysis was conducted.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong.
起始状态.心情: Determined to try and change, feeling a bit unfamiliar yet hopeful about the new way of exercising.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: The body feels slightly relaxed, especially in the shoulders and neck; the mood is calm, and taking the first step toward change brings a small sense of accomplishment.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, with a slight reduction in humidity, but still feeling muggy.

2025-03.daily_overview: The day was filled with resolving specific issues and making pragmatic plans. A minor malfunction in a household appliance was efficiently and cost-effectively resolved through the couple's collaboration. Meanwhile, the follow-up on a client project entered its second day, adding to the work pressure.

events.name: Air conditioning malfunction detected.
events.description: After returning home from work, Yu Xiaowei felt unusually stuffy while resting in the living room. She noticed that although the air conditioner was turned on, its cooling effect was poor, with weak airflow and only a slight cool breeze. She checked the remote control settings and the air vents, confirming that it was not an operational issue, and initially concluded that it was a machine malfunction.

events.name: Couple Communication Repair Plan
events.description: Yu Xiaowei communicated the air conditioning issue with her husband Zhang Weiming, who had just returned home from work. Given that Zhang Weiming is a professional air conditioning repair technician, they decided against contacting expensive external repair services. Instead, Zhang Weiming would utilize his professional skills and company resources to diagnose and repair the issue, thereby minimizing household expenses as much as possible.

events.name: Collaborative Cleaning of the Filter Screen
events.description: Zhang Weiming opened the air conditioner casing and found that the filter screen was heavily covered with dust, which was one of the main reasons for the poor airflow. Yu Xiaowei assisted her husband in removing the dusty filter screen, thoroughly scrubbed it with clean water in the bathroom, and left it to dry, demonstrating the couple's seamless cooperation in household chores.

events.name: In-depth consultation on fund fixed investment
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei contacted her close friend Huang Wenhui in Shenzhen via phone. She inquired more specifically about the operational procedures, amount settings, and selection criteria for fixed investment in funds, with a particular focus on discussing the long-term investment value and potential risks of healthcare-themed funds. Drawing on her own financial management experience and logical analysis, Huang Wenhui provided her with several key screening dimensions and a checklist of considerations.

events.name: Preliminary inspection of air conditioning refrigerant.
events.description: Zhang Weiming used professional tools to conduct a preliminary inspection of the air conditioning system and determined that there might be a slight refrigerant leak. He noted down the type of refrigerant that needed to be replenished and planned to apply for it from the company the next day at work.

events.name: Complete the study and testing of new regulations.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei completed the final online test for the new insurance regulations course and passed it smoothly. Afterward, she systematically organized the study notes she had taken over the past few days, compiling them into a clear, product-line-based (savings, medical) summary document. She stored it on both her computer and phone for quick reference during future client consultations.

events.name: Customer Project Follow-up (Day 2)
events.description: Yu Xiaowei continued to follow up on the client project, conducted a detailed financial risk assessment, and worked until late.

起始状态.心情: Stable, but work pressure has increased.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, at home
结束状态.心情: The sense of solidity after solving a problem, yet the fatigue from work.

2025-03.daily_overview: Friday serves as a transitional day bridging the workweek and the weekend. Yu Xiaowei returned to the office to communicate with colleagues, reinforcing her learning outcomes. On the final day of following up with client projects, she stayed up late due to a gathering, resulting in a slight increase in her weight.

events.name: Plan new exercise habits
events.description: In the morning, based on her first yoga experience and the doctor's advice, Yu Xiaowei made a simple plan for her exercise routine over the next week in her schedule book: she planned to do gentle evening yoga three to four times a week (20–30 minutes each session) and try a short outdoor walk on weekend mornings, gradually replacing her previous high-intensity training schedule with new healthy habits.

events.name: Office Communication and Learning Experience Sharing
events.description: Yu Xiaowei returned to the company office in the morning and exchanged insights with her colleague Su Lishan during the lunch break about studying the new insurance regulations. They discussed the potential sales opportunities (such as coverage upgrades) and challenges (such as increased explanation costs) that the new regulations might bring. They also shared their respective note summaries with each other and agreed to hold regular exchanges in the future to progress together.

events.name: Coordinate Weekend Family Care
events.description: Yu Xiaowei discussed with her husband Zhang Weiming in advance, informing him that she had signed up for a community meditation experience event on Saturday afternoon. She hoped he could take care of their two children and accompany her mother, Chen Meiling. She also confirmed that she had no urgent work commitments on Saturday morning and could handle some household chores.

events.name: Receive maintenance materials
events.description: While at work, Zhang Weiming applied to the company for the environmentally friendly refrigerant R410A and any necessary sealing materials needed for repairs. By taking advantage of the employee internal price, he obtained them at a very low cost (approximately 50 Hong Kong dollars), saving a significant amount on external repair expenses.

events.name: Complete air conditioning repair
events.description: After work, Zhang Weiming used professional tools to replenish the refrigerant for the air conditioning system and carefully checked the sealing. After completion, he reinstalled the dried filter and started the air conditioner for a long-term test. One hour later, he confirmed that the cooling effect had fully returned to normal, making the indoor environment dry and comfortable.

events.name: Customer Project Follow-up (Day 3)
events.description: Yu Xiaowei felt relieved after completing the client project and submitting the final proposal.

events.name: Returning late from a gathering with friends.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei was unexpectedly invited to a brief gathering with her close friend Lin Jiaxin, where they had a cup of milk tea, chatted, and relaxed, returning home relatively late.
