2025-03.daily_overview: On Saturday morning, household chores and family matters were taken care of, while the afternoon belonged to Yu Xiaowei's brief personal "soul-charging" time. She attended a community meditation session alone, experiencing for the first time the tranquility brought by mindfulness.

events.name: Confirm First Aid Course Arrangements
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei confirmed her participation in the third part and final assessment of the Basic First Aid Certificate Course on March 29th via phone call and completed the payment. She carefully noted the class time and location in her calendar.

events.name: Attending a community meditation event alone
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei went alone to the Kowloon City Community Center. In the simply decorated and quiet activity room, she followed the instructor to learn basic diaphragmatic breathing and mindfulness meditation. At first, her thoughts were chaotic, often drifting to work and family matters. However, with the gentle guidance of the instructor, she gradually brought her focus back to her breathing, experiencing a moment of inner peace. She attentively went through the entire process.

events.name: Consult with the mentor
events.description: After the experience activity ended, Yu Xiaowei proactively asked the mentor several questions about how to continue practicing at home and how to deal with the difficulty of wandering thoughts in the early stages. The mentor offered encouragement and practical advice, and also gave out some brochures introducing the benefits of mindfulness meditation and simple practice methods.

events.name: Reflecting on the Meditation Experience
events.description: On the bus home, Yu Xiaowei reflected on the brief sense of calm brought by her meditation experience. She decided to adopt the diaphragmatic breathing technique she had learned as an "instant stress-relief tool," planning to use it whenever she felt anxious at work or struggled to relax before sleep, adding a new method to her emotional management toolkit.

events.name: Share new experiences with family.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowei briefly described her experience at the meditation event to her husband and mother at the dinner table. She mentioned that this relaxation method could benefit the whole family, especially her mother, who needed rest, and her child, who was facing increasing academic pressure. She suggested that they could try doing a few minutes of simple breathing exercises together on weekend mornings in the future.

events.name: Plan for Future Participation (Potential)
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei browsed through her running app and saw the registration announcement for the Hong Kong Marathon in the second half of the year. She knew she couldn’t prepare for a full marathon this year, but her passion for running hadn’t faded. Silently, she thought that maybe next year, when things were more stable, she could start again with a half marathon. It was just a distant thought, but it kept the spark of hope alive.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, enjoying the relatively slow pace of a weekend morning.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong.
结束状态.心情: In the tranquility, there is a hint of joy in exploring new things. The initial experience of meditation has opened up new avenues for self-regulation.

2025-03.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for tidying up the household and having in-depth conversations. Yu Xiaowei experienced an inner struggle when she politely declined an invitation from her close friend, marking the beginning of her conscious effort to reduce social engagements. Later, she and her husband jointly presided over a serious yet necessary family financial restructuring meeting.

events.name: The Struggle with Social Invitations
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei received a WeChat message from her best friend Lin Jiaxin at home, inviting her to go shopping over the weekend. Upon seeing the message, she felt a strong desire to meet up with her friend, chat about gossip, and unwind. However, the thought of the ongoing expenses for her mother’s recovery, the potential uncertainty of her own income, and the family financial meeting scheduled for the afternoon quickly followed. Feeling deeply conflicted and torn, she paced back and forth in the living room for several minutes.

events.name: Politely Decline a Friend's Invitation
events.description: After an internal struggle, Yu Xiaowei ultimately declined Lin Jiaxin's shopping invitation via WeChat message, citing the need to care for her mother at home and handle some family matters. She expressed her apology sincerely and conveyed her anticipation for the next gathering, suggesting they plan another time when her mother's condition was more stable.

events.name: Adapt to changes in social rhythms.
events.description: After sending the polite refusal message, Yu Xiaowei put down her phone, feeling a wave of loss and loneliness. She made herself a cup of Hong Kong-style milk tea and sat by the window, beginning to reflect on her current stage in life. She realized that, for the sake of her family's financial stability and the deep care her mother required, temporarily reducing non-essential social expenses and outings, and shifting the focus of her life inward, was a necessary and rational adjustment.

events.name: Turning towards inner emotional satisfaction.
events.description: To calm her emotions and adapt to the new pace of life, Yu Xiaowei decided to shift more of her emotional needs inward and toward her family. She plans to unwind by practicing Cantonese embroidery and trying meditation breathing exercises after her child falls asleep at night, seeking inner peace and fulfillment from these quiet activities.

events.name: Prepare materials for the family financial meeting.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei organized last month's bank statements, her mother's medical expense receipts, and the family's daily spending records, preparing detailed materials for the evening's family financial meeting. As she began to outline the financial pressure points facing the family, her mood grew serious and cautious.

events.name: Hold a family financial meeting
events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming held a serious family financial meeting at the dining table in the living room. They reviewed all expenses item by item and decided to significantly cut back on dining out, entertainment spending, and non-essential purchases (such as new clothes and electronics). They also officially suspended Yu Xiaowei’s planned enrollment in the next marathon training camp. The core of the meeting was to create a detailed monthly budget and, for the first time, allocate a specific amount of money as a "Family Health Emergency Fund." Zhang Weiming also suggested that he would handle minor repairs for household appliances, plumbing, and other issues using his skills to reduce outsourcing costs.

events.name: Drafting Budget and Fund Proposals
events.description: Based on the discussions from the financial meeting, Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming jointly drafted a detailed monthly budget on a notebook, clarifying the tightening limits for various expenses. At the same time, they determined the initial amount of the "Family Health Emergency Fund" (allocating a small portion from existing savings), the monthly savings target, and the priority usage scope of the fund (primarily for unexpected medical, educational, or basic living expenses).

events.name: Explain financial adjustments to family members.
events.description: After the financial meeting, Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming gently explained to their mother Chen Meiling and their two children the necessity of family financial planning, especially to support Grandma’s recovery and ensure the family’s long-term stability. In a way the children could understand, they informed them that dining out and entertainment expenses would be reduced for a period of time, and encouraged the whole family to save together, such as going to the supermarket to compare prices. The children nodded, not fully grasping the concept.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong.
起始状态.心情: Relaxed with a hint of the social anticipation typical of weekends.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, bedroom at home

2025-03.daily_overview: The new week began on a note of financial tightening. Yu Xiaowei moved her financial planning from research to action, consulting professionals and ultimately selecting a product. At the same time, she adjusted her exercise routine due to her child falling ill and going to bed early.

events.name: Consultation on the Practical Operation of Fund Regular Investment
events.description: During her lunch break, Yu Xiaowei contacted Li Guodong, a client manager at HSBC, via phone. She inquired more specifically about the process of setting up a fund regular investment account, the required documents, handling fees, as well as the detailed profile and investment suggestions for the global healthcare fund she had selected. Li Guodong provided professional answers and sent her the relevant electronic forms to fill out.

events.name: The child is sick and goes to bed early.
events.description: In the evening, her daughter Zhang Yuxin had a slight fever, so Yu Xiaowei put her to bed early, canceled her planned yoga session, and opted to go to bed early to rest.

events.name: Try guiding the mother in mindful breathing.
events.description: After helping her mother with a limb massage, Yu Xiaowei sat by her mother’s bedside and guided her through simple deep breathing exercises in a slow, calm tone. "Mom, let’s take a slow breath together… and now slowly exhale…" Although her mother couldn’t fully follow along, this process added a sense of tranquility and connection to the caregiving moment, rather than making it feel like a mere chore.

events.name: Discussing financial plans with my husband.
events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming discussed their family financial plan in the living room. She explained to him in detail the investment rationale, long-term potential returns, and main risks of healthcare-themed funds, sharing her research and Li Guodong's advice. Considering their family's conservative financial style, future education savings for their children, and the newly established emergency fund, they carefully deliberated on a preliminary monthly fixed investment amount and agreed to start with a very small sum as a trial.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong.
起始状态.心情: Be pragmatic and start the new week with a sense of responsibility to implement the new financial plan.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, bedroom at home.
结束状态.心情: Stable but concerned about the child's health, progress in financial planning brings a sense of control.

state.今日运动: No specific sports, taking care of children

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with rising temperatures and dry, comfortable weather.

2025-03.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowei began applying systematic management thinking to family health. She purchased health record books and formally adjusted the automatic flow settings for family finances. At the same time, she went for physical therapy.

events.name: Purchase Health Record Book
events.description: After meeting a client at noon, Yu Xiaowei stopped by a stationery store in Kowloon City District on her way back and bought a notebook with an elegant cover. She planned to use it specifically to systematically record her mother’s recovery progress, medication reactions, dietary habits, as well as her own health routines and emotional fluctuations, determined to start data-driven health management.

events.name: Adjust automatic financial settings
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei used online banking to adjust the amounts of several scheduled automatic transfers according to the newly established budget (for example, increasing the savings transfer and reducing the preset repayment amount for a certain credit card). She also officially transferred the agreed initial amount from the family savings account into the newly created "Family Health Emergency Fund" dedicated sub-account, completing the first concrete action following the financial meeting.

events.name: Seeking personal rehabilitation therapy
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei, experiencing persistent discomfort in her shoulders, neck, and back due to long-term desk work, scheduled an appointment and visited a clinic to consult with a physical therapist. The therapist assessed her condition, pointing out that some of her muscles were overly tight while certain muscle groups were weak. The therapist then taught her a set of targeted rehabilitative stretching and strength training exercises. Additionally, the therapist advised her to adjust her existing yoga practice by systematically incorporating these therapeutic exercises to achieve better rehabilitation outcomes, rather than merely focusing on relaxation.

events.name: The conception of Cantonese embroidery begins to take root.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei didn't pick up her needle and thread. Instead, she flipped through the photos she had taken at the Kowloon Walled City Park the previous week on her phone. Seeing her mother's smile in the park and the familiar scenery, an idea came to her mind: perhaps she could create a small Cantonese embroidery painting themed around the park, preserving this special family memory in a way she excelled at. This thought filled her with warmth and anticipation.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong
起始状态.心情: Organized, ready to execute the plan.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong, in the bedroom of the home.
结束状态.心情: Action brings a sense of fulfillment, and the body feels hopeful after treatment; the budding new idea of Cantonese embroidery brings long-lost creative joy.

state.今日运动: Physical therapy and learning rehabilitation exercises for approximately 1 hour.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a gentle breeze

2025-03.daily_overview: The main task of the day was to implement the cancellation and reduction plan. Yu Xiaowei decisively canceled unnecessary subscription services and training camp registrations. At the same time, she confirmed with her running partners their participation in a small, relaxed event.

events.name: Cancel unnecessary subscriptions and services.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei took a moment to log into her various accounts and canceled the monthly subscriptions for several less frequently used video streaming and music platforms. Afterward, she formally called the marathon training camp, politely but firmly canceling her registration for the originally planned spring training camp. She explained that due to family caregiving responsibilities, she was temporarily unable to participate. After hanging up the phone, she let out a soft sigh, but her eyes remained resolute, knowing this was a necessary step.

events.name: Confirm the race plan with running buddies.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei had a detailed discussion over the phone with her running friend Shen Peiwen about a short-distance (5 km) community charity run scheduled for early summer. They both felt that the intensity was manageable at this stage and that it was a meaningful endeavor. Together, they filled out the registration form online, paid the entry fee, and successfully secured their spots in the race. This gave Yu Xiaowei a small yet concrete sense of purpose.

events.name: Check other automatic deduction items
events.description: Using her mobile banking app, Yu Xiaowei carefully reviewed all the automatic payment items that might occur over the next month. She also discovered a rarely used cloud storage service and canceled it, ensuring that every expense remained within the control of her new budget.

events.name: First systematic recording of health data
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei wrote the date in her newly purchased health record book and began her first official entry. She documented the rehabilitation exercises her mother had completed that day, her mental state, and food intake, as well as her own practice of the rehabilitation exercises taught by the physical therapist, along with her sleep duration. The handwriting was neat and the entries were clearly organized.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong
起始状态.心情: Determined to execute the downsizing plan, with a hint of decisiveness in handling the affairs of "decluttering."

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, in the bedroom of the home
结束状态.心情: A sense of relief after finishing the cleanup mingled with a touch of wistfulness; a faint glimmer of anticipation emerged upon confirming the small competition.

2025-03.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowei continued to refine her final financial decisions. After gathering information from various sources and reaching a consensus with her family, she made her investment choices. Meanwhile, the Cantonese embroidery creation plan evolved from an idea into concrete action.

events.name: Finally selected investment fund
events.description: Based on previous research, discussions with Huang Wenhui and Li Guodong, and consensus with her husband, Yu Xiaowei ultimately selected a stock fund managed by a well-known international fund company. This fund has shown relatively stable long-term performance and primarily invests in leading global pharmaceutical and medical device companies. She values its diversification and the stability of these leading enterprises, considering the risks to be relatively manageable.

events.name: Cantonese Embroidery Creation Initiation: Gathering Materials
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei began working on her Cantonese embroidery project with a park theme. She searched online for old photos of Kowloon Walled City Park and compared them with new scenes, browsed through family photos on her phone for inspiration, and sketched a few composition drafts in her sketchbook. She contemplated how to use flat stitches to depict the texture of the ancient city walls and how to employ layered stitches and scattered stitches to capture the lush, layered trees in the park.

events.name: Prepare a special meal for mother.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei attempted to use newly purchased root vegetables and fish to prepare a more flavorful vegetable and fish puree soup. Her mother, Chen Meiling, appeared to have a better appetite than usual while eating, which brought comfort to Yu Xiaowei, who then recorded this in the health journal.

events.name: Temporary overtime work to handle customer inquiries.
events.description: In the afternoon, an old client suddenly had an urgent insurance need, so Yu Xiaowei worked overtime to handle it, which resulted in her staying up late.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong.
起始状态.心情: Focus, facing the final decision point.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong
结束状态.心情: The relief after a decision is implemented; the excitement brought by starting a creative project, but fatigue caused by overtime work.

state.今日运动: No specific sports, housework, and conceptual creation (mainly mental activities).

2025-03.daily_overview: Friday is the day for systematic summarization and reflection. Yu Xiaowei not only assists her mother in completing rehabilitation exercises but also begins systematically recording data on the linkage between rehabilitation progress and personal health management. In the evening, the whole family goes grocery shopping at the supermarket according to the new budget.

events.name: Assist mother with rehabilitation training
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei assisted her mother, Chen Meiling, in completing the daily prescribed rehabilitation exercises and massages in the living room at home. Her movements were gentle and patient as she carefully observed the subtle changes in her mother's joint mobility.

events.name: The system records rehabilitation and health data.
events.description: After her mother rested, Yu Xiaowei opened the health record notebook in the study and meticulously documented her mother’s rehabilitation progress for the week (such as slight movement in the fingertips of her left hand), medication details, dietary changes, and observations of her mental state (her mood remained relatively stable this week).

events.name: Record personal health management
events.description: In the same notebook, Yu Xiaowei reviewed and recorded the number of times she practiced yoga/rehabilitation exercises this week (3 times), her sleep duration and quality (averaging 6.5 hours, with frequent dreams), and her emotional fluctuations under work and family pressure (anxiety at the beginning of the week, alleviated after meditation over the weekend).

events.name: Discover the Association Between Personal Health and Caregiving Efficacy
events.description: Through comparative records, Yu Xiaowei clearly discovered that on days when she persisted in gentle exercise or meditation, she had more patience and better energy when caring for her mother the next day. She realized that maintaining her own physical and mental health was not selfish, but rather the foundation for ensuring she could continue to fulfill her caregiver duties effectively.

events.name: Plan personal health goals for next month.
events.description: Based on her reflections, Yu Xiaowei wrote a resolution on the last page of her notebook: In the coming month, she plans to incorporate a daily 15-20 minute short outdoor walk (such as taking a small loop around the park after dropping her child off at school) into her routine. She will adjust the schedule flexibly based on the weather to further strengthen her physical fitness and emotional well-being, thereby better supporting her mother’s recovery.

events.name: Supermarket procurement under the new budget.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming, accompanied by their mother and children, headed to a nearby supermarket for their weekly shopping trip, following the new budget list. They strictly controlled their spending, prioritizing fresh vegetables, meat, and essential items while carefully comparing prices. They also cut back on snacks, beverages, and semi-finished products. With their parents’ explanations, the children behaved sensibly and did not fuss about buying candy.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong.
起始状态.心情: The steadiness of routine weekdays, looking forward to the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and insightful, I've gained a clearer sense of control over life through recording and reflection; strictly adhering to the budget brings a slight sense of accomplishment.

state.今日运动: Assist mother with rehabilitation training (light activities), walk to supermarket for shopping.

date_attribute.weather: Clear and sunny, with a gentle breeze.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Saturday morning, Yu Xiaowei took the final assessment of the first aid course and successfully obtained her certificate. In the afternoon and evening, she dedicated her efforts to developing a more detailed rehabilitation plan for her mother for the upcoming month and purchasing materials for her Cantonese embroidery creations.

events.name: Participate in the final first aid assessment.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei went to the course location to participate in the final part of the first aid course, which included learning and assessment. She began by systematically reviewing theoretical knowledge and taking a written test, answering questions carefully. Subsequently, under the supervision of the instructor, she completed practical tests for first aid skills such as CPR, bleeding control and bandaging, and casualty transportation one by one. Her movements were standard, and she remained calm and composed, successfully passing all assessments.

events.name: Obtain a Basic First Aid Certificate
events.description: After the assessment, Yu Xiaowei received her official Basic First Aid certificate on the spot. Holding the certificate, she felt a deep sense of fulfillment and accomplishment. It was not just about acquiring an additional skill, but also about adding a tangible layer of safety and security for her family.

events.name: Share first aid knowledge with family members.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowei showed her newly acquired first aid certificate to her husband Zhang Weiming and her mother Chen Meiling. She briefly explained the key first aid knowledge she had learned, such as how to recognize the signs of a stroke and how to treat burns. Her family was proud of her, and Zhang Weiming even joked that they now had a "family doctor" at home.

events.name: Develop a rehabilitation plan for April
events.description: Based on this month's records and observations, and in accordance with the recommendations of Dr. Zhou Wenbin and the physical therapist, Yu Xiaowei has developed a detailed daily rehabilitation training plan for her mother in the home study for the month of April. The plan includes more specific limb movement activities, newly added language exercises (simple syllable imitation), and scheduled time for outdoor sun exposure, making it more systematic.

events.name: Procure materials for the creation of Guangdong embroidery.
events.description: In the afternoon, following the design blueprint, Yu Xiaowei made a special trip to a fabric and thread specialty store in Sham Shui Po. She carefully selected a piece of plain, off-white satin as the base fabric and chose over a dozen types of silk thread in varying shades and thicknesses to ensure an accurate representation of the color of the bricks in the Kowloon Walled City Park and the layered texture of the trees. She also purchased a new circular embroidery hoop.

起始状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, Home
起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous before the exam, but well-prepared.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong.
结束状态.心情: A sense of achievement and security is overwhelming, and obtaining the certificate is a bright harvest this month; purchasing the desired embroidery materials has also brought the joy of creation.

state.今日运动: Round trip to the course location and procurement on foot, approximately 1.5 hours.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, turning overcast in the afternoon.

2025-03.daily_overview: Sunday marks the end of the month, and the family atmosphere carries a subtle sense of routine mixed with anticipation (for performance evaluations). Yu Xiaowei prepared an even more elaborate meal for her mother while continuing to advance her financial management activities and Cantonese embroidery projects.

events.name: Carefully prepare nutritious meals for mothers.
events.description: On weekend mornings, Yu Xiaowei had more time, so she carefully prepared two meals: a fish and vegetable porridge paste for the morning and fruit puree for the afternoon. She tried adding a little Chinese yam powder to the porridge paste to help strengthen the spleen and stomach. She also meticulously recorded her mother’s reactions after eating, observing whether there were any signs of allergies or indigestion.

events.name: Final confirmation of fund fixed investment setup
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei logged into the HSBC app and the fund company's official website once again, finally confirming all the information, fees, and terms for the global healthcare fund she had selected. She checked her bank account balance to ensure there were sufficient funds for the deduction.

events.name: Cantonese Embroidery Creation: Mounting the Frame and Tracing the Pattern
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei carefully stretched the newly purchased plain silk satin onto the embroidery hoop, adjusting it until it was taut and smooth. Then, using a vanishing ink pen, she meticulously traced the line drawing she had designed for the Kowloon Walled City Park onto the silk satin, preparing for the formal embroidery process. This procedure required immense patience and concentration, and she became so immersed in it that time slipped away unnoticed.

events.name: Family Leisure Time
events.description: In the evening, the whole family watched an animated movie together. Yu Xiaowei sat next to her mother, occasionally helping her adjust the cushion. This was a low-cost family entertainment after tightening their finances, but the simple companionship still brought warmth.

events.name: Temporarily video chatting with a friend.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei had a video chat with her close friend Huang Wenhui in Shenzhen, discussing financial management and recent family updates to unwind.

起始状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, at home.
起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy weekend family time.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Calm and fulfilled, ready for the upcoming new week and new financial plans; the completion of embroidery preparations brings a sense of satisfaction from project progress.

state.今日运动: Household chores and indoor activities are the main focus.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain, the weather is turning cool.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the last day of March, the results at work arrived as expected—the monthly commission settlement statement confirmed a decline in income. Yu Xiaowei calmly accepted this fact and decisively executed the long-planned fund fixed investment operation. At the same time, the newly started Cantonese embroidery piece symbolizes the preservation and creation of beautiful memories under pressure.

events.name: Receive and verify monthly performance settlement.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei received the electronic performance settlement statement for March through the company's internal system. She carefully reviewed the commission details for each insurance policy and confirmed that her total income had decreased by about 15% compared to the previous month, due to the implementation of a flexible work system and a reduction in new policy development. Although this figure was within her expectations, seeing it confirmed firsthand still weighed heavily on her heart, making her feel the tangible pressure of financial strain.

events.name: Commission credited
events.description: According to the settlement statement, the commission for March was automatically transferred to Yu Xiaowei's personal account through the banking system. Shortly after, she received a bank SMS notification confirming that the funds had been credited. She immediately began calculating how to allocate this money into the new family budget framework.

events.name: Execute the setup for regular fund investment.
events.description: During her lunch break, Yu Xiaowei logged into the HSBC mobile app and navigated to the wealth management section to find the fund investment plan feature. Following the plan she had agreed upon with her husband, she set up an automatic monthly deduction of 500 Hong Kong dollars from her savings account on the 10th of each month to purchase a designated global healthcare-themed fund. After carefully reading and confirming the relevant risk disclosures and terms, she completed the setup for her first investment plan.

events.name: Review and Post Financial Plans
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei reviewed the detailed austerity plan established during last month's family financial meeting. She transcribed the specific budget limits to be implemented this month, the projects that had already been cut, and the monthly savings goals onto a sticky note, which she then placed on the inside of the refrigerator door as a daily reminder for the entire family.

events.name: Begin the formal embroidery of Cantonese embroidery.
events.description: After the child fell asleep, Yu Xiaowei turned on the desk lamp, took out the embroidery hoop with the prepared draft, and selected a bluish-gray silk thread. She began with a flat stitch, following the outline of the fortress wall for the first stitch. The faint sound of the needle piercing through the silk was particularly clear in the quiet night. At this moment, she was completely focused, with only the silk thread and the pattern before her eyes.

起始状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, at home
起始状态.心情: The calm of a routine workday, tinged with a hint of anticipation for the monthly performance results.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong
结束状态.心情: Complex yet steady. The decline in income brings pressure, but the setup of fixed investments and the creation of embroidery works bring a slight sense of control over the future and inner peace in the present. The overall state is a blend of exhaustion and determination after accepting reality and responding proactively.

state.今日运动: No specific sports, commuting by walking.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the first day of April, Yu Xiaowei embarked on a new phase in balancing family and work. The morning began with restorative stretches and mindfulness practices to adjust both body and mind, followed by handling the family budget and daily expenses under new policies, while taking the first tentative step into financial management. The day revolved around "management," encompassing both practical planning for the present and small investments in the future.

events.name: Morning Physical and Mental Adjustment
events.description: Before heading to work in the early morning, Yu Xiaowei performed a focused 20-minute rehabilitative stretch for her shoulders, neck, and back on her yoga mat at home, following the steps taught by her physical therapist. This routine aimed to alleviate the strain accumulated from long-term caregiving for her mother and prolonged sedentary office work. She then engaged in a 10-minute mindful breathing exercise to clear her mind and mentally prepare for the busy sales day ahead.

events.name: Plan the monthly household budget
events.description: Based on the commission received at the end of last month, Yu Xiaowei meticulously planned the family's daily expenses for this month in her notebook. She specifically circled and set aside a sum of money to cover her mother Chen Meiling's rehabilitation therapy costs for the month, ensuring that this expense remained a top priority in the family's finances.

events.name: Reviewing the Progress of Mother's Recovery
events.description: In the evening, the nearly month-long nutrition meal plan officially came to an end. Yu Xiaowei, along with her husband Zhang Weiming and her mother, looked back on the experience and were pleased to see a noticeable improvement in her mother’s complexion and much smoother swallowing. She suggested incorporating some of the healthy eating habits developed during this period, such as using less oil and salt and eating more fruits and vegetables, into their daily family meals.

events.name: Encountering the New Policy on Charging for Plastic Meal Boxes
events.description: During her lunch break, Yu Xiaowei went to her regular tea restaurant in Kowloon City to buy takeout wonton noodles. The staff informed her that due to new government regulations, she needed to pay an additional 1 Hong Kong dollar for the plastic meal box. She was slightly surprised, as this was the first time she had to pay for this, but she accepted it without further comment, keeping this new small expense in mind.

events.name: Open a fund fixed investment account
events.description: Influenced by her younger brother Yu Xiaofeng and close friend Huang Wenhui's suggestions, and considering long-term health risks for her family, Yu Xiaowei logged into her bank's app in the evening. She carefully reviewed the relevant guidelines and risk warnings, ultimately completing the setup and authorization for a fund fixed investment account. She scheduled an automatic deduction of 500 Hong Kong dollars on the 10th of each month and successfully executed her first fixed investment. This marked the first step in breaking away from her conservative financial habits.

events.name: Temporary work overtime
events.description: In the evening, due to an urgent need from a client to adjust an insurance policy, Yu Xiaowei spent an extra hour handling the matter online, which delayed her bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with thoughts of planning for the affairs of the new month.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong.
结束状态.心情: There is a slight sense of fulfillment from completing tasks, but also a bit of unease about the newly added fixed investments, feeling somewhat fatigued from working overtime.

2025-04.daily_overview: A workday centered on reflection and proactive adjustment. Yu Xiaowei actively confronted performance pressure, sought guidance from her supervisor, and translated the communication outcomes into concrete preparations for client follow-ups, demonstrating a professional attitude of striving to maintain her work performance despite family pressures.

events.name: Proactively communicate performance with superiors
events.description: In response to the slight decline in her personal performance last month, Yu Xiaowei proactively arranged a brief meeting with her supervisor, Liang Zhenhua, in the office. She candidly analyzed potential reasons (such as recent distractions from family matters), and Liang expressed understanding. He suggested that she could focus more on maintaining high-value existing clients in the near term, while also paying attention to uncovering new needs from the current client network, in order to stabilize her income foundation.

events.name: Temporary Customer Urgent Inquiry
events.description: During the lunch break, I received an urgent call from a long-term client, Wang Qiming, inquiring about adjustments to the details of his company's group insurance. Yu Xiaowei patiently addressed his questions and promised to provide a written plan the next day, which took up part of her rest time.

events.name: Prepare customer follow-up materials
events.description: Based on the strategy discussed with her supervisor, Yu Xiaowei prepared for the follow-up visit with a long-term client scheduled for the next day in her home study that evening. She organized the client’s policy anniversary review report, along with brochures for several newly launched company products that focus on medical coverage, and double-checked the appointment time and the address of the tea restaurant.

events.name: Evening Rehabilitation Stretching
events.description: After the children fell asleep late at night, Yu Xiaowei quietly completed a 20-minute rehabilitative stretching session in the bedroom, focusing on relaxing the tense back muscles caused by prolonged sitting and commuting during the day. This was followed by a 10-minute mindfulness breathing exercise, helping her detach from work-related thoughts and gradually transition into a state of sleep.

2025-04.daily_overview: A day filled with human warmth and unexpected surprises. A follow-up visit with a work client brought delicious food and warmth, easing the pressures of caregiving life. An evening discussion about finances with her husband reflected the harmony of joint family decision-making. A technological experience during her commute opened a window of imagination into her high-pressure life.

events.name: Go to Causeway Bay for a customer follow-up visit.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei set off from her home in Kowloon City and took the subway to Causeway Bay to meet with a long-term client who runs a cha chaan teng for an annual policy review and follow-up.

events.name: Pleasant Customer Interaction and Unexpected Surprises
events.description: Inside the tea restaurant, Yu Xiaowei went over the details of the client's insurance policies from the past year and answered their questions. During casual conversation, she mentioned that pineapple bun was her favorite snack. Upon hearing this, the client was delighted and specially brought out a specially made 'gold medal pineapple bun' from the kitchen for her to taste, along with two VIP vouchers as a token of appreciation. This unexpected surprise made Yu Xiaowei feel deeply touched.

events.name: Experience Apple Vision Pro
events.description: After the follow-up visit, Yu Xiaowei passed by the Apple Store in Causeway Bay on her way to the subway station. Recalling an advertisement she had seen on social media, she entered the store out of curiosity and tried on the Apple Vision Pro under the guidance of a staff member. The immersive experience of virtually exploring the Alps was so stunning that it temporarily helped her forget the pressures of reality, sparking her interest in this high-tech method of stress relief.

events.name: Sharing the Experience of Follow-up Visits and Delicious Food
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowei carefully stored the VIP exchange voucher and shared the pleasant experience of the customer follow-up visit and the surprise of receiving complimentary food with her family during dinner. The dining table was filled with a relaxed and joyful atmosphere.

events.name: Discussing Regular Fund Investments with Husband
events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei chatted with her husband Zhang Weiming in the living room and proactively shared her recent research and setup of a fund fixed investment plan. She explained that it was a long-term, risk-diversifying investment approach and used the example of a family health reserve to illustrate her intentions. Zhang Weiming expressed support for her efforts to learn about financial management but cautiously reminded her to use only spare money that would not affect their daily life. Yu Xiaowei nodded in agreement.

events.name: Skip rehabilitation stretching
events.description: Due to a busy day of activities and a relaxed mood, Yu Xiaowei decided to skip the evening rehabilitation stretches and rest earlier.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the first day of the Qingming Festival holiday, the family atmosphere was solemn. Yu Xiaowei accompanied her family in paying respects and honoring their ancestors through memorial rituals. Amidst the traditional ceremonies, the immersive VR experience from the previous day occasionally resurfaced in her mind, sparking scattered reflections on future leisure activities.

events.name: Family Qingming Festival Tomb Sweeping
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei, along with her husband Zhang Weiming and mother Chen Meiling, took their two children to the Chinese Permanent Cemetery in Kowloon for Qingming tomb-sweeping. They cleaned the tombstones of their ancestors, offered flowers, and silently paid their respects before the graves. Yu Xiaowei took this opportunity to teach the children about family traditions and the importance of filial piety.

events.name: Family dinner
events.description: After the tomb-sweeping, the whole family gathered for a meal at a nearby restaurant, enjoying a sumptuous Cantonese feast that included roasted meat platter and wonton noodles. Yu Xiaowei ate a little more than usual due to the festive atmosphere.

events.name: Reflecting on the VR Experience
events.description: After returning from the tomb-sweeping, during her spare time at work and while doing household chores, Yu Xiaowei still occasionally recalled the awe and relaxation brought by yesterday's virtual journey. She began to vaguely consider that such high-tech devices might become a new way to help urban dwellers relieve stress and achieve a "mental escape" in the future.

events.name: Going to bed early due to fatigue.
events.description: In the evening, exhausted from the tomb-sweeping activities, Yu Xiaowei went to bed early, skipping her usual nighttime routine.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Solemn, with a remembrance of ancestors.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Calm, slightly contemplative, with a hint of satisfaction from the gathering.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the second day of the Qingming Festival holiday, a tremor shook the family. The discovery of their son's declining academic performance struck like an alarm bell, shattering Yu Xiaowei's illusion that she could "balance everything" and plunging her into deep self-blame and reflection. In the face of this family crisis, marathon training preparations and financial management operations faded into the background.

events.name: Pre-race easy recovery run
events.description: Entering the tapering week before the half marathon. In the early morning, Yu Xiaowei went for a light 5-kilometer recovery run near her home, primarily to maintain her condition rather than for training.

events.name: Final verification of the event arrangements with fellow runners.
events.description: After the run, Yu Xiaowei met with her running friend Shen Peiwen at a cafe. They carefully reviewed the procedures for the race day, including the meeting point, transportation, and equipment checklist (running shoes, bib number, energy gels, etc.), offering each other encouragement to ease their pre-race nerves.

events.name: Checking my son's homework, I was shocked to discover a decline in his academic performance.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei was checking her son Zhang Zixuan’s homework and recent test papers in the study at home. She was shocked to discover that her son’s math and English grades had noticeably declined compared to the previous semester. There were several careless mistakes on the test papers, and the child seemed distracted while doing his homework, unwilling to communicate with her. Recalling the feedback from the homeroom teacher at last week’s parent-teacher meeting, she was filled with self-blame and anxiety.

events.name: Stress Eating
events.description: Due to anxiety, Yu Xiaowei ate some snacks in the afternoon, including Hong Kong-style milk tea and pineapple buns, as a form of emotional release.

events.name: Late-night communication with husband about family crisis.
events.description: In the evening, after the children had fallen asleep, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming had an in-depth conversation in the living room about their son's declining academic performance and changes in his personality. With a choked voice, she expressed her guilt over having neglected their child's studies recently due to her busy schedule caring for her mother. Zhang Weiming also shared his observations of their child's low spirits and reluctance to talk after school. Together, they analyzed the situation and concluded that the family's long-term focus on the grandmother's recovery might have made the child feel neglected. They began discussing the need to adjust their family responsibilities, with Yu Xiaowei committing to carve out more time to accompany and tutor their son.

events.name: Set up a medical-themed fund for regular investment.
events.description: In the heavy atmosphere at home, driven by deeper concerns about health risks, Yu Xiaowei logged into the HSBC app and found a global healthcare industry-themed fund she had previously researched. She set up an automatic investment plan to deduct 2,000 Hong Kong dollars on the 10th of each month. After confirming the deduction account and acknowledging the risk warnings, she completed the process, viewing it as a long-term action to prepare for her family's future health needs.

events.name: Complete the online course learning phase.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei briefly reviewed her three-month intensive online learning phase in Mandarin and insurance knowledge, summarizing her progress and shortcomings while considering how to apply what she had learned in her future work. However, at this moment, the joy of this achievement had been overshadowed by family worries.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Holiday relaxation, with a slight pre-game excitement.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Heavy-hearted, self-reproachful, filled with anxiety and reflection, slightly fatigued from staying up late.

2025-04.daily_overview: Amidst the aftermath of yesterday's family earthquake, Yu Xiaowei actively sought solutions. In the morning, she adjusted herself through rehabilitation exercises, engaged in open communication with her mother during the day to gain support, and rationally planned the details of a tentative investment with her husband. Sharing a VR experience with her close friend became a rare and lighthearted interlude in her day.

events.name: Morning Mind-Body Practice
events.description: On Sunday morning, while her family was still resting, Yu Xiaowei performed her third rehabilitative stretching and mindfulness breathing exercise of the week in the living room. She felt some relief from the stiffness in her shoulders and neck. During the mindfulness breathing phase, she focused intently on sensing subtle changes in her body, trying to view this practice as an active way to manage her stress and strain.

events.name: Communicate openly and honestly with your mother.
events.description: After breakfast, Yu Xiaowei had a heart-to-heart talk with her mother, Chen Meiling, on the balcony. She candidly explained how she had discovered that her son's studies were being affected and the immense pressure she felt from being pulled in too many directions. Upon hearing this, her mother was very understanding. Feeling for her daughter, she proactively suggested trying to reduce some non-essential companionship, allowing Yu Xiaowei more time to tutor her child. She even proposed considering hiring a part-time helper to share some of the household chores, so that Yu Xiaowei wouldn’t have to carry all the burdens herself.

events.name: Sharing VR Experience with My Best Friend
events.description: In the afternoon, during her routine video call with her close friend Lin Jiaxin, Yu Xiaowei temporarily set aside her worries and excitedly described in detail her experience and feelings from trying the Apple Vision Pro a few days earlier. The two of them discussed with great interest how technology is reshaping the future of leisure and stress relief.

events.name: Rational Planning for Tentative Investment
events.description: Over the weekend, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming reviewed their family's monthly income and expenditure statement. After careful calculation, they confirmed that they could consistently set aside 500 Hong Kong dollars each month as trial investment funds without affecting their family's normal life. Yu Xiaowei clarified that the main purpose of this small fixed investment was to address potential future family health risks through long-term, small-scale, and diversified accumulation, rather than engaging in short-term speculation. This rational planning process gave her a renewed sense of control.

events.name: Begin insurance proposal preparation (cross-day event initiation)
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei began preparing a detailed home insurance proposal for an important client, planning to complete it over the course of several days.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
起始状态.心情: Worries remain, but the decision is made to act.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Compared to yesterday, it was slightly calmer, with a preliminary course of action and the support of my mother.

She sincerely explained the recent busyness in the family due to the elderly's recovery, as well as the changes she had noticed in her child's academic performance and emotions. She expressed her hope to schedule a detailed face-to-face meeting to gain more insight into her child's situation at school and seek the teacher's professional advice, aiming to foster home-school collaboration in supporting the child.

events.name: Continue preparing the insurance proposal (cross-day event)

events.name: Family dinner sharing tech anecdotes

This sparked a brief family discussion on virtual reality and future technology, injecting a fresh breath of air into the otherwise somewhat dull family atmosphere.

events.name: Handle online customer inquiries
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei responded to several clients' online inquiries, primarily addressing questions related to policy anniversary reviews and simple product matters. She noted down the complex needs and prepared to schedule face-to-face meetings.

events.description: In the evening, Lin Jiaxin, a close friend, unexpectedly invited Yu Xiaowei for an online chat. The two discussed parenting education, during which Yu Xiaowei shared several new ideas, causing their bedtime to be delayed.

2025-04.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowei began systematically restructuring the order of family life. She drafted a new weekly family schedule, redistributing time and responsibilities. Meanwhile, the formal conclusion of her personal learning phase and her commitment to morning rehabilitation exercises both signaled her attempt to establish a new stable structure amidst the chaos.

events.name: Morning Rehabilitation Exercises
events.description: On a weekday morning, Yu Xiaowei woke up half an hour earlier than usual to do her rehabilitation exercises. While stretching, she paid special attention to the error-prone postures emphasized by the physical therapist, ensuring each movement was performed correctly. Mindful breathing helped her clear away anxious thoughts about household matters, allowing her to build up mental energy for the busy sales day ahead.

events.name: Complete online courses and summarize.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei completed a three-month online Mandarin course and passed the final online test. She organized the study notes and key product knowledge points from the entire learning period, wrote a brief personal learning summary report, assessed her progress and areas that still need improvement, and prepared for subsequent work applications.

events.name: Draft a new family weekly schedule
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei used a computer and a calendar in the study to draft a new family weekly schedule. The plan reallocated the time and responsibilities for herself, her husband Zhang Weiming, and her mother Chen Meiling. It clearly designated fixed time slots each day for her to tutor her son with his homework and outlined weekend family activities aimed at balancing elder care, children’s education, and personal work.

events.name: Try bringing your own lunch box to cope with the charges.
events.description: When ordering takeout at noon, Yu Xiaowei thought of the ongoing charge for plastic containers. She tried washing a reusable container at home and brought her own container when ordering a double portion of roast meat takeout, successfully avoiding a 1 Hong Kong dollar fee. Although it was somewhat inconvenient to carry, she felt it was both a small saving and environmentally friendly.

events.name: Complete Insurance Proposal (End of Cross-Day Event)
events.description: After several days of hard work, Yu Xiaowei finally completed the insurance proposal for the important client and prepared to submit it the next day.

Based on their current physical condition and fitness levels, they collaboratively developed a 12-week, low-intensity training plan aimed at maintaining basic fitness and promoting relaxation. The plan outlined a flexible goal of two morning runs per week, along with one longer weekend training session.

events.description: After participating in an online insurance product seminar and reflecting on her recent family experiences, Yu Xiaowei began planning to update the family protection plans for several close long-term clients, focusing on how to more persuasively supplement their coverage for critical illnesses and hospitalization medical expenses.

events.name: The Cantonese embroidery project lays the groundwork.

The morning heart-to-heart with my best friend provided emotional support and practical advice, while the afternoon parent-child jog with my son successfully broke down barriers and rebuilt a close connection. events.name: Having afternoon tea and a heart-to-heart chat with my best friend Lin Jiaxin.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei went to Kowloon Tong to have afternoon tea with her close friend Lin Jiaxin. She recounted in detail the long-term stress caused by her mother's illness, as well as her feelings of guilt and helplessness upon discovering her son's declining academic performance. Overwhelmed with emotion, she couldn't help but shed tears. Lin Jiaxin listened patiently and, drawing from her teaching experience, suggested that Yu Xiaowei arrange more non-academic activities with her son—such as sports or games—to improve their parent-child relationship, rather than focusing solely on tutoring. The two also caught up on the recent situation of their mutual friend Huang Wenhui. By the end of the gathering, Yu Xiaowei had calmed down significantly, and they agreed to try organizing a video call for the three of them next month.

She deliberately slowed her pace, patiently staying by her son’s side, encouraging him while jogging and sharing her own joy of running. After completing a roughly 3-kilometer jog, the mother and son rested on a bench and had some snacks. The son excitedly talked about his school’s soccer team, and Yu Xiaowei listened attentively. 2025-05.daily_overview: During the May Day Labor Day holiday, Yu Xiaowei chose to spend time at home, balancing personal development with family moments. In the morning, she focused on self-planning, while the afternoon was dedicated to enjoying a family picnic and the festive atmosphere.

events.name: Develop a Mandarin and Sales Script Learning Plan
events.description: Considering the need to develop clients in the Greater Bay Area, Yu Xiaowei spent the morning in her study searching online and comparing several well-known Mandarin learning apps and online courses tailored for business professionals. Drawing from common scenarios and vocabulary encountered in her insurance sales work, she drafted a preliminary two-and-a-half-month learning plan, committing to half an hour of study each day. She also downloaded the two highest-rated apps for a trial run.

events.name: Monthly Family Financial Summary and Budget Fine-tuning
events.description: Taking advantage of the holiday break, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming conducted a brief financial review in the living room. She presented the household expense records for April and the deposit receipts for the emergency fund. They discussed the challenges in budget execution, such as the unexpected increase in extracurricular activity fees for their child's school. Together, they made slight adjustments to the budget plan for May, deciding to exercise a bit more control over entertainment expenses to better handle uncertainties.

The morning was dedicated to organizing and studying, while the afternoon saw the successful selection of a part-time caregiver.

events.name: Start learning Mandarin online courses.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei began her first day of Mandarin learning as planned. She studied basic pinyin and tones through an online course, focusing on practicing the pronunciation of insurance-related terms such as "policy," "coverage," "claims," "beneficiary," and common greeting phrases. She took detailed notes in a dedicated notebook, marking her pronunciation challenges for future reference.

events.name: The whole family mobilizes to organize the storage room.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming worked together to clean out the storage room in their home. They sorted through years of accumulated old clothes, outdated books, and various miscellaneous items, carefully packing and sealing boxes of items that were no longer needed but still in good condition, preparing them for donation. Under their parents’ guidance, their son Zhang Zixuan and daughter Zhang Yuxin also tidied up their own rooms, sorting out some toys and children’s books.

events.name: Final interview and selection of part-time caregivers.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei met with the second caregiver candidate, Auntie Wang. Not only did Auntie Wang have extensive experience in caring for the elderly, but she also communicated in a gentle and patient tone. Additionally, she was available every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday afternoon, which perfectly matched the schedule. Yu Xiaowei explained her mother’s daily habits and precautions in detail and specifically took her home to briefly meet with her mother, Chen Meiling. Observing the natural interaction between her mother and Auntie Wang, Yu Xiaowei was already inclined to choose her. After the interview, she and Auntie Wang tentatively agreed on the service arrangement.

events.name: Informing the younger brother about the progress of the caregiver.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei sent a voice message via WeChat to her younger brother Yu Xiaofeng in Shenzhen, informing him that she had interviewed a good nanny today, and their mother's reaction was acceptable. She thanked him for his previous suggestion and asked him not to worry.

2025-05.daily_overview: Weekend Family Outing Day, Yu Xiaowei and her family took the high-speed train to Shenzhen to reunite with her brother's family. The journey was interspersed with invitations from close friends, hinting at the excitement of the coming week.

events.name: High-speed Rail Trip to Shenzhen for a Family Gathering
events.description: Yu Xiaowei and her family took the high-speed train from Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Shenzhen North Station early in the morning. Her younger brother Yu Xiaofeng and his family were already waiting at the station. After the two families reunited, they first headed to the pre-booked hotel to check in and settle their luggage. The children immediately started playing together as soon as they met.

events.name: Family Cantonese Dinner Gathering
events.description: The two families had dinner together at an authentic Cantonese restaurant in Shenzhen. During the meal, Yu Xiaowei and her younger brother shared their recent work and life updates in Hong Kong and Shenzhen, while their mother, Chen Meiling, and her in-laws also had a very engaging conversation. Looking at the lively dining table, Yu Xiaowei felt a long-lost, pure sense of family joy, though she indulged a bit too much in the food.

events.name: My best friend highly recommended the musical and finalized the itinerary.
events.description: After returning to the hotel room after dinner, Yu Xiaowei received a call from her close friend Lin Jiaxin. Lin Jiaxin highly recommended the musical "Cats," which was about to be performed at the Hong Kong Cultural Centre, and enthusiastically invited her to watch it together. Recalling that she hadn't experienced high art for a long time, Yu Xiaowei gladly agreed. The two decided on the show on the evening of May 10th, with Lin Jiaxin taking charge of checking ticket information and making a preliminary seat selection.

events.name: Evening Mandarin Reading Practice
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei opened the learning app in her hotel room, reviewed the pinyin she had learned during the day, and practiced a few simple dialogues to ensure her study plan wasn’t interrupted by the trip.

events.name: The child has mild discomfort and goes to bed early for care.
events.description: After the outing, Zhang Yuxin felt tired and had a slight cough. Yu Xiaowei arranged for her to rest early and went to bed early herself to maintain her energy.

Teacher Wu patiently explained how to create a sense of perspective through the direction of the stitches and the depth of colors, which made everything clear to Yu Xiaowei.

2025-05.daily_overview: The workday brought several key decision points. On the family front, I successfully persuaded my mother to try a caregiver through a formal meeting. In terms of personal goals, I carefully evaluated and decided to restart half-marathon training. Outside of work, I efficiently finalized the selection of a caregiver.

events.name: Hold a family meeting to decide to try part-time caregiving.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei gathered her husband and parents in the living room for a formal family meeting. She conveyed her brother’s suggestion and explained the necessity of hiring a caregiver to alleviate her mother’s burden and ensure the quality of life for the entire family. Initially, her mother, Chen Meiling, opposed the idea, fearing it would trouble outsiders and worrying about the cost. After patient persuasion from Yu Xiaowei, Zhang Weiming, and her father, Yu Guoqiang, her mother eventually agreed to a trial arrangement of part-time caregiver services three times a week, each session lasting half a day. The meeting clarified the caregiver’s main responsibilities and preliminary schedule.

events.name: Final confirmation to hire Aunt Wang.
events.description: After the family meeting, Yu Xiaowei immediately confirmed the final details with Aunt Wang over the phone: home visits would take place from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, including activities such as companionship and conversation, assistance with light activities, and preparing afternoon tea and snacks. Both parties agreed on an hourly wage and decided on a two-week trial period. Yu Xiaowei then informed her mother and husband of the decision.

events.name: Research on Half Marathon Events
events.description: During a break at work during the day, Yu Xiaowei used her phone to check the official website of the Hong Kong Half Marathon, carefully reviewing details such as the registration period, race route, and cut-off times. She reflected on her recent running records, assessed her family and work commitments for the next few months, and confirmed that she would have enough time for systematic training.

events.name: Consult a coach to obtain a training plan framework.
events.description: After making up her mind, Yu Xiaowei contacted her marathon coach Zhao Zhiming via WhatsApp to inform him of her plan to sign up for the autumn half marathon. Coach Zhao quickly replied, sending her a basic four-month training plan framework for reference and encouraging her to progress step by step.

events.name: Daily Customer Follow-up and Policy Processing
events.description: As a workday, Yu Xiaowei handled renewal reminders for several expiring insurance policies, followed up with a potential client's inquiry via phone, and scheduled a weekend meeting.

events.name: Fluctuating emotions due to stress lead to early bedtime.
events.description: The pressure from the family meeting led to a somewhat low mood, so Yu Xiaowei chose to go to bed early to adjust her state, neglecting the originally planned exercise.

2025-05.daily_overview: A pivotal day for upgrading the family support system. Part-time caregiver Aunt Wang made her first home visit, and my mother gradually moved from being reserved to accepting her, marking the beginning of a new chapter in the family care model.

events.name: Part-time caregiver's first home visit service
events.description: In the afternoon, Auntie Wang, the caregiver, arrived for her first home visit as scheduled. Yu Xiaowei had taken half a day off to be at home with her. She provided Auntie Wang with a detailed introduction to the home environment, her mother’s daily routine, and specific needs. Initially, her mother, Chen Meiling, appeared reserved and somewhat embarrassed. However, under Auntie Wang’s gentle, respectful communication and skilled assistance, she gradually relaxed and accepted the services of companionship and assistance in preparing afternoon tea. The entire process lasted about three hours, and the atmosphere was harmonious.

events.name: Post-Service Communication and Fine-Tuning
events.description: After the caregiver service concluded, Yu Xiaowei first privately asked her mother about her impressions of Aunt Wang's service attitude and methods. Her mother said it was better than expected, noting, "She is quick and efficient, speaks politely, and is acceptable." Subsequently, Yu Xiaowei had a brief conversation with Aunt Wang, thanking her for the first service. Based on her mother's feedback, she made minor adjustments to some details in the subsequent services, such as preferences for the types of afternoon tea snacks.

events.name: Notify family members about the caregiver service situation.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei informed her husband Zhang Weiming and her father Yu Guoqiang about the overall situation of the caregiver's first visit, including her mother's acceptance and Aunt Wang's performance. The family was relieved to hear this, considering it a good start that alleviated some of the pressure of home care, and they decided to continue observing.

2025-05.daily_overview: A day of both harvest and planning. Work was efficiently handled, addressing client issues and generating considerable income; personal learning achieved a milestone; a crucial step was taken in family financial planning, and a broader perspective on wealth management was discussed with my younger brother.

events.name: Efficiently handle customer claims inquiries
events.description: Yu Xiaowei received a WeChat call from Wang Qiming, a client in Shenzhen, inquiring about the claims process for the hospitalization medical insurance of one of his company's executives. She patiently guided him over the phone regarding the required documents and immediately contacted the company's claims department for preliminary review and communication. Subsequently, she sent a clear step-by-step checklist and important notes to Mr. Wang via WeChat, quickly and efficiently resolving the client's concerns and earning his appreciation.

events.name: Complete the online examination for the Elementary Mandarin course.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei concentrated in the quiet study room to take the final online exam offered by the Mandarin learning app. Thanks to her persistent study over the past month, she passed smoothly and received an electronic certificate of completion, which boosted her confidence in expanding the Mandarin-speaking customer market.

events.name: Received quarterly commission and bonus.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei received a deposit notification via her mobile banking app, confirming that a total of approximately HKD 80,000 in commissions and performance bonuses had been credited to her personal HSBC account. After reviewing the detailed deposit breakdown, her lingering worries finally dissipated, as this income served as a direct reward for her hard work in the previous quarter.

events.name: Plan bonus distribution and establish a family medical fund.
events.description: After receiving the payment, Yu Xiaowei immediately took action. She logged into her online banking account and transferred 30,000 Hong Kong dollars into the joint family account she shared with her husband, which would be used to cover next month's mortgage and daily expenses. At the same time, she decided to set aside 20,000 Hong Kong dollars as the initial capital for the "Family Medical and Emergency Special Fund." She discussed this idea with her husband and received his support.

events.name: Discussing family asset allocation with my younger brother.
events.description: Subsequently, Yu Xiaowei proactively initiated a video call with her younger brother, Yu Xiaofeng, to discuss family asset allocation. Yu Xiaofeng shared insights into the financial management approaches of middle-class families in mainland China, advising his sister that, in addition to insurance and real estate, she might consider allocating a portion of her savings in batches to some stable funds or bond products to achieve asset preservation and appreciation. Yu Xiaowei listened attentively to the suggestions, inquired about relevant basic concepts and risks, and decided to conduct further research afterward.

events.name: Selecting a birthday gift for my best friend
events.description: Thinking of her close friend Lin Jiaxin's upcoming birthday and her own busy schedule, Yu Xiaowei decided against hosting a party and instead opted to send a carefully chosen gift. Considering Lin Jiaxin's profession as a teacher and her elegant demeanor, Yu Xiaowei browsed an online store and found a scarf with a simple design and high-quality texture. She added it to her shopping cart, planning to purchase it the next day.

2025-05.daily_overview: Weekday. Yu Xiaowei spent her time balancing her mother's recovery with adjusting her work pace, handling family matters and feeling slightly busy due to the initiation of new habits. Her state shifted from coping with stress to proactive planning, but she stayed up slightly late due to researching caregiver services late into the night.

events.name: Research and select portable eco-friendly cups.
events.description: Inspired by her runner friend Shen Peiwen's daily use of a portable cup and considering the upcoming waste charging policy, Yu Xiaowei spent her lunch break searching online for information. She compared brands on several local e-commerce platforms in Hong Kong and ultimately chose a set of stainless steel cups and foldable utensils with a simple design and excellent insulation. She believed this would not only reduce the waste and expense of buying milk tea in disposable paper cups every day but also align with her practical nature and focus on social identity.

events.name: Apply to the supervisor for a flexible work arrangement.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei informed her supervisor Liang Zhenhua via the company's internal communication software that her mother was in a critical period of recovery and required more time for home care. She requested to reduce the frequency of client visits over the next two weeks, opting instead to work from home more often, handling existing clients' policy services and follow-ups through phone calls and online meetings. Liang Zhenhua, aware of her family situation, promptly approved her request and advised her to prioritize her family.

events.name: Schedule a follow-up appointment for mother.
events.description: After returning home from work, Yu Xiaowei used her phone to schedule a follow-up appointment with the family doctor, Zhou Wenbin, for her mother, Chen Meiling. The appointment was set for a morning several days later. She explained the arrangements to her mother, who agreed to cooperate.

events.name: Evening Family Communication
events.description: During dinner, Yu Xiaowei informed her husband Zhang Weiming and her mother about her application for flexible work arrangements and the scheduled follow-up appointment. Zhang Weiming expressed his support and proactively offered to take on more household chores and handle the children's school drop-offs and pick-ups next week. Her mother felt a bit uneasy about it, but Yu Xiaowei reassured her, saying that this was a phase they would all get through together as a family.

events.name: Personal Stretching and Relaxation
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei performed 20 minutes of yoga stretching on the living room mat, focusing on relaxing her tense shoulders and neck caused by prolonged sitting and stress. This was part of her foundational recovery before resuming regular exercise.

events.name: Researching caregiver service details late into the night.
events.description: Concerned about the caregiver arrangements, Yu Xiaowei spent extra time in the evening browsing online reviews and examining the details of the caregiver service contract. This caused her to stay up later than planned, but it laid the groundwork for the subsequent arrangements.

Yu Xiaowei made fragrant popcorn using a frying pan in the kitchen, while her mother, Chen Meiling, helped arrange snacks and drinks on the coffee table.

The children were captivated by the plot, occasionally bursting into laughter; Zhang Weiming and Yu Xiaowei were also immersed in the lighthearted storyline; the grandmother, Chen Meiling, felt deeply gratified seeing her grandchildren so happy. The entire living room was filled with a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Family Communication After Watching a Movie

While tidying up, Yu Xiaowei felt a sense of inner satisfaction.
