2025-05.daily_overview: Day Off. A day of complex thoughts, due to the previous night's gathering and reflections on family finances, Yu Xiaowei experienced a slight headache and went to bed early. While planning her best friend's birthday, she felt the pressure of reality, but gained new information and inspiration through conversations with her younger brother and embroidery friends. Personal time was spent on embroidery, phone calls, and contemplation.

events.name: Thinking of my best friend's birthday and the dilemma I'm facing.
events.description: While organizing her work schedule for the next week in the study room in the morning, Yu Xiaowei flipped through her phone calendar and suddenly realized that her best friend Lin Jiaxin's birthday (May 22nd) was just a few days away. She recalled the lively celebrations they had shared in previous years, but was quickly pulled back to reality by the exhaustion from recently caring for her mother and the family's slightly strained finances due to medical and caregiver expenses. She remembered having declined an invitation from Lin Jiaxin in March due to a busy workload, and a twinge of guilt rose in her heart, worrying that their friendship might drift apart as a result.

events.name: Consider a compromise celebration plan.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei found herself in a dilemma: she cherished the long-standing friendship and wanted to uphold tradition, yet she felt overwhelmed by the demands on her energy and finances. She began to think pragmatically, wondering if she could replace formal dinners with low-cost but heartfelt alternatives, such as handcrafted gifts or sincere greeting cards. This way, she could convey her blessings without adding to her burdens.

events.name: Discussing financial literacy learning with my best friend Huang Wenhui.
events.description: In the afternoon, after seeing the financial management article shared by Huang Wenhui in her close friends' group chat, she proactively sent a private message to initiate a voice call. Huang Wenhui, considering the trends in the internet industry, suggested that she start researching related funds from the fields she is familiar with, such as healthcare and insurance. She also recommended several high-quality financial public accounts and introductory books, encouraging her to take it step by step.

events.name: Continue the creation of Cantonese embroidery
events.description: After the call, to calm her emotions, Yu Xiaowei took out her unfinished Yue embroidery piece. She settled her mind and, using light blue and pale purple silk threads, meticulously applied fine flat stitches to create a soft foundational base for the sky section of the piece, preparing it for the subsequent embroidery of clouds.

events.name: Consulting younger brother about tech products.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei contacted her younger brother Yu Xiaofeng in Shenzhen via WeChat video call, inquiring in detail about his experience using the Apple Vision Pro. As a technology professional, her brother enthusiastically introduced its advantages, such as immersive entertainment and its applications in certain office scenarios, while also mentioning drawbacks like the high price and the limited availability of early-stage applications. This conversation further piqued her curiosity but also made her more cautious about the expense.

events.name: Going to bed early to adjust due to a mild headache.
events.description: Due to drinking at the party the night before and overthinking throughout the day, Yu Xiaowei experienced a slight headache and decided to rest early to regain energy and prepare for the upcoming week's work.

2025-05.daily_overview: Weekday (Wedding Anniversary). This is a special day spent in simplicity and deep affection. Due to the anniversary dinner, there was a slight weight gain from consuming more food. Yu Xiaowei and her husband commemorated their marriage with a home-cooked dinner, and her husband's sincere words provided immense emotional support. At the same time, she continues to make steady progress in both work and personal growth.

events.name: Preparing for the anniversary dinner.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming were busy together in the kitchen. Considering their mother’s need for a light diet and the family’s financial situation, they decided to celebrate at home. They prepared several home-style dishes, including wonton noodles, a mixed roast platter, and stir-fried seasonal vegetables—all classic Hong Kong-style flavors that both of them loved.

events.name: Sharing a meal and engaging in heartfelt conversation.
events.description: During dinner, Zhang Weiming raised his glass to Yu Xiaowei and said, 'Everyone in the family has worked hard this year, especially you. Being able to sit together safe and healthy is the best gift of the year.' These simple words struck a chord deep within Yu Xiaowei, offering her immense comfort and support amid the months of pressure. As they ate, the couple reminisced about their journey—from getting married in 2010, buying a home, raising children, to navigating career transitions.

events.name: Reaching Consensus on Anniversary and Future Plans
events.description: After dinner, they continued chatting in the living room. Both agreed that the current focus of the family was their mother's recovery, so they decided not to have any extra celebrations or give expensive gifts this year. They made a plan to make up for it with a short trip once their mother's health stabilizes—perhaps visiting their younger brother's family in Shenzhen or spending a weekend in Macau to relax.

events.name: Share the decision with mother.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei went to her mother's room and shared the conversation and agreement she had with her husband during dinner. Upon hearing this, her mother felt very relieved. She held her daughter's hand and said, "Seeing you and your husband united puts my mind at ease. I will cooperate fully, recover quickly, and not delay your plans to go out and have fun."

events.name: Consulting colleagues on professional questions

Guo Junwei professionally and patiently explained the core terms and advantages of the new product, helping her refine the proposal.

She sees it as a reward for her recent hard work and dedication to family responsibilities, and she looks forward to the new entertainment experiences it will bring, hoping it will help her relax.

However, he has occasionally been distracted in class recently, and his mood does not seem as high as before. The teacher suggested that parents pay more attention to this.

events.name: Reflect and hold a family meeting.

After dinner, she held a family meeting with her husband Zhang Weiming and her mother Chen Meiling to share the teacher's observations.

Additionally, we plan to arrange a relaxing parent-child outdoor activity this weekend to improve the family atmosphere.

She shared the plan with the children, who cheered with excitement.

They clarified the division of responsibilities during her mother’s recovery period: her father would primarily handle simple daytime companionship and grocery shopping, Zhang Weiming would take charge of the main household chores and daily transportation of the children, while Yu Xiaowei would lead financial matters, medical arrangements, and weekend family activity planning, with nursing care serving as an important supplement. After the roles were clearly defined, everyone felt a clearer sense of the responsibilities on their shoulders.

This was her first official run since she had set up her training plan, and she felt her body was readjusting. Although the pace was not fast, she felt refreshed both physically and mentally after the run.

As they ran, they chatted—Shen Peiwen shared a new running route, while Yu Xiaowei talked about her recent family updates and feelings about resuming training.

After a thorough examination, Dr. Zhou Wenbin confirmed that the fracture had healed well and that her mother could gradually increase her activity level. He also provided specific recommendations for home rehabilitation exercises. This news brought great joy to both mother and daughter.

The children ran and played on the grass, while Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming sat chatting leisurely—a rare moment of relaxation. The mother watched her grandchildren with joy, and the family atmosphere was relaxed and pleasant.

2025-05.daily_overview: Workday (Working from Home). Today marks a significant day for upgrading family financial management. A video conference led to the decision to establish a family medical fund, taking a crucial step toward systematic planning. Meanwhile, personal progress in investment learning and the implementation of interest-driven projects continued in parallel, with late nights spent on meetings and project work.

events.name: Hold a family financial planning video conference.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei, her husband Zhang Weiming, and her brother Yu Xiaofeng held a three-way video call. Yu Xiaowei presented the income and expenditure data, analyzing new rigid expenses such as those for caregivers. After discussion, they unanimously decided to allocate 50,000 Hong Kong dollars from the family savings to establish a family medical special fund, which will be used to cover future expenses related to family health and care. The meeting clarified the division of responsibilities: Yu Xiaowei is responsible for contacting financial advisors and paying caregiver fees, Zhang Weiming is tasked with organizing the family's existing insurance documents, and Yu Xiaofeng will provide reference information on financial management in the mainland market.

events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei mentioned to Zhang Weiming her idea of learning about fund investments, explaining the suggestions from her younger brother and close friend. Zhang Weiming was cautious but supportive, recommending that she start by investing a small amount of money each month through regular contributions. He emphasized that under no circumstances should she use the family’s emergency funds or the recently established medical fund. The two reached a preliminary consensus on the matter.

Lin Jiaxin listened patiently, offering comfort and reassurance, affirming that she had already done a great job and suggesting that she allow herself moments of mental rest. This heart-to-heart conversation provided her with a much-needed emotional release.

2025-06.daily_overview: During the Dragon Boat Festival holiday, Yu Xiaowei spent her day efficiently handling family financial matters and enjoying a warm family gathering. She demonstrated excellent multitasking skills, quickly renewing her car insurance in the morning to save on expenses, and in the evening, preparing and enjoying a festive dinner with her family, savoring the reunion atmosphere of the traditional holiday. However, amidst the busy schedule, her recurring habits were exposed, and her weight increased due to the gatherings.

events.name: Efficiently handle car insurance renewal.
events.description: When Yu Xiaowei received the renewal reminder text message from the insurance company in the morning, she was helping her mother prepare lunch. She immediately noted it in her phone's memo. During her lunch break, she quickly compared quotes from three major insurance companies on her office computer and found that leveraging the family's multi-year no-claims discount and the online renewal discount offered by her current insurer was the most cost-effective option. She promptly called the customer service hotline to confirm the details and completed the online payment within 15 minutes, successfully saving about 10% on her premium. Afterward, she archived the electronic policy.

events.name: Family Dragon Boat Festival Dinner and Gathering
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei finished work early and returned home. In the kitchen, her husband Zhang Weiming and mother Chen Meiling were already busy. Yu Xiaowei joined in, taking charge of cooking a few of her signature stir-fry dishes, while Zhang Weiming assisted, and her mother picked vegetables on the side, offering guidance on how to steam the zongzi better. As the family prepared dinner together, they chatted about daily life and amusing work stories, filling the kitchen with the warmth of home and laughter. During dinner, all six family members gathered around the dining table, where the dishes were plentiful, and naturally, the table featured the savory pork zongzi made by the mother. In high spirits, the mother shared many amusing stories from her youth celebrating the Dragon Boat Festival in her hometown. The children listened with great interest, while Yu Xiaowei and her husband enjoyed a rare sense of relaxation and warmth.

events.name: Conducting a family financial summary with my husband.
events.description: After dinner, the children accompanied their grandparents in the living room watching TV. While tidying up in the kitchen with her husband, Yu Xiaowei mentioned the successful renewal of the insurance policy that morning and the premium savings. Seizing the opportunity, the couple briefly assessed the effects of introducing caregiver services over the past half month. They both agreed that although the new monthly fixed expense was significant, it greatly alleviated the family’s caregiving burden. This allowed Yu Xiaowei to focus more on her work and training while ensuring her mother received more professional care, making it a worthwhile long-term investment.

events.name: The Minor Setback of Forgetting to Bring a Reusable Cup
events.description: On her way to work in the morning, Yu Xiaowei wanted to buy a cup of Hong Kong-style milk tea at the tea restaurant downstairs from her office to refresh herself. However, when she reached the counter, she realized once again that she had forgotten to put the cleaned portable cup into her commuter bag. Reluctantly, she bought a disposable cup and sipped the tea while reminding herself to remember it tomorrow.

events.name: Received confirmation of completion for the Mandarin course.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei received an email from the course platform on her phone, notifying her that she had successfully completed all the courses and passed the assessment, and that the electronic certificate of completion was now available for download. This long-awaited recognition brought her a sense of accomplishment and relief after a busy day.

events.name: Weight gain due to dining out

Her focus was clearly directed toward the Greater Bay Area market, meticulously preparing for the upcoming renewal of key clients on one hand, while actively expanding new professional connections on the other, showcasing her ambition in business development after the easing of family pressures. At the same time, her weight continued to increase due to the previous day's gathering.

events.name: Obtain Mainland Financial Information Reference
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei received a WeChat file from her younger brother Yu Xiaofeng in Shenzhen, which contained some introductions to stable financial products offered by mainland banks and channels such as reverse repurchase agreements for government bonds. Her brother left a message saying it was for her to broaden her horizons and understand the financial management options available to ordinary families on the mainland. After briefly reviewing the content, Yu Xiaowei archived it as knowledge to be used in future interactions with clients from mainland backgrounds.

events.description: Through an active industry communication WeChat group, Yu Xiaowei proactively added Xu Jiaming, who is engaged in independent financial planning in Shenzhen, as a friend. In a brief exchange of greetings, she introduced her professional expertise in AIA Hong Kong's insurance business, while Xu Jiaming shared his experience in serving high-net-worth clients in the Greater Bay Area. Both parties expressed their intention to engage in cross-border exchanges and complementary cooperation in the future.

events.name: Make in-depth preparations for the renewal of key clients.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei focused her efforts in the office, preparing for tomorrow's contract renewal discussion with Mr. Wang Qiming, a client from Shenzhen. She pulled up all the existing insurance policies for the senior management team of Mr. Wang's company, reviewing the service records and claims from the past year. At the same time, she focused on studying the company's newly launched, upgraded version of the high-end medical insurance product plan, which particularly strengthens cross-border medical services in the Greater Bay Area. She meticulously prepared comparative data between the old and new plans and, considering Mr. Wang's frequent travel between Shenzhen and Hong Kong, drafted personalized key points for the upgrade recommendations.

events.name: Overtime to handle urgent customer inquiries

She hopes to cultivate the habit with the help of external forces.

events.description: In the early morning, Yu Xiaowei and Shen Peiwen gathered near Kowloon Tong Park and embarked on an endurance run lasting about 90 minutes and covering nearly 15 kilometers, as planned by their coach Zhao Zhiming. Maintaining a steady pace, they chatted about their recent training experiences and family matters while running, encouraging each other along the way. In the end, both successfully achieved their training goals.

This time, Yu Xiaowei remembered to bring her portable cup. She bought Hong Kong-style milk tea using her own cup and proudly showed it off to Shen Peiwen. As they sipped their tea, they continued chatting, moving from running gear to children's education, feeling completely relaxed.

She compared the historical performance, fund managers, and portfolios of three to four Hong Kong and A-share healthcare-themed funds, taking careful notes. Ultimately, she narrowed down her choices to two funds that focus on innovative drugs and medical devices, both of which have a relatively stable investment style, as her top candidates.

She informed her husband of this decision and began studying the specific operational procedures on the bank's app.

During a break at work, she searched for a seaside meditation retreat on Lantau Island through a mobile app and eventually selected a quiet and highly-rated homestay. She made an online reservation for a two-day, one-night stay from June 14th to 15th (over the weekend). After checking the transportation routes, she informed her family about her weekend travel plans.

As they browsed, her mother recounted the stories behind each photo: Yu Xiaowei and her younger brother’s childhood antics, her parents’ wedding photos, and joyful family outings. Yu Xiaowei deeply felt the warmth of family memories and the significance of passing them down, and the bond between mother and daughter grew even stronger through the reminiscing. After they finished, she carefully wiped the albums clean and placed them in a more prominent spot on the living room bookshelf.

Conversely, if Yu Xiaowei’s clients in Hong Kong had investment needs in mainland China, she could refer them to him. The two engaged in a preliminary discussion on this model of "complementary strengths and client sharing" and both felt it had potential.

Shortly after, Xu Jiaming also replied with an introduction to his personal qualifications and areas of expertise. This formal "exchange of information" marked the beginning of a more substantive stage in their collaborative discussions.

2025-06.daily_overview: On Friday, Yu Xiaowei made final preparations for her upcoming personal retreat weekend. She efficiently handled urgent tasks at hand and communicated weekend arrangements with her family, demonstrating strong time management and communication skills. This ensured she could temporarily step away from her multiple roles and enjoy pure solitude. Her weight had slightly increased due to work-related stress.

events.name: Make work arrangements for the retreat weekend.
events.description: To ensure an undisturbed weekend retreat, Yu Xiaowei focused in the morning and efficiently completed several urgent client proposals and documents at hand. She informed her supervisor Liang Zhenhua and several close colleagues via the company's internal communication software that she would be briefly offline on Saturday and Sunday to attend to personal matters, and that they could leave a message if anything urgent arose.

events.name: Communicate weekend plans with family.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowei discussed in detail with her husband Zhang Weiming and her mother Chen Meiling her plan to go to Lantau Island for a two-day retreat over the weekend. Zhang Weiming expressed understanding and support, promising to take care of the children's daily routines and studies over the weekend. Her mother also advised her to relax well and not worry about the family.

events.name: Complete Cross-Day Customer Project
events.description: Successfully delivered an urgent insurance plan for a client, gaining their initial approval and feeling a sense of relief, though staying up late led to a slight weight gain.

2025-06.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowei embarked on her long-planned two-day, one-night personal retreat. On this day, she completely detached herself from her familiar environment and roles, immersing herself in the sea and sky of Lantau Island. Through walking, reading, and pure relaxation, she engaged in deep physical and mental restoration and self-reflection. This was a journey of "spiritual recharging" she actively created for herself, and her weight decreased due to a light diet.

events.name: Arriving at the Lantau Island homestay, entering meditation mode.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei arrived at a seaside homestay on Lantau Island via subway and bus, carrying a simple set of luggage—a change of clothes, a novel, and a yoga mat. After checking in, she familiarized herself with the tranquil surroundings and then solemnly turned off her work phone, keeping only her personal phone for emergencies. With this, she officially began her "offline" retreat mode.

events.name: Beach Walk and Breathing Meditation
events.description: After putting down her luggage, Yu Xiaowei headed to the nearby beach. She walked slowly barefoot on the sand, listening to the rhythmic sound of the waves. She attempted a simple breathing meditation, allowing her thoughts to drift away with the sea breeze. In the vast expanse of sea and sky, her mind and body gradually relaxed and became clear.

events.name: Reading on the Terrace and Letting Thoughts Wander
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei brewed a cup of tea she had brought with her on the sea-facing terrace of the guesthouse and began reading the novel she had carried for a long time but never had the chance to read. She allowed herself to occasionally drift away, simply gazing at the azure sea in the distance and the occasional passing ships, letting her thoughts flow freely without any deliberate control.

events.name: Quietly Observing the Sunset and Deeply Reflecting
events.description: In the evening, she sat alone on a rock with an open view, quietly watching the sunset. In the serene moment when the golden afterglow bathed the sea, she reflected on the family's upheaval over the past month since her mother fell ill—her own stress, the decision to bring in a caregiver, the expansion of her work, and the adjustments to her personal goals. She contemplated how to better balance career, family, and self in the future, and her thoughts grew clearer in solitude.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and expectant, about to embark on a journey of one's own.

结束状态.所处地点: Inside the seaside homestay room on Lantau Island
结束状态.心情: Calm and profound, after a day of solitude and letting go, the heart is filled with tranquility and the clarity that follows reflection.

state.今日运动: We took a walk on the beach for about 45 minutes in the morning.

date_attribute.weather: There was a thin mist in the morning, which later cleared up.

2025-06.daily_overview: On the final half-day of the retreat, Yu Xiaowei maintained the calm state of mind from the previous day while beginning to prepare for her return to daily life. She organized the insights gained during the retreat and, on her way back, started to outline a plan for translating her reflections into action. Upon returning home in the evening, she swiftly shifted into her family role, efficiently organizing a family meeting about her mother's care and household finances, demonstrating a more composed and clear decision-making ability after the retreat. Her weight has been adjusted to a healthy level.

events.name: Morning Meditation and Reflection
events.description: In the early morning, Yu Xiaowei did a brief meditation in her homestay room. Afterwards, she took out her notebook and recorded some fragments of thought from her walk and sunset viewing the day before, mainly about the importance of family support systems, the value of personal time, and new directions for career development.

events.name: Check out and return, maintaining a peaceful state of mind.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei checked out and boarded the bus for her return journey. On the bus, she turned her work phone back on but didn’t immediately check or reply to the backlog of messages. Instead, she continued to savor the sense of peace from her retreat, quietly organizing the priorities for the upcoming week.

events.name: Prepare data for the family meeting.
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon and taking a short rest, Yu Xiaowei organized the various medical and care expense receipts since her mother fell ill in the study. She also compiled the details of the successful cases of optimizing car insurance premiums, preparing clear data and discussion points for the evening family meeting.

events.name: Pre-meeting communication with the husband.
events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming had a brief discussion in the living room regarding the main topics of tonight's family meeting—the trial arrangement for the caregiver, Aunt Li, and the adjustment of the family's monthly budget. They aligned their basic views and expectations on these matters.

events.name: Hold a family video conference
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei, Zhang Weiming, and Yu Xiaofeng, who is in Shenzhen, held a family meeting via video call. As the host, Yu Xiaowei systematically reviewed the expenses during their mother's illness, discussed the necessity of hiring a professional caregiver and the trial arrangement for Aunt Li, and preliminarily planned adjustments to the family budget to accommodate the additional caregiving costs. The meeting was efficient and productive.

events.name: Implement the meeting resolutions and division of responsibilities.
events.description: After the family meeting, Yu Xiaowei recorded the consensus reached and the pending tasks (such as contacting the agency to confirm the details of the caregiver's trial work and adjusting the family's monthly budget) and confirmed each person's division of labor and responsibilities with her husband and younger brother through the family WeChat group.

events.name: Gently inform mother of the family's decision.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei went to her mother’s room and, in a gentle and consultative tone, informed her mother, Chen Meiling, about the family meeting’s decision to hire a caregiver to assist with daily care. She emphasized that this was to ensure her mother received better and more professional care while also making things easier for the family. After hearing this, her mother expressed understanding and was willing to give it a try.

起始状态.所处地点: Inside the seaside guesthouse room on Lantau Island
起始状态.心情: Calm, clear, carrying the fruits of reflection after quiet contemplation.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong, Bedroom at Home
结束状态.心情: Steady and in control, successfully held an efficient family meeting, resolved practical issues, and gained a clearer vision for future arrangements.

2025-06.daily_overview: On Monday, the workweek began for Yu Xiaowei with a cross-regional video conference, focusing on advancing a potential strategic partnership. The meeting was highly effective, laying the groundwork for subsequent in-depth offline interactions and filling her with anticipation for new avenues in her career development. In the evening, she followed her usual routine of having dinner with her family, catching up on her children’s day of learning and activities.

events.name: Video call with Shenzhen financial planner Xu Jiaming.
events.description: Utilizing the high-efficiency period after her lunch break, Yu Xiaowei held an in-depth video conference with Xu Jiaming, an independent financial planner based in Shenzhen, from her study. She began by fluently summarizing the key points of their discussions over the past two weeks in Mandarin, showcasing the results of her Mandarin language course. Based on her analysis of Xu Jiaming’s client base, she proactively highlighted the significant potential for resource complementarity between them. After a candid discussion, they agreed to formalize their collaboration intentions, with the next step being for Xu Jiaming to draft a framework for a cooperation memorandum based on the common needs of mainland clients. This framework would clarify the division of responsibilities, rights, obligations, and profit-sharing principles for both parties in cross-border solutions. Additionally, they agreed that once the preliminary framework was in place, Yu Xiaowei would arrange an in-person meeting during her planned trip to Shenzhen in July for other matters, allowing for more in-depth face-to-face discussions. The entire call reflected Yu Xiaowei’s initial attempt to transition from a sales agent to a resource integrator.

events.name: Daily communication with mother and child after work
events.description: Returning home from work in the evening, Yu Xiaowei asked her mother, Chen Meiling, about her health while changing her shoes. Her mother smiled and said that the caregiver, Aunt Li, had been very attentive, accompanying her for a walk downstairs. Afterward, Yu Xiaowei checked her son Zhang Zixuan’s homework and listened to her younger daughter Zhang Yuxin excitedly share amusing stories about rehearsing for the kindergarten graduation program. During dinner, the family gathered around the dining table, sharing their experiences of the day in a warm and cozy atmosphere.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with anticipation for the planning of the new week's work.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong, in the bedroom of the home.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and hopeful, feeling invigorated by the smooth progress of the collaboration.

2025-06.daily_overview: On Tuesday, amidst her busy work schedule, Yu Xiaowei simultaneously prepared for two personal interests: ensuring her interval training for the marathon the next day was foolproof and meticulously planning a weekend gathering with her running friends. This demonstrated her efficient time management skills and her dedication to maintaining both her social circle and personal goals.

events.name: Prepare for the next day's running training.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei reviewed the next day's training plan, which Coach Zhao had prepared, on the living room floor. She neatly arranged her running gear—quick-dry athletic wear, well-worn running shoes, and a fully charged sports watch—by the entrance. She made sure to connect her phone to the charger to ensure the running app and music player would have sufficient battery. Considering the early morning summer training, she also tucked a small packet of salt tablets and tissues into her waist pack. Finally, she used her phone's map to double-check the public transportation route and travel time from her home to the Kowloon Tsai Sports Ground, and set her alarm a bit earlier.

events.name: Book a location for the running buddies' dinner gathering.
events.description: After seeing the enthusiastic responses to her dinner proposal in the running group's WeChat chat, Yu Xiaowei began searching for a suitable restaurant during her work break. Considering everyone's post-exercise appetite, diverse taste preferences, and the need for an environment that could comfortably accommodate five or six people for relaxed conversation, she ultimately chose a Hong Kong-style hotpot restaurant in Kowloon Tong, renowned for its fresh ingredients and rich broth. She called the restaurant and, with the thoughtfulness characteristic of an ESFJ, reserved a semi-private booth for 7:00 PM on June 20. Based on her understanding of the running group's dietary habits—such as Shen Peiwen's love for seafood and Coach Zhao's preference for beef—she pre-ordered several signature dishes, including hand-cut fatty beef, a seafood platter, and a handmade meatball platter. She also added a note requesting less oil and salt for a healthier meal, ensuring the quality of the gathering and that everyone would enjoy themselves.

events.name: Listen to financial news on the commute.
events.description: During her 60-minute subway commute from Wan Chai to Kowloon, Yu Xiaowei put on her headphones and listened to the latest podcast on financial policies in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area through a mobile app. This was a habit she had developed to better serve cross-border clients and engage in conversations with her new partner, Xu Jiaming, as she sought to accumulate industry knowledge during fragmented moments of time.

events.name: Temporary overtime work to handle urgent customer inquiries.
events.description: Before leaving work, I received an urgent call from a long-term client inquiring about policy changes. Yu Xiaowei patiently answered the questions and assisted in handling the matter, which resulted in leaving work half an hour later than usual and added a bit of work pressure.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
起始状态.心情: In an orderly manner, start planning the day.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Anticipating yet slightly weary, feeling happy about the upcoming training and gathering with friends, but the work delay brings a slight sense of pressure.

date_attribute.weather: Cool in the morning, sunny and hot during the day.

2025-06.daily_overview: For Xiaowei, Wednesday was a day filled with "breakthroughs" and "implementation." In the early morning, she achieved a personal breakthrough in her marathon training by improving her pace. During the day, a long-term care solution for her family was implemented through a crucial caregiver interview. The efficient rhythm of her work and the progress in family matters advanced in parallel, leaving her with a sense of dual accomplishment despite the exhaustion.

events.name: Complete high-intensity interval running training
events.description: To avoid the daytime heat, Yu Xiaowei arrived at the relatively empty Kowloon Tsai Sports Ground at 6 a.m. Following Coach Zhao's plan precisely, she completed four sets of interval training, each consisting of an 800-meter fast run followed by a 400-meter slow walk. She gave her all in every fast run, and despite feeling intense pressure on her heart and lungs and soreness in her legs during the last two sets, she gritted her teeth and persevered through all the sets, relying on the mental toughness she had developed from running marathons. Her sports watch recorded her efforts throughout the entire session.

events.name: Post-training Data Analysis and Stretching
events.description: As soon as the training session ended, Yu Xiaowei didn’t leave immediately. Instead, she walked to the shaded area by the field and began a systematic 15-minute stretching and relaxation routine to prevent her muscles from becoming too stiff. At the same time, she opened her running app to check the data: her average pace had improved by 5 seconds compared to the same type of training last week, and her heart rate curve showed a better recovery trend. This small progress delighted her, making her feel that all the hard work she had just put in was worth it.

events.name: Actively communicate training progress with the coach.
events.description: After returning home to shower and have breakfast, Yu Xiaowei carefully reviewed the data on the app in her study, particularly focusing on the rate at which her heart rate dropped after each sprint. In her notebook, she briefly noted, "Pace has improved, but the last set felt extremely challenging, with slight tightness in the back of the legs." She then proactively sent screenshots of the data along with her analysis and reflections to Coach Zhao via WhatsApp, adding a message: "Coach Zhao, I'm thrilled to see the improvement in pace! However, the last two sets were quite a struggle. Based on the current data, how should I adjust the training intensity and rest intervals in the next phase to solidify this progress?" This marked her shift from passively following the training plan to actively seeking optimization and refinement.

events.name: Cultivate the habit of carrying a portable cup.
events.description: Before leaving the house, Yu Xiaowei indeed spotted the stainless steel eco-friendly cup on the shoe cabinet in the entryway, with a sticky note that read, "Remember to take me!" She had followed her mother Chen Meiling's advice, and this prominent placement proved highly effective. Without a second thought, she slipped the cup into her commuter bag.

events.name: Interview and preliminarily select candidates for nursing staff.
events.description: In the afternoon, through arrangements made by an agency, Yu Xiaowei interviewed the second candidate, Auntie Li, a retired nurse, at home. Auntie Li not only brought her professional nursing knowledge certificates but also meticulously shared successful cases from her past experience in caring for elderly individuals with similar conditions. Her gentle and patient demeanor, along with her attention to detail, left an excellent first impression on Yu Xiaowei. After the interview, Yu Xiaowei already felt inclined in her heart.

events.name: Purchase Hong Kong-style milk tea using your own cup.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei and her colleague Su Lishan went to the tea restaurant near the company as usual. This time, she finally used her own reusable cup to buy Hong Kong-style milk tea. The restaurant staff gave her a small discount, and more importantly, she felt a sense of accomplishment in practicing environmental protection. The milk tea also seemed exceptionally fragrant and delicious.

起始状态.心情: Full of determination, ready to take on the morning training challenge.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Tired yet fulfilled and content, feeling gratified by the breakthrough in training and finding suitable caregiver candidates.

state.今日运动: Completed a 4x800m interval running session in the morning, totaling approximately 5 kilometers, with high intensity.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with scattered thunderstorms.

2025-06.daily_overview: The theme for Thursday's work was "deepening" and "decision-making." In the morning, the collaboration with partners in Shenzhen entered a more substantive stage of task division. In the evening, after a democratic discussion within the family, an important decision was made to hire a caregiver. The simultaneous progress of both internal and external affairs made Yu Xiaowei feel that life was moving forward with a greater sense of control.

events.name: Establish a joint service solution framework with the Xu family.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei and Xu Jiaming held a formal video conference. The meeting focused on creating a one-stop solution of "Hong Kong savings insurance + mainland tax planning" tailored for Xu Jiaming's high-net-worth client base in Shenzhen. Drawing on her recent understanding of cross-border policies, Yu Xiaowei clearly explained the unique advantages of Hong Kong savings insurance in diversified asset allocation. Both parties ultimately clarified their division of responsibilities: Yu Xiaowei will be responsible for preparing professional materials for the Hong Kong insurance component, designing compliant solutions, and providing post-service support, while Xu Jiaming will handle front-end client needs exploration, mainland tax planning recommendations, and client relationship maintenance. The meeting reached a consensus on key issues such as the preliminary cooperation model, profit distribution mechanism, service processes, and response timelines, pushing the collaboration into an actionable phase.

events.name: Family meeting discusses the selection of a caregiver.
events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei gathered her husband Zhang Weiming and father Yu Guoqiang in the living room to provide a detailed account of the interviews with the two caregiver candidates, analyzing their respective strengths and weaknesses. She particularly highlighted Aunt Li’s professional background and gentle demeanor. Although her mother Chen Meiling was in her own room, she also expressed her opinion, stating that she felt more at ease with "Aunt Li, who has nursing experience." After discussion, the family tentatively reached a consensus, leaning toward hiring Aunt Li.

events.name: Announcement of the Trial Work Decision for Caregivers
events.description: After the family meeting, Yu Xiaowei went to her mother's room and formally announced the family's decision to hire Aunt Li, starting with a two-week trial period. She detailed Aunt Li's working hours and main responsibilities during the trial, and gently asked her mother if she was willing to try getting along with the new helper. Seeing her mother nod in agreement, Yu Xiaowei breathed a sigh of relief. She then gathered the whole family to explain the upcoming arrangements and important points to note, reminding the children to treat Aunt Li with respect.

events.name: Slight headache due to work pressure, resting early.
events.description: Due to consecutive days of intense work and family matters, Yu Xiaowei experienced a slight headache and decided to go to bed earlier than usual to regain energy.

起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare for the important collaboration meeting.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Relieved and confident, key progress has been made in both cooperation and family matters, though there is slight physical fatigue.

date_attribute.weather: Clear and bright, with a cool evening breeze.

2025-06.daily_overview: Friday was a day of reaping gratitude and sharing joy. During the day, she systematically prepared professional resources for cross-border business; in the evening, as the organizer, she successfully hosted a warm and harmonious thank-you dinner for running friends. Amid the rising steam of the hot pot and the cheerful laughter of friends, she sincerely expressed her gratitude for the coach’s guidance and shared the happiness of her recent learning and growth, fully replenishing her social energy.

events.name: Organize the cross-border business product database
events.description: In the office, Yu Xiaowei spent the entire morning systematically organizing information on Hong Kong savings insurance products suitable for mainland clients on her computer. She not only updated the latest product brochures, rate tables, and benefit illustrations but also specifically gathered relevant compliance guidelines and consumer advisory documents issued by the Insurance Authority (IA) of Hong Kong. This ensured that all materials were both professionally accurate and fully compliant with regulatory standards, laying a solid foundation for her subsequent collaboration with Xu Jiaming and the presentation to Wang Qiming's team.

events.name: Confirm and remind running buddies about the gathering.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei once again sent the detailed address of the restaurant, a map link, the reservation information, and the gathering time of 7 p.m. in the running friends' WeChat group. She thoughtfully reminded everyone to stay hydrated after exercising and not to rush. She herself finished work early, went home for a quick shower, and changed into comfortable casual clothes. She also specially prepared a small gift package printed with the words "Thank you for your guidance," containing sports socks and energy gels, to give to Coach Zhao.

events.name: Organize a thank-you dinner for running buddies
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei arrived at the hotpot restaurant fifteen minutes early, confirmed the reservation, and ordered the soup base and pre-selected dishes. She warmly welcomed Coach Zhao Zhiming, Shen Peiwen, and two other familiar running friends. Everyone gathered around the table, completely relaxing in the fragrant steam of the hotpot. As the organizer, Yu Xiaowei naturally guided the conversation, and everyone freely shared their recent training experiences, complained about the chaotic supplies at a certain race, and exchanged amusing stories from work and life. During the meal, Yu Xiaowei solemnly raised a toast to Coach Zhao, sincerely thanking him for his long-term professional guidance and encouragement. She also shared the news of her recent successful completion of a Mandarin course, and everyone raised their glasses to congratulate her, creating a lively and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Ending the Dinner Gathering and Follow-up Interactions
events.description: The dinner lasted for over two hours. After it ended, Yu Xiaowei left with everyone, and they said their goodbyes at the restaurant entrance. She insisted on paying the bill herself, politely declining the suggestion to split the cost, and said with a smile that it was a small gesture of gratitude from her as the organizer and to thank the coach. After returning home, although a bit tired, she still sent a message of thanks in the running group chat, along with a joyful group photo taken during the dinner. Soon, the chat was flooded with everyone's expressions of gratitude and promises to "meet up again next time."

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
起始状态.心情: Pleasant, looking forward to the evening gathering with friends.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Warm and socially fulfilled, immersed in an atmosphere of friendship and gratitude.

state.今日运动: None, primarily focused on social and leisure activities.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny and hot, with a gentle breeze.

2025-06.daily_overview: On Saturday, Yu Xiaowei switched into "family affairs officer" mode. The entire day was dedicated to intensive preparations for her daughter's graduation ceremony and the family picnic scheduled for the next day. From carefully selecting a graduation dress for her daughter to purchasing picnic supplies, and even trying novel ways to relieve her own stress, every task was aimed at creating beautiful memories for her family and practicing self-care. The weekend was busy yet filled with love.

events.name: Selecting graduation ceremony attire for my daughter.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei took her daughter Zhang Yuxin to a children's clothing store in Mong Kok that she often visited. She encouraged her daughter to choose her favorite dress style, and among several delicate little dresses, her daughter selected one with a light purple tulle skirt. Yu Xiaowei carefully paired it with white ankle socks and a pair of shiny patent leather shoes, then had her daughter try them on in front of the mirror. Watching her daughter happily twirl around, Yu Xiaowei felt that all the hard work was worth it.

events.name: Purchase family picnic supplies
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei went alone to the large supermarket near her home to shop for the Sunday picnic in the park. Her shopping list was clear and straightforward: fresh strawberries and grapes, whole wheat bread, low-fat ham slices, salad dressing, individually wrapped cookies that the children liked, a large bottle of mineral water, and juice. She also made sure to check whether the picnic blanket at home was clean and whether the thermos flask was in good condition, ensuring that everything was perfectly prepared.

events.name: Try VR Virtual Concerts for Stress Relief
events.description: After the children fell asleep at night, Yu Xiaowei remembered the new thing recommended by her colleague. She took out the VR device she had purchased earlier and tried watching a 360-degree panoramic virtual concert by the Berlin Philharmonic Orchestra. As she put on the headphones, the magnificent symphony instantly enveloped her, temporarily blocking out the distractions of the outside world. This immersive experience made her feel both novel and relaxed, and she realized that it might be an efficient and private way to relieve stress.

events.name: Preparing the Home for the Arrival of a New Caregiver
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei and her husband cleared out an unused drawer in the wardrobe in her mother’s room to store Aunt Li’s nursing supplies. They also prepared a comfortable chair in the corner of the living room and briefly informed their two children that a new Aunt Li would come to help take care of their grandmother the next day, reminding them to be well-behaved and polite.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
起始状态.心情: Relax and get ready to enjoy some quality family time this weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Content and at peace, with household affairs well prepared, and having tried novel ways to relax.

state.今日运动: None, with walking and shopping as the main activities.

date_attribute.weather: The sun is shining brightly, the sky is high and the clouds are pale.

2025-06.daily_overview: Sunday is the perfect day for family. Yu Xiaowei and her mother prepared food together, and then the whole family headed out for a long-awaited, relaxed, and enjoyable picnic on the lawn of Kowloon Walled City Park. The sunshine, green grass, children's laughter, and her mother's relaxed smile together formed the family scene she cherishes most, greatly relieving the stress that had built up recently.

events.name: Preparing picnic food together with my mother
events.description: On Sunday morning, Yu Xiaowei and her mother, Chen Meiling, were busy together in the kitchen. Seated in her wheelchair, the mother gave instructions while Yu Xiaowei took action, layering ham, cheese, and lettuce between slices of whole wheat bread to make sandwiches, which she carefully wrapped in parchment paper. Together, they washed the fruit and poured the brewed lemon tea into a thermos. The entire process was filled with the warmth of mother-daughter collaboration.

events.name: The whole family went to the park for a picnic.
events.description: Around ten in the morning, the family was all set. Yu Xiaowei and her husband, Zhang Weiming, carefully helped their mother into the wheelchair. Their son, Zhang Zixuan, took the initiative to carry the picnic mat, while their daughter, Zhang Yuxin, held a small basket filled with snacks. Together, they walked to the nearby Kowloon Walled City Park.

events.name: Enjoy the park picnic time.
events.description: They found a patch of soft grass under the shade of the trees and spread out a mat. The family sat together, sharing sandwiches and fruit. After eating, the children ran and played in the nearby open space, while Yu Xiaowei and her husband chatted with their mother, listening to her stories about what the park used to be like. A gentle breeze brushed their faces, and sunlight filtered through the leaves, casting dappled patterns. In that moment, there was a sense of simple, everyday happiness.

events.name: Returning home after the picnic.
events.description: After lunch, the family rested leisurely for a while, then carefully packed up all the trash and belongings. Yu Xiaowei pushed her mother in the wheelchair, while her husband held the hand of their tired and slightly sleepy child. They strolled slowly back home, stopping along the way to buy ice cream as a treat for the children.

events.name: Organize and Share Joyful Moments
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei hung the picnic mat out to dry and put the utensils back in their places. Then she sat in front of her computer, imported the picnic photos she had taken on her phone, and carefully selected a few of the most vivid ones—a close-up of her mother smiling, moments of the children playing, and a family portrait. She shared these photos in the family group chat and also posted a warm family photo on her social media with the caption, "A simple Sunday, filled with happiness." Soon, she received likes and comments from friends and relatives.

2025-06.daily_overview: As the new week begins, Yu Xiaowei channels the family joy she cultivated over the weekend into a renewed drive for work. She proactively updates her supervisor on the latest developments in cross-border collaboration, actively seeks organizational support, and demonstrates a professional approach that aligns her personal business exploration with the company’s growth. Today’s focus lies in paving the internal path for potential new business channels.

events.name: Report the progress of cooperation to supervisor Liang Zhenhua.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei scheduled a brief 15-minute meeting with her supervisor, Liang Zhenhua. In Director Liang’s office, she clearly and systematically reported the entire process of contacting and discussing collaboration with Xu Jiaming, an independent financial planner in Shenzhen. She emphasized the significant potential of combining the other party’s client resources with their own professional products, as well as the preliminary consensus reached on task division. Not only did she present some prepared materials, but she also proactively inquired whether the company had specific compliance requirements or support policies for such cross-border collaborations. Liang Zhenhua praised her proactive and pioneering spirit, promising to consult the company’s legal department on related matters and providing her with preliminary backing. This report successfully integrated her individual exploration into the team’s perspective, securing room for follow-up actions.

events.name: Follow up on the contract details of caregiver Aunt Li.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei communicated with the agency over the phone to confirm the details of the trial work agreement with caregiver Auntie Li, including specific working hours, payment methods, insurance during the trial period, and arranged to sign the agreement the next day. She prefers to keep things organized to avoid misunderstandings later on.

events.name: Work delay due to distraction from family matters.
events.description: While handling client documents in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei received a phone call from her mother inquiring about caregiver arrangements, which briefly interrupted her work and added slight pressure.

She meticulously distilled past successful experiences into replicable case studies and proactively shared phased achievements with potential partners, demonstrating strong professional output capabilities and project advancement efficiency.

events.name: Write Successful Cases of Cross-Border Insurance
events.description: Yu Xiaowei selected two to three typical cases from her client files where she successfully planned education funds and medical security for cross-border families (such as husbands working in Hong Kong while their wives and children reside in mainland China). She anonymized all sensitive personal information by referring to them as "Client A" and "Client B," focusing on documenting the case background, needs analysis, solution design rationale (reasons for product combination choices), implementation outcomes, and client feedback. This well-structured case document will serve as a powerful tool for her to demonstrate her professional expertise to new clients (such as Xu Jiaming or Wang Qiming's clients).

events.name: Send preliminary materials to the Shenzhen client Wang Qiming's team.
events.description: Organize the compiled product database and the newly created case documents into a logically structured electronic folder. Yu Xiaowei uses the company's encrypted email to send this folder to the contact person of Wang Qiming's team at the technology company. In the email, she briefly explains that these materials can help their team gain a preliminary understanding of the advantages of Hong Kong savings insurance and mentions that she is available at any time to arrange an online meeting for a detailed explanation. This is a proactive step to maintain the warmth of the client relationship and explore deeper needs.

events.name: Outdoor activities canceled due to weather, switched to indoor stretching.

2025-06.daily_overview: Wednesday is a day of "rehearsal and implementation" with multiple parallel tracks. At work, she practices with colleagues to enhance her skills; at home, she formally signs a contract with a caregiver, marking the trial run of an external support system; in daily life, she successfully cultivates the habit of bringing her own cup. Small progress and important arrangements intertwine, propelling various matters steadily forward.

events.name: Conduct a role-playing exercise with colleague Su Lishan.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei and her colleague Su Lishan, who also aspires to expand into the mainland market, met in a corner of the company’s rest area. They simulated a scenario of introducing products to a "mainland customer who is curious about Hong Kong insurance but has concerns." Yu Xiaowei explained in Mandarin, while Su Lishan played the role of the customer, asking questions continuously. After the practice, the two gave each other feedback on their Mandarin pronunciation, communication logic, and response skills. This hands-on exercise helped Yu Xiaowei identify some small speaking habits she hadn’t noticed before, making the session highly rewarding.

events.name: Successfully Cultivating the Habit of Bringing Your Own Cup
events.description: When she left home in the morning, Yu Xiaowei no longer needed any reminder to put her clean eco-friendly cup into her commuter bag. At noon, she used the same cup to buy Hong Kong-style milk tea at the tea restaurant. The formation of this habit gave her a sense of continuous, small achievements.

events.name: Fine-tune the plan for Wang Qiming's team.
events.description: In the afternoon, she received preliminary email feedback from Wang Qiming's team, who inquired about several details regarding the convenience of fund transfers in and out of Hong Kong and tax handling procedures. Yu Xiaowei quickly consulted relevant materials, made additions and fine-tuned the corresponding sections of the previously sent proposal template. She particularly added a brief explanation highlighting the advantages of Hong Kong's simple and low-tax system, making the proposal more persuasive.

events.name: Formally sign a trial work agreement with caregiver Aunt Li.
events.description: In the evening, the agent brought Aunt Li to Yu Xiaowei's home. Under the agent's supervision, Yu Xiaowei and Aunt Li formally signed a two-week trial work agreement, clearly outlining the job responsibilities, working hours, salary, rights and obligations of both parties, as well as the evaluation criteria for the trial period in black and white. The moment she signed the agreement, Yu Xiaowei felt that a part of her family responsibilities had been officially and systematically shared.

events.name: Please provide a detailed introduction of the family situation to Aunt Li.
events.description: After the agreement was signed, Yu Xiaowei invited Aunt Li to sit down and spent nearly an hour detailing her mother Chen Meiling's daily routine, commonly used medications and their administration times, preferred foods, simple rehabilitation exercises, as well as the layout of the home and the use of household appliances. She covered every detail meticulously, hoping to help Aunt Li integrate as quickly as possible and to bring peace of mind to herself and her family.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home

2025-06.daily_overview: The workload reached a minor peak on Thursday. Yu Xiaowei immersed herself deeply in the design and confirmation of cross-border business plans. Not only did she independently complete the plan template, but she also signed a crucial memorandum with partners and leveraged internal professional resources for complex case consultations. After such intense mental exertion, she needed a moment of pure personal relaxation, unrelated to family.

events.name: Design a Cross-border Customer Customization Solution Template
events.description: Based on customer insights obtained from communications with Wang Qiming and Xu Jiaming, Yu Xiaowei designed a standardized solution template. The template includes a customer needs analysis questionnaire, asset allocation recommendation models based on different family life cycles (such as the entrepreneurial stage, children's education stage, and retirement planning stage), examples of Hong Kong insurance product portfolios, and a comprehensive process description from consultation to policy purchase and subsequent services. This template aims to enhance the efficiency and professionalism of serving high-net-worth clients from mainland China in the future.

events.name: Confirm and sign the Memorandum of Cooperation Intent with the Xu family.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei sent the initially prepared cooperation materials to Xu Jiaming for review. Subsequently, the two parties held an efficient conference call, confirming the details of the plan, service quotations, and the content of the joint service commitment letter item by item. Finally, the two signed the "Memorandum of Cooperation Intent" online using electronic signatures. Although this document does not carry strict legal binding force, it signifies that their partnership has progressed from verbal discussions to a preliminary, documented execution phase, clarifying the next steps for the joint service process targeting specific clients.

events.name: Consult with actuarial colleagues to handle complex client needs.
events.description: Regarding the two clients from the customer list provided by Xu Jiaming, who have complex asset isolation and inheritance needs, Yu Xiaowei used the company's internal system to schedule and connect with Guo Junwei, a colleague in the Guangzhou branch responsible for product actuarial work. During the video conference, she detailed the clients' basic information and core requirements, consulting on the actuarial details, compliance points, and possibilities for customized design of specific high-end life insurance and Investment-Linked Assurance Scheme (ILAS) products. Guo Junwei's professional responses helped clarify her thoughts, ensuring the professionalism and feasibility of the subsequent draft proposal.

events.name: Watching nature documentaries to relieve stress.
events.description: In the evening, after handling a tricky customer inquiry, Yu Xiaowei felt a bit tense. Once the children were asleep, she made herself a cup of hot Hong Kong-style milk tea, opened her tablet in the study, and watched half an episode of "Planet Earth." The magnificent natural landscapes and the pure vitality of the animals gradually pulled her away from the troubles of work, and her mood slowly calmed down.

events.name: Working overnight due to project deadlines.
events.description: To finish the proposal template before the weekend, Yu Xiaowei worked late, which caused her to postpone her sleep time.

2025-06.daily_overview: On Friday, the dual countdown for work and family began. On one hand, she received the first list of target clients, marking the entry of her new business into a substantive phase; on the other hand, she began making final preparations for her daughter’s first important ceremony in life. Like a skilled conductor, she seamlessly switched between the movements of career development and family celebrations.

events.name: Final item check for daughter's graduation ceremony.
events.description: Before leaving in the morning, Yu Xiaowei hung her daughter's neatly ironed light purple dress, white socks, and patent leather shoes in a prominent spot in the wardrobe. She checked the camera's battery and memory card, placing a spare battery in her bag. She also wrapped the graduation gift she intended to give her daughter—an adorable rabbit plush toy—in gift paper and placed it on the living room table. This meticulous preparation was her way of ensuring that important family events went smoothly.

events.name: Research on the first batch of target customer data
events.description: In the morning, Xu Jiaming sent via encrypted email the first batch of screened high-net-worth target clients, including a list of five individuals along with their basic background information. Yu Xiaowei carefully reviewed each profile in the office. Based on the clients’ age (35–50 years old), family structure (mostly nuclear families or two-generation households), occupation (business owners, executives), and known financial planning needs (children’s education, retirement, asset preservation), she sketched out preliminary directions for matching insurance product combinations in her notebook. For example, for younger business owners, the focus would be on balancing savings and protection, while for older clients, the emphasis would be on retirement cash flow planning.

events.name: Observing the First Day Trial of a Caregiver
events.description: After returning home from work, Yu Xiaowei didn't rush to ask questions. Instead, she quietly observed her mother's mood and Aunt Li's work performance. She noticed that her mother looked well, while Aunt Li was busy preparing dinner in the kitchen, moving efficiently and maintaining cleanliness. During dinner, her mother mentioned that Aunt Li had accompanied her for a walk downstairs and even helped massage her shoulders. Yu Xiaowei felt secretly delighted, as the trial period had gotten off to a good start.

起始状态.心情: Methodical and orderly, balancing the crucial junctures of both work and family.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home

2025-06.daily_overview: Saturday's theme was entirely dedicated to family and the final coordination before the celebration. From confirming ceremony details and planning the trip to conducting the final rehearsal for their daughter, every step was filled with pride in their daughter's growth and a deep emphasis on family reunion. The introduction of a caregiver made organizing such a family outing, which required caring for an elderly person with limited mobility, both feasible and manageable.

events.name: Confirm the final arrangements for the graduation ceremony and coordinate travel.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei received the final notification email for the kindergarten graduation ceremony, carefully confirming the time, procedures, and seating arrangements. She immediately discussed it with her husband, Zhang Weiming, and they decided that the whole family (including their parents and two children) would attend together. Considering that her mother needed a wheelchair, she called caregiver Aunt Li in advance to confirm that she could assist throughout the morning tomorrow. Next, she planned the best driving route from home to the Kowloon City Baptist Church Kindergarten and checked nearby parking information to ensure everything would go smoothly.

events.name: Family Rehearsal and Encouragement Meeting
events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei organized a relaxed and enjoyable "rehearsal" for the whole family. She had her daughter Zhang Yuxin put on a little dress and perform the song she had prepared for the ceremony in the middle of the living room. The whole family sat around the sofa as the audience, giving warm applause after the performance. The grandparents, parents, and older brother each took turns giving their younger sister hugs and words of encouragement, creating a warm and supportive family atmosphere. In the end, Yu Xiaowei gently reminded her daughter not to be nervous on stage and to enjoy her own special moment.

events.name: Conduct weekend long-distance slow running training.
events.description: In the midst of her busy schedule, Yu Xiaowei still managed to complete the long-distance slow running plan assigned by Coach Zhao for the weekend. She chose to run along the seaside promenade in the relatively cool early morning, completing a 12-kilometer slow run. The focus was on accumulating mileage and adapting to the rhythm of exercise in the summer heat, laying the foundation for the half marathon event in the second half of the year.

2025-06.daily_overview: Sunday was the final stretch of tranquility and last-minute preparations before the ceremony. During the day, she selected a graduation gift for her daughter and double-checked the details of the event. In the evening, she worked overtime at the office for a new business opportunity, transforming the client’s abstract materials into concrete, personalized preliminary proposals. Throughout the day, the tenderness of maternal love and the professionalism of her career coexisted seamlessly within her.

events.name: Write a preliminary proposal for five target clients.
events.description: Considering the heavy workload on Monday, Yu Xiaowei decided to work overtime on Sunday. She brought the client materials provided by Xu Jiaming and the notes from her discussion with Guo Junwei to the office. In the quiet workspace, she drafted preliminary insurance proposal outlines for each of the five target clients. Each draft included tailored product combination recommendations, coverage calculations, expected returns/benefit analyses, and her personal service commitment. She also attached a brief cover letter for each client, outlining the core value of the proposal. The task lasted the entire afternoon and was the result of intense mental effort.

events.name: Preparing a graduation gift for my sister together with my son.
events.description: After returning home from overtime work, Yu Xiaowei did not forget her family role. She took her son Zhang Zixuan to a nearby gift shop, allowing her son to pick a graduation gift for his sister. Zhang Zixuan ultimately chose a glowing crystal ball music box. Yu Xiaowei also prepared a small bouquet of flowers adorned with baby's breath and sunflowers. In the evening, she helped her daughter try on the gown one last time and gently talked with her about what she might see on stage the next day, easing her daughter's nervousness.

events.name: Try adding a Zumba class experience.
events.description: Before working overtime in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei took some time to attend a Zumba trial class at the community gym, experiencing the joy brought by music and rhythm as an exploration of a new hobby.

2025-06.daily_overview: The last day of June was filled with laughter, emotion, and profound reflection. In the early morning, she completed a light running session. During the day, the whole family worked together to witness their daughter Zhang Yuxin’s first important milestone in life, sharing precious family moments. In the evening, a heartfelt conversation with her husband allowed her to reflect deeply amidst the busyness and contentment, strengthening her resolve to balance life and cherish every family moment in the future.

events.name: Morning Easy Run Training
events.description: Yu Xiaowei got up at 5:20 in the morning and completed a 5-kilometer easy run near her home as part of her daily training for the half marathon preparation. The focus was on recovery and maintaining the rhythm of exercise. Stretching and relaxation were performed after the training.

events.name: Assist mother in preparing for and departing to attend the ceremony.
events.description: On the morning of the graduation ceremony, the house was bustling yet orderly. Auntie Li, the caregiver, arrived early to help Chen Meiling, the mother, with washing up and getting dressed. Yu Xiaowei and her father, Yu Guoqiang, prepared the wheelchair, a water bottle, and a light jacket nearby. With the cooperation of the whole family, the mother was safely settled into the family MPV, with her father sitting beside her to keep an eye on things, and Auntie Li accompanying them to assist. Yu Xiaowei checked everyone's attire and the items to be brought along, confirming that everything was in order. Then, with her husband Zhang Weiming driving, the family set off for the kindergarten.

events.name: Attending the kindergarten graduation ceremony of my daughter Zhang Yuxin
events.description: The entire family arrived at Kowloon City Baptist Church Kindergarten. With the skilled assistance of Aunt Li, the mother smoothly entered the auditorium in her wheelchair and found their reserved seats. As the ceremony began, Yu Xiaowei's eyes welled up with tears as she watched her daughter Zhang Yuxin, dressed in a light purple dress, singing earnestly on stage with the other children and receiving her graduation certificate. She tightly held her husband's hand and continuously recorded this precious moment with her phone. Sitting in their wheelchairs, the grandmother and grandfather were beaming with joy, while the older brother Zhang Zixuan applauded enthusiastically for his sister from below. At this moment, the family's bond reached its peak.

events.name: Family celebration dinner
events.description: After the ceremony, instead of heading home immediately, the whole family went to a familiar Hong Kong-style tea restaurant near the kindergarten with spacious seating to celebrate with a meal. Yu Xiaowei presented her daughter with prepared flowers and a gift chosen by her brother. Everyone raised their teacups in a toast to congratulate Zhang Yuxin on graduating from kindergarten. The gathering was filled with laughter and joy—the daughter excitedly described her feelings on stage, while the grandparents reminisced about their own children’s graduation experiences in their youth, creating a warm and harmonious family atmosphere.

events.name: Sharing joy and receiving blessings.
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon and taking a short break, Yu Xiaowei transferred the large number of photos and videos she had taken during the day to her computer. She carefully selected nine of her favorites—close-ups of her daughter receiving the certificate, a family photo in the auditorium, and joyful moments from the celebratory meal. She shared the photos in the family WeChat group and also sent them specifically to her younger brother Yu Xiaofeng in Shenzhen, as well as her close friends Lin Jiaxin and Huang Wenhui. Soon, her phone was flooded with congratulatory messages and likes from relatives and friends across different places, making her feel surrounded by love.

events.name: Late-night family reflection conversation with husband
events.description: In the evening, after the children and parents had fallen asleep, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming brewed a pot of light tea and sat on the living room sofa. Reflecting on the day’s ceremony, Yu Xiaowei was filled with emotion. She whispered to her husband, "Seeing Yuxin today, I suddenly felt a wave of fear. When Mom was sick recently, I was so busy with work and taking care of her that I almost missed such an important moment in her growth." Her husband gently squeezed her hand in understanding. Yu Xiaowei continued, "I’ve been thinking—isn’t all our hard work meant to provide a better life for our family and to be part of every important moment in their lives? From now on, we need to be more mindful of balancing things. We can’t just focus on dealing with immediate ‘urgent matters’ while overlooking these truly important ‘big moments.’" Zhang Weiming nodded in agreement, and the two reached a consensus to proactively plan family time and witness their children’s growth together. This conversation allowed the joy of the day to settle into profound reflections on their future family life.

起始状态.心情: Excitement and anticipation, feeling incredibly thrilled for my daughter's big day.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Deep, content, and filled with gratitude. The joyful echoes of the day's celebrations still linger, while the profound conversations of the night have brought inner peace and a resolute determination.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Yu Xiaowei began a new month. After balancing the stress of caring for her mother and the joy of her daughter's graduation, she returned to her daily routine, with her top priorities being managing the family's long-term plans and improving her mother's living environment. The humid heat of Hong Kong's midsummer made her rely more on indoor air conditioning, and she also started planning daily activities for her son, Zhang Zixuan, who was on summer vacation.

events.name: First Confirmation of Medical Fund Fixed Investment
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei received a text message from the bank confirming the successful deduction for her fixed investment. During her morning tea break, she opened her mobile banking app to check her account and verified that the first deduction had been executed, with the purchased shares of the healthcare-themed fund already credited. She quietly reminded herself that this was a long-term reserve for her daughter's education and major family medical expenses, and she should not be disturbed by short-term market fluctuations, maintaining patience instead.

events.name: Discussing the replacement of furniture for mother.
events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei sat down in the air-conditioned living room with her husband Zhang Weiming and her mother Chen Meiling. Considering that her mother needed a longer period of rest and more comfortable daily activity support during her postoperative recovery, Yu Xiaowei proactively suggested replacing her mother’s bedroom with an adjustable electric care bed and a more ergonomic armchair. Zhang Weiming expressed his support, while her mother initially felt it was a waste of money but eventually agreed after persuasion from her daughter and son-in-law. The three of them determined the functional requirements and a general budget.

events.name: Coping with the Midsummer Heat and the Start of My Son's Summer Vacation
events.description: Hong Kong has officially entered the scorching summer. Yu Xiaowei adjusted the air conditioner at home to a comfortable temperature, reminding her mother and children to drink more water and avoid going out at noon. Her son, Zhang Zixuan, started his summer vacation today. Yu Xiaowei briefly discussed his summer plans with him, promised to take him swimming over the weekend, and reminded him to complete a certain amount of summer homework every day.
