起始状态.心情: Peaceful, carrying a sense of responsibility for the family's financial planning in the new month.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, in the bedroom at home.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled, feeling gratified for taking the first step toward improving my mother's living conditions.

2025-07.daily_overview: On weekdays, Yu Xiaowei intersperses thoughts about household matters amidst the busy commute and work. A repeated reminder of an eco-friendly habit underscores the need for more systematic self-management in her multiple roles.

events.name: Reflect on and optimize daily habits.
events.description: Rushing out in the morning to catch the subway for work, Yu Xiaowei only realized she had forgotten her reusable cup again after arriving at the office. Reflecting on the reason, she thought it might be because she stayed up a bit late last night discussing furniture arrangements with her mother, which threw off her morning routine. She decided to stop relying on memory alone and instead formally add the step of checking whether the cup is in her commuter bag to her nightly routine of packing her bag before bed.

events.name: Follow up with potential customers
events.description: During a break in the morning work, Yu Xiaowei contacted several potential clients she had engaged with last month but had not yet closed deals via WeChat. She sent brief greetings and the latest product information to maintain the warmth of the connection.

events.name: Focus on Summer Diet
events.description: Given the hot weather, Yu Xiaowei reminded her mother, who was helping to take care of the children at home, to prepare lighter meals for lunch and dinner, with more fruits and cooling soups, such as winter melon, barley, and pork rib soup.

events.name: Temporary overtime work to prepare a client proposal.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowei stayed at the company for an extra hour to work overtime due to an important client’s last-minute request, preparing a detailed insurance plan. She ordered takeout wonton noodles and worked while eating, finishing only at 8 p.m.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Thursday's workday, Yu Xiaowei efficiently handled follow-up matters related to customer insurance policies during the day. In the evening, she dedicated her time to her family, beginning the practical task of filtering information to improve her mother's living environment.

events.name: Online Screening of Nursing Furniture
events.description: In the evening, after putting her daughter to sleep, Yu Xiaowei turned on her computer in the study and began browsing several major furniture websites and medical equipment stores. Based on the functional requirements determined during the family meeting the night before, she carefully compared different brands and models of electric nursing beds and ergonomic armchairs. She bookmarked links to five or six products that met the criteria and had favorable reviews, and made preliminary notes on their prices and key selling points.

events.name: Midday communication with colleague Su Lishan.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei and her colleague Su Lishan went to a nearby tea restaurant for a meal. They ordered wonton noodles and Hong Kong-style milk tea, chatting as they ate. Yu Xiaowei mentioned to Su Lishan her idea of buying a new bed for her mother, and Su Lishan shared the care brand her mother-in-law had used before, offering some reference suggestions.

events.name: The child has a slight fever and goes to bed early.
events.description: In the evening, her son Zhang Zixuan suddenly developed a fever with a temperature of 38 degrees Celsius. Yu Xiaowei ended her work early and returned home to care for the child, administering medicine, using physical methods to reduce the fever, and soothing him to sleep. This disrupted her evening plans, but as a mother, she prioritized family matters.

Yu Xiaowei completely let down her guard, confiding in her close friend about the physical and emotional exhaustion she felt during her mother's recovery period, as well as her anxiety over the slowdown in second-quarter performance. Lin Jiaxin not only offered emotional support but also shared, from a teacher's perspective, how to establish routines and boundaries to cope with caregiving stress. She encouraged Yu Xiaowei to consider seeking professional help. The understanding and encouragement from her old friend made Yu Xiaowei feel deeply comforted.

2025-07.daily_overview: Monday marked a significant new beginning. The onboarding of professional caregiver Auntie Li was a crucial turning point for Yu Xiaowei's work-life balance, as she gained precious, uninterrupted morning work hours for the first time.

events.name: Observation of Auntie Li's First Day of Service as a Caregiver
events.description: At 8:30 in the morning, caregiver Aunt Li arrived on time. Yu Xiaowei delayed her departure and accompanied her for a full hour to observe. She saw Aunt Li professionally assist her mother with rehabilitation exercises, meticulously measure and record her blood pressure, and prepare lunch while considering her mother's taste preferences and nutritional needs. Aunt Li also engaged in casual conversation with her mother. A relaxed expression appeared on her mother's face. Only after confirming that Aunt Li was trustworthy did Yu Xiaowei feel at ease leaving for the company.

events.name: Efficiently handle backlog work
events.description: Thanks to a full morning of work, Yu Xiaowei entered a state of high efficiency as soon as she arrived at the company. She focused on tackling the backlog of paperwork that had accumulated over the past few weeks due to her need to keep an eye on things at home: organizing client policy documents, drafting several complex insurance proposal reports, and scheduling appointments with multiple clients for the next two weeks in one go. The long-lost, uninterrupted work rhythm helped her regain a sense of control.

events.name: Understanding the Mother's Feelings on the First Day
events.description: After returning home from work in the evening, Yu Xiaowei first went to her mother's room to ask in detail about her feelings regarding Aunt Li's first day of service. Her mother mentioned that the training intensity was manageable, Aunt Li was very patient, and the lunch was to her taste. Yu Xiaowei reassured her mother, saying, "This is to help you recover better and give us more peace of mind." Seeing that her mother was adapting well, the weight in her heart felt a little lighter.

events.name: Begin preparing the important client proposal.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei began preparing a two-day client proposal tailored to the needs of a potential high-end client, with plans to finalize the details tomorrow and the day after.

She sent a message to her colleague, Su Lishan, via WhatsApp, briefly sharing her thoughts on the meeting. Su Lishan replied with a cheering emoji.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Saturday morning, an unexpected minor traffic accident disrupted Yu Xiaowei’s routine. This incident not only tested her emergency response skills but also temporarily altered her commuting method, prompting reflections on fatigue driving and mental and physical well-being.

events.name: Rush Hour Rear-End Collision
events.description: Around 8 a.m., Yu Xiaowei drove from her home in Kowloon City to her company in Wan Chai as usual. Princess Margaret Road was congested with traffic during the morning rush hour. As she approached the entrance of the Cross-Harbour Tunnel, the car in front suddenly braked without warning. Although Yu had maintained a safe following distance, she was momentarily distracted and couldn't brake in time. The front bumper of her car lightly collided with the rear bumper of the vehicle ahead, producing a scraping sound. Fortunately, the impact was very minor, and no one was injured on either side.

events.name: Handle the accident scene calmly.
events.description: Both parties moved their vehicles to the side of the road. The driver of the front car was a slightly nervous housewife. Suppressing her inner frustration and irritation, Yu Xiaowei calmly communicated with the other party, relying on her professional expertise as an insurance agent. She skillfully exchanged information regarding their driver's licenses, vehicle registration certificates, and insurance policies. Using her phone, she captured clear evidence by taking photos of the accident scene from multiple angles, the collision points of both vehicles, and the documents of both parties.

events.name: Report the incident to the insurance company.
events.description: On the scene, Yu Xiaowei immediately called her vehicle insurance company to report the incident, clearly stating the time and location of the accident, the information of the other vehicle involved, and the fact that there were no injuries. The operator then guided her through the subsequent steps to follow.

events.name: Complete the commute and inform the family.
events.description: After handling the incident at the scene, Yu Xiaowei got back on the road and arrived at the company about half an hour later than originally planned. As soon as she reached the office, she immediately sent a message in the family WeChat group: "There was a minor scrape on the road this morning. Both the car and I are fine, and it’s all sorted out. Don’t worry." Her husband, Zhang Weiming, quickly replied, asking for more details.

events.name: Submit a formal claim application.
events.description: In the morning, at her workstation, Yu Xiaowei officially submitted her claim application through the insurance company's app and email. She organized and uploaded electronic files such as on-site photos and the other party's information. Leveraging her familiarity with the process, she ensured that all materials were complete and standardized, aiming to expedite the handling speed.

events.name: Vehicle sent for repair
events.description: Following the insurance company's instructions, Yu Xiaowei drove her car to the designated repair shop during her lunch break for damage assessment and repairs. After inspecting the vehicle, the repair shop staff confirmed that only the paintwork and minor deformation of the front bumper needed to be fixed, which was expected to take two to three days. Yu Xiaowei completed the handover procedures.

events.name: Have an in-depth conversation with your husband.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowei comforted the children, who were somewhat worried after hearing about the accident. Later, she and her husband, Zhang Weiming, had an in-depth conversation in the bedroom. She honestly admitted that she had indeed been feeling mentally fatigued lately and that her concentration while driving was not as sharp as before. Zhang Weiming did not blame her but instead expressed understanding. He suggested that she try to rest more in the coming week, reduce her driving, and give him more opportunities to handle pick-ups, drop-offs, and errands. This conversation made her feel important emotional support.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong
起始状态.心情: Calm, planning the weekend arrangements.

结束状态.所处地点: Home bedroom at 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong
结束状态.心情: Fatigued, frustrated, but grateful for the minor accident, while feeling warmed and reflective due to the support from my husband.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Sunday, the aftermath of the accident still lingered. Yu Xiaowei distracted herself by confiding in friends, handling insurance claims, and proceeding with long-planned household purchases. She also organized a family dinner to celebrate the return of balance to life, finding positivity amid the setbacks.

events.name: Confide in fellow runner Shen Peiwen
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei took the initiative to call her running friend Shen Peiwen, detailing yesterday's accident and her subsequent unease and reflections. Shen Peiwen empathized deeply, sharing her own experience of a minor collision due to fatigue when she first started driving, and offered practical advice such as listening to light music to calm down before driving, and ensuring to switch drivers or take a break when feeling tired. The empathy and sharing from her friend made Yu Xiaowei feel much better.

events.name: Communicating with my brother remotely.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei also briefly mentioned the accident to her younger brother, Yu Xiaofeng, who lives in Shenzhen, via WeChat. Her brother immediately sent a series of concerned messages, sharing some office relaxation exercises and tips to relieve eye strain. He reminded his sister to take breaks no matter how busy she was at work, and the deep bond between the siblings was palpable even through the screen.

events.name: Follow up on insurance claims.
events.description: In the afternoon, the claims specialist from the insurance company called to confirm the accident details and materials with her. Yu Xiaowei provided a clear and professional description. The specialist informed her of the preliminary loss assessment amount and repair plan, and designated a cooperating auto repair shop. Drawing on her dual experience as both a customer and an agent, she politely provided feedback to the specialist on several aspects of the online reporting process that could be made clearer.

events.name: On-site selection of new furniture for mother.
events.description: Although an accident had occurred, the plan to improve the mother's living environment was not put on hold. In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei and her husband, Zhang Weiming, took advantage of the fact that the caregiver, Aunt Li, was at home looking after the mother and children, and went together to a large furniture store near Prince Edward Road West. They personally tested several electric nursing beds and armchairs that they had previously shortlisted online. In the end, based on comfort, ease of operation, and price, they selected one, made the payment, and arranged for delivery and installation the following day.

events.name: Family dinner celebrates the new balance.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei suggested having hot pot at home to celebrate her mother's smooth recovery under professional care and to mark the family's newfound balance after adjustments. Her husband prepared the ingredients, while she and the children set the table. Her mother smiled and directed from the side, creating a warm and lively atmosphere.

events.name: Due to consuming a large amount at a gathering, I went to bed early.
events.description: Due to the hearty dinner, Yu Xiaowei felt full and decided to rest early to aid digestion and recovery.

During the day, she works efficiently, and in the evening, she systematically strengthens her relationship with the caregiver through a formal family meeting, celebrating the success of the new caregiving model.

events.name: Subway Commuting and Work Preparation
events.description: Due to her car being in for repairs, Yu Xiaowei took the subway to work today, with a one-way commute lasting about 90 minutes. She used this time to read industry news on her phone and roughly planned her client contact list for the week. Although the commute became longer, the mental burden of not having to drive was actually reduced.

events.name: Preparing for a family meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei took a moment to communicate with her husband, Zhang Weiming, via WeChat. They reviewed the performance of the caregiver, Auntie Li, over the past week and gathered scattered feedback from her mother and children. On her way home from work, she made a special trip to the mall to select an elegant thank-you card and a practical hand cream gift set, which she planned to present to Auntie Li during the family meeting that evening.

events.name: New furniture delivered and installed
events.description: In the morning, the staff from the furniture store delivered the newly purchased electric nursing bed and armchair to the home and proceeded to install and adjust them in the bedroom of Chen Meiling, the mother. Although Yu Xiaowei was at work, she kept track of the progress through the home camera and real-time updates from her husband. After trying out the new furniture, her mother was very satisfied and made a special call to express her gratitude to her daughter.

events.name: Warm Family Appreciation Meeting
events.description: After dinner, the whole family gathered in the living room with caregiver Auntie Li. Chen Meiling, the mother, took the lead and sincerely thanked Auntie Li for her professionalism and patience, encouraging the children to share fun moments they had spent with her. Yu Xiaowei, on behalf of the family, delivered a speech expressing gratitude for Auntie Li’s help in ensuring a smooth transition for the family. She also mentioned that they would adopt Auntie Li’s suggestion to adjust the placement of rehabilitation equipment in the living room. Zhang Weiming was responsible for recording the key points of the meeting. Finally, Yu Xiaowei presented a thank-you card and a gift, which deeply moved Auntie Li. This meeting formally established a stable and mutually respectful cooperative relationship between both parties.

events.name: Retrieve the repaired vehicle
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei took leave and left work early to go to the repair shop. She carefully inspected the repair work on the vehicle's front bumper, confirmed that the paint had no color difference and was installed smoothly, paid the repair fee, and drove the car back home.

events.name: Reflection and Adjustment of Life's Pace
events.description: After experiencing the accident and having deep conversations with her family, Yu Xiaowei began consciously adjusting her pace. She politely declined a non-urgent evening client consultation and opted for a phone call instead. Before going to bed that night, she decided to take her husband’s advice and dedicate her evenings over the next week as much as possible to rest and family, reducing unnecessary overtime work and social engagements.

Afterward, they contacted a community recycling organization to properly dispose of the old bed and chair, making their mother’s bedroom more spacious and tidy.

2025-08.daily_overview: A Sunday brimming with passion and inspiration. Yu Xiaowei spent the first half of the day at home, focusing on handling and continuing the social interactions from the class reunion and exploring new professional knowledge. In the afternoon, inspired by her daughter's ideas and initial concepts, she visited Cantonese embroidery teacher Wu Xiuying, where she received valuable support and advice. This helped her determine the direction for exploring the modernization of traditional craftsmanship. The entire day revolved around deepening family bonds, social connections, and personal interests.

events.name: Continuing the enthusiasm of the class reunion.
events.description: At home in the morning, Yu Xiaowei opened WhatsApp and saw that her high school classmates' group was still buzzing with discussions about last night's gathering. She shared the group photo from the party once again and tagged He Junjie in the group, thanking him for his thoughtful organization, [It’s wonderful to have everyone reunited, and looking at the photos feels like the laughter is still echoing in my ears]. Afterward, she exchanged a few private messages with Zhou Minyi, who had returned from Shenzhen, and they agreed to meet again the next time she was back in Hong Kong.

events.name: Start RSU system learning
events.description: After dealing with social messages, Yu Xiaowei sat in front of the computer in her study. Reflecting on her confusion about certain clauses when signing the RSU agreement a few days ago, she realized she must systematically master the relevant knowledge. She opened the company's internal knowledge base and searched for documents related to [equity incentives], while also creating a new electronic folder named [RSU Learning]. She also bookmarked several financial news websites and authoritative financial blogger channels on YouTube as materials for further study.

events.name: Visiting a Cantonese Embroidery Master to Seek Inspiration for Innovation
events.description: In the afternoon, as the sky grew slightly overcast, Yu Xiaowei took her daughter Zhang Yuxin’s innocent words about "embroidering flowers on a schoolbag" along with some simple sketches she had drawn, and went to visit Teacher Wu Xiuying in Sham Shui Po. She explained in detail to Teacher Wu how her daughter’s inspiration had sparked her own initial idea of bringing Cantonese embroidery into the daily lives of young people, such as creating backpacks and coasters with Cantonese embroidery elements. Teacher Wu was delighted to hear this and expressed her support, saying, "Preserving heritage isn’t about placing it in a museum—it truly lives on when young people embrace it." Drawing on traditional patterns, the teacher guided her on how to simplify designs, choose more modern and vibrant color schemes, and shared techniques for ensuring durability when embroidering on everyday fabrics like cotton and linen. This visit opened up new perspectives for Yu Xiaowei.

events.name: Rehabilitation Training: Swimming and Strength Exercises
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei went to a gym near her home for rehabilitation training. She completed 30 minutes of breaststroke, focusing on improving endurance, followed by 15 minutes of core and lower body strength training using equipment to enhance stability. After the workout, she performed foot stretches and felt good.

events.name: Weekend Family Dinner and Sharing
events.description: In the evening, mother Chen Meiling prepared a table full of delicious Cantonese home-cooked dishes. During dinner, Yu Xiaowei excitedly shared with her family that Teacher Wu had supported her new idea. Upon hearing that her own words had been praised by the teacher, her daughter Zhang Yuxin was so happy that she danced with joy. Although her husband Zhang Weiming didn't know much about embroidery, he also encouraged her, saying, "If you like it, give it a try."

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong.
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and cheerful, with the leisure of the weekend and a little anticipation for the new day.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and brimming with inspiration, Ms. Wu's support filled her with confidence in the innovation of Cantonese embroidery. The warm family atmosphere and the sense of relaxation after exercise added to her contentment.

2025-08.daily_overview: On the last rest day of the week, the theme was family companionship, deepening interests, and work preparation. In the morning, the whole family participated in rehabilitation training and celebrations. In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei efficiently immersed herself in organizing RSU materials and engaging in remote collaboration on Cantonese embroidery innovation. She also made initial contact with a classmate regarding potential business consultation over the phone, demonstrating her ability to balance family, personal growth, and career development.

events.name: Home Rehabilitation Training and Celebration
events.description: In the morning, accompanied by her husband Zhang Weiming and their children, Yu Xiaowei went to a nearby gym for her final rehabilitation session of the week. Under the remote guidance of her coach, she completed 30 minutes of low-intensity stationary cycling and some core stability exercises. After the workout, the family enjoyed afternoon tea at a nearby cha chaan teng. The children ordered pineapple buns, while Yu Xiaowei sipped on Hong Kong-style milk tea, celebrating her successful adaptation to the initial phase of her recovery.

events.name: Deepen the Organization of RSU Learning Materials
events.description: After the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei returned to the study and began systematically organizing the RSU materials collected yesterday. She categorized and archived internal company documents, web articles, and video links into the [RSU Learning] folder, and created brief content summary notes for each type of material, initially establishing a knowledge framework.

events.name: Collaborate with Embroidery Enthusiasts Remotely to Spark Creativity
events.description: During a break from organizing materials, Yu Xiaowei contacted her embroidery friend He Meiling in Shenzhen via WeChat voice message. She excitedly shared the inspiration she had gained from Teacher Wu the day before, as well as her preliminary ideas for creating lifestyle-oriented Cantonese embroidery products. He Meiling was very supportive and added many suggestions from the perspectives of product design and market appeal, such as experimenting with serialized designs and incorporating modern minimalist styles. The two agreed that He Meiling would compile some outstanding design cases and send them to Yu for reference.

events.name: Preliminary Response to Student Business Inquiry
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei remembered the company group insurance consultation that He Junjie had privately mentioned after the class reunion. During her break, she took the time to review the company's latest group medical product materials. Considering the likely small-to-medium enterprise scale of He Junjie's company, she mentally sketched out several preliminary plans with different focuses, preparing to discuss them with him in detail on a workday.

events.name: Preparing for innovative attempts in Yue embroidery.
events.description: In the evening, after He Meiling sent some links to design case studies, Yu Xiaowei browsed through them and felt deeply inspired. She found a piece of leftover cotton-linen fabric and some embroidery thread, then began sketching a simplified version of a traditional lychee pattern (symbolizing good fortune), contemplating how to incorporate it into the backpack accessory she had in mind.

events.name: Temporarily staying up late to handle work emails.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei received an urgent email from an important client, requesting her to promptly respond with adjustments to an insurance plan. She spent some time handling the matter, which caused her to go to bed later than planned.

2025-08.daily_overview: The new week of workdays was filled with surprises and substantial progress. Yu Xiaowei officially received the detailed notification of the equity incentive grant in the office. The valuable news left her both excited and feeling a significant sense of responsibility, prompting an in-depth discussion with her younger brother. Meanwhile, she proactively followed up on the business opportunities brought by the class reunion, demonstrating excellent professional sensitivity and initiative.

events.name: Official Notice of Equity Incentive Acceptance
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei logged into the company system from her office at the AIA Building in Wan Chai and received the official RSU grant notification email. She carefully read the document, clarifying the grant quantity, the four-year vesting schedule, and noting the preliminary valuation based on the current company stock price. After doing a quick mental calculation, she realized that the value of this floating asset far exceeded her expectations. She felt both the joy of being recognized by the company and gained a more concrete understanding of the long-term nature and volatility of this [paper wealth].

events.name: Have an in-depth discussion with my younger brother about RSUs.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei couldn't wait to send a screenshot of the notification to her younger brother, Yu Xiaofeng, who works at an internet company in Shenzhen, and immediately made a phone call. She shared the joy and also candidly expressed her concerns about value fluctuations and future tax issues. From the perspective of a practitioner, Yu Xiaofeng analyzed the long-term holding potential and reminded her to pay attention to tax planning after the RSUs vest, suggesting she could consult professionals. This conversation took her understanding of RSUs from a conceptual level to the specifics of practical operation.

events.name: Proactively report to the supervisor and express gratitude.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei took the initiative to meet with her supervisor, Liang Zhenhua, briefly reporting that she had carefully read and understood the RSU agreement and once again expressing her gratitude for the recognition from the company and him personally. Liang Zhenhua encouraged her to continue working hard and to translate this incentive into even more outstanding performance.

events.name: Follow up on classmate He Junjie's group insurance inquiry.
events.description: After handling the RSU matters, Yu Xiaowei had a formal phone conversation with He Junjie. She inquired in detail about the number of employees, age structure, and existing benefits at his company, and gave a preliminary introduction to the advantages of group medical insurance. He Junjie raised some concerns, which Yu Xiaowei addressed one by one, and they agreed that she would prepare a detailed proposal for him at a later stage.

events.name: Prepare retirement planning materials for classmate Wang Zhiyuan.
events.description: Before leaving work, Yu Xiaowei began preparing for the retirement and pension needs consultation for another classmate, Wang Zhiyuan. She organized the key selling points and applicable scenarios of products such as annuity insurance and savings dividend insurance, and designed a simple needs analysis questionnaire. This was to ensure a more efficient understanding of their family's financial situation during the next meeting.

events.name: Evening Family Time and Sharing
events.description: Arriving home in the evening, Yu Xiaowei shared the good news about receiving RSUs with her family at the dinner table. Her husband, Zhang Weiming, was proud of her, and her mother also praised her repeatedly. Although the children didn’t fully understand, they were happy to see their mother’s joy. Yu Xiaowei felt that this incentive was not only a recognition of her career but also a reward for the support of her entire family.

events.name: Slight headache due to stress, going to bed early.
events.description: Due to a busy day at work and the excitement from the RSU, Yu Xiaowei felt a slight headache in the evening and decided to rest early to regain energy.

2025-08.daily_overview: Tuesday's work pace became more in-depth and specific. On one hand, Yu Xiaowei began solidly preparing performance materials for her year-end promotion goal. On the other hand, she continued to delve deeply into the complex terms of RSUs and proactively sought answers from internal company resources. At the same time, she conducted her first formal retirement planning interview with her classmate Wang Zhiyuan, marking the launch of another business line.

She created clear charts and tables for key indicators such as the number of policies, total premiums, and customer renewal rates, and included brief descriptions of several typical successful service cases. These quantitative pieces of evidence serve as the core materials for her upcoming promotion presentation to Director Liang Zhenhua.

events.name: Deeply study the RSU agreement terms
events.description: During her lunch breaks and work intervals, Yu Xiaowei began to carefully study the RSU agreement documents. She highlighted key professional sections such as [vesting conditions], [exercise methods], and [tax provisions], and compiled a list of core questions about the parts she didn’t understand, such as [whether shares must be sold upon vesting] and [how local taxes in Hong Kong are calculated].

events.name: Consult internally within the company regarding RSU details.
events.description: With the list of questions, Yu Xiaowei contacted a colleague from the Human Resources department who is responsible for employee benefits via the company's internal communication software, scheduling a brief phone consultation in hopes of obtaining official and accurate information regarding the RSU vesting process and company-level tax guidance.

events.name: Interview with classmate Wang Zhiyuan regarding retirement planning needs.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowei and Wang Zhiyuan met at a quiet café in Central. She guided Wang Zhiyuan to describe in detail his family members’ ages, income, existing assets, and their vision for retirement life, while providing a preliminary explanation of the potential role of insurance tools in retirement planning. This meeting felt more like a financial review between friends, with a relaxed yet professional atmosphere. The two agreed to delve deeper into the discussion with specific plans during their next meeting.

events.name: Properly preserve the RSU documents and contemplate the planning.
events.description: At home in the evening, Yu Xiaowei downloaded the electronic version of the RSU grant notice and valuation documents, saving them in an encrypted folder on her personal computer. She began to contemplate how this future asset would fit into their family finances, whether it would affect her originally conservative financial management style, and how to plan for it together with her husband.

events.name: Returning late from a social gathering
events.description: After the interview, Yu Xiaowei ran into a few former colleagues and was invited to join them for dinner. She gladly accepted and enjoyed a relaxed social evening, though this led to her returning home quite late.

2025-08.daily_overview: Thursday's work focused on consolidation and planning. Yu Xiaowei further prepared client cases for her promotion and delved into the tax details of RSUs. In terms of personal interests, she made her first substantive attempt to integrate Cantonese embroidery into daily life—practicing new needlework techniques on fabric to bring her creative ideas to fruition. The financial discussion with her husband in the evening brought more clarity to their future plans.

events.name: Organize and Prepare Client Case Studies for Promotion Reporting
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei reviewed the customer service records from the past year and carefully selected three or four representative successful cases, including complex claims handling and comprehensive family protection planning. She compiled these cases along with thank-you messages from clients into a supplementary document to demonstrate her professional service capabilities and customer retention skills.

events.name: In-depth study on RSU tax issues
events.description: Utilizing breaks during work and evenings, Yu Xiaowei began tackling the most complex part of RSU learning—taxation. She consulted materials, attempting to understand Hong Kong's tax regulations on stock earnings and the potential tax differences arising from various holding strategies (such as selling immediately after vesting versus long-term holding). She then summarized her findings in notes using language she could easily comprehend.

events.name: Draft the initial proposal for student insurance.
events.description: Based on the discussions with He Junjie and Wang Zhiyuan in the past few days, Yu Xiaowei has drafted preliminary personalized insurance proposals for each of them. For He Junjie, the focus is on the flexibility and cost-effectiveness of group medical plans, while for Wang Zhiyuan, the proposal centers on constructing a product portfolio framework for retirement planning. She has also outlined the follow-up steps and timeline.

events.name: The First Attempt at Making Cantonese Embroidery More Lifestyle-Oriented
events.description: After dinner, Yu Xiaowei took out the leftover cotton-linen fabric and embroidery thread she had prepared earlier and began her first hands-on attempt. Following Teacher Wu's advice, she used a simplified stitching technique to embroider the lychee pattern and experimented with two different color combinations. Though it was just a small sample, every stitch brought her the joy of creation. After finishing, she took a photo and sent it to Teacher Wu and He Meiling to ask for their opinions.

events.name: Discussing family financial planning with my husband.
events.description: After the children went to bed, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming had a detailed discussion about the RSUs in the living room. She explained to her husband the nature of this asset, its potential value, and its long-term volatility. Both agreed that this additional asset would be a positive factor for future family goals, such as a trip to Japan and their children's education. However, they believed it should be viewed conservatively and should not disrupt their existing steady financial planning rhythm. They also discussed whether it was necessary to consult an external financial advisor.

events.name: Suspend exercise due to muscle soreness.
events.description: Due to muscle soreness from yesterday, Yu Xiaowei decided to rest today, avoiding formal exercise and only doing simple stretching.

Upon returning home, she quickly switched back to her roles as a mother and wife, discussing promotion plans with her husband and preparing for the children’s new semester and a review of the family finances.

events.name: Weekend Morning Run Social

When buying drinks afterward, Yu Xiaowei took out her own cup and recommended this environmentally friendly and cost-saving method to Shen Peiwen, who expressed her intention to try it next time.

events.name: Afternoon tea with my best friend Lin Jiaxin
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei arrived on time for the appointment, meeting Lin Jiaxin at a coffee shop in Kowloon Tong. The two ordered coffee and cake and began a conversation that lasted over two hours. Yu Xiaowei shared her joy of receiving RSUs, the progress of her new Cantonese embroidery work, and also confided her slight nervousness about preparing for a promotion. As a teacher, Lin Jiaxin offered her many suggestions on public speaking and presentation. They also exchanged amusing stories about their children starting school and shared insights on education.

She shared in greater detail her goal of being promoted to regional sales manager, her current preparations, and the potential changes in her work if she succeeded, such as increased management responsibilities and possibly a busier schedule. Zhang Weiming expressed his full support and discussed with her how to adjust their household responsibilities to accommodate these possible changes.

events.name: Create a shopping list for the child's school opening.
events.description: After the chat, Yu Xiaowei took out her notebook and, based on the notices sent by her son and daughter's schools, began to create a detailed list of items needed for the new semester, such as stationery, school uniforms, and sportswear. She also checked the existing inventory at home to avoid duplicate purchases.

events.name: Preliminary organization of this month's household expenses.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowei opened the budgeting app on her phone, quickly reviewed and summarized the main household expenses for August up to that point, including daily spending and her child’s extracurricular class fees. This gave her a rough idea of the month’s expenditures, preparing her for the formal financial review in a couple of days.

Simultaneously, she began actively expanding her business collaboration network.

events.name: Systematically organize RSU study notes.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei systematically organized the scattered learning content from the previous two weeks about RSUs into a well-structured electronic note, covering basic concepts, vesting mechanisms, key tax considerations, and long-term evaluation approaches. At the end of the note, she specifically wrote a reflection on how to reconcile this type of fluctuating asset with her relatively conservative financial mindset.

The two had a video call to discuss in greater depth the considerations for bringing Cantonese embroidery lifestyle products to a small-scale market, including design serialization, pricing, and balancing craftsmanship with efficiency. He Meiling’s suggestions were very practical, helping Yu Xiaowei’s ideas become more grounded.

She proactively reached out to him (Xu Jiaming) via WeChat, briefly introduced herself, and expressed her interest in exploring potential collaboration opportunities in insurance and financial planning. The response was positive, and the two agreed to meet in person when Yu Xiaowei visits her brother in Shenzhen in September.

events.name: Monthly Family Financial Review Meeting
events.description: After the children fell asleep at night, Yu Xiaowei and her husband Zhang Weiming sat in the living room, opened the budgeting app and a pile of bills, and seriously reviewed their family expenses for August. They found that due to the later-stage rehabilitation therapy fees for their mother, the concentrated shopping before the children started school, and several family meals out, the total expenditure was about 15% higher than in a regular month.

events.name: Adjust Family Budget and Savings Plan
events.description: After discussion, the two decided to strictly control non-essential expenses in September, reduce dining out and entertainment shopping, and plan to transfer part of the upcoming third-quarter bonus into the family emergency reserve fund account. This move aims to enhance financial resilience and prepare for potential unexpected expenses in the future. Yu Xiaowei promptly updated the budget settings for September in her mobile app.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to financial pressure.

2025-09.daily_overview: Today is a busy yet well-organized workday. Yu Xiaowei is simultaneously advancing two important agendas during breaks at work and in her family time after work: on one hand, carefully observing and verifying her daughter Zhang Yuxin's emerging musical talent, and on the other hand, seeking support from superiors for the company's business expansion. Her day alternates between workplace reporting and family discoveries, reflecting the typical ESFJ personality's emphasis on interpersonal relationships and family responsibilities.

events.name: Observing the potential musical talent in my daughter.
events.description: In the morning when she took her daughter to school and in the evening when she picked her up, Yu Xiaowei paid special attention to Zhang Yuxin's reactions to sounds. She noticed that while watching cartoons, her daughter would unconsciously hum along to the theme songs. When her grandmother, Chen Meiling, hummed classic Cantonese opera tunes in the kitchen, little Yuxin would also stop playing with her toys, tilt her head, listen intently, and try to imitate a line or two. Yu Xiaowei felt pleasantly surprised and secretly recorded these moments on her phone, including a clip of her daughter swaying to the rhythm of the music in a 'dance' she made up herself. As a mother who values tradition and family bonds, these subtle discoveries led her to seriously consider nurturing her child's interests.

events.name: Report to the supervisor on the progress of business expansion in Shenzhen.
events.description: In the afternoon, during the team's weekly meeting, Yu Xiaowei seized the opportunity to briefly report to Liang Zhenhua, the Regional Sales Director, about the cross-border cooperation channel established with independent financial advisor Xu Jiaming during her trip to Shenzhen earlier this month (September 12). She presented the initial communication outcomes and emphasized the potential value of this channel for reaching high-net-worth clients in Shenzhen and expanding into the Greater Bay Area market. Rather than simply reporting, she framed it as a request for guidance and company resource support, demonstrating the strategic thinking of an experienced salesperson. Liang Zhenhua showed keen interest and asked her to submit a more detailed written report after the meeting.

events.name: Make preliminary preparations for the visit of my brother's family.
events.description: In the evening, while chatting with her husband Zhang Weiming, Yu Xiaowei mentioned her plan to invite her brother Yu Xiaofeng and his family to Hong Kong during the National Day holiday. The two discussed where to have the meal and, considering the presence of elderly family members and children, felt that having a hot pot dinner at home might be more comfortable and cozy than going out. Yu Xiaowei noted down the list of hot pot ingredients and drinks that needed to be purchased in advance in her phone's memo app.

events.name: Brief social interactions during work breaks
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei and her colleague Su Lishan, as usual, went to the tea restaurant near the company and quickly finished their lunch. As they ate, they chatted—Su Lishan shared amusing stories about her daughter who had just started kindergarten, while Yu Xiaowei vented about a difficult client she had been dealing with recently. This kind of daily, casual conversation was an important way for them to maintain their friendship as colleagues and relieve work-related stress.

events.name: Stayed up late handling emails due to urgent client needs.
events.description: After 22:00, Yu Xiaowei received an urgent email from an important client inquiring about adjustments to policy details. To maintain the client relationship, she decided to reply that same night, spending approximately 45 minutes carefully reviewing and drafting the response, which caused her to go to bed later than planned.

2025-09.daily_overview: Today is a crucial day for Yu Xiaowei's proactive health management. She has scheduled a full day of comprehensive medical check-ups, a significant step taken after becoming more aware of her own risk prevention due to her mother's history of stroke. In the evening, she shared her observations about her daughter's musical activities with her family, shifting the family discussion from health to children's education, all within a warm and engaging atmosphere.

events.name: Share observations about the daughter with the husband.
events.description: Before going to bed last night, Yu Xiaowei took out her phone and watched the video clips of their daughter Zhang Yuxin recorded during the day with her husband Zhang Weiming. Pointing at their daughter dancing along to the music, she excitedly said, "Look, doesn’t Yuxin seem particularly sensitive to rhythm? It reminds me of when I was a child—the first time I saw my grandmother embroidering, I was instantly captivated by it. It’s that feeling of being naturally drawn to something." Zhang Weiming smiled as he watched the video, agreeing that their daughter was indeed adorable, but he also pragmatically noted that they should observe further and not jump to conclusions too soon. This lighthearted sharing laid the groundwork for a more formal discussion about music education later on.

events.name: Go to the hospital for in-depth physical examination registration and preliminary check-up.
events.description: Yu Xiaowei specifically took half a day off and went alone in the morning to the health examination center at the Hong Kong Sanatorium & Hospital in Happy Valley. Due to her mother Chen Meiling's experience with a stroke, she pays special attention to cardiovascular and cerebrovascular health. She opted for a comprehensive package at her own expense, which includes specialized screenings such as carotid artery ultrasound and advanced heart examinations. After completing the registration and payment, she first underwent basic tests like fasting blood draws. The entire process was quiet and orderly.

events.name: Complete specialized screening and communicate with the doctor.
events.description: During the intervals of waiting for and undergoing various examinations, Yu Xiaowei appeared somewhat silent and serious. While having the carotid artery ultrasound, she couldn’t help but briefly mention her mother’s medical history to the operating doctor and asked how the risk should be assessed for someone like her, who has a family history but maintains regular exercise. The doctor reassured her that regular screening itself is the best prevention. The hours-long examination left her feeling slightly fatigued, but it also strengthened her resolve to integrate health management into her daily routine.

events.name: Receive Preliminary Results and Schedule a Report Interpretation Appointment
events.description: After all the procedures were completed, the nurse informed her that routine data such as blood pressure, height, and weight were all normal, and the detailed blood and imaging reports would require 3-5 working days to be ready. Yu Xiaowei then scheduled an appointment at the front desk for Dr. Zhou Wenbin to interpret the reports, arranging it within a week after the reports were issued.

events.name: Family Communication After Work
events.description: When she returned home in the evening, Yu Xiaowei told her husband and mother that she had undergone a comprehensive physical examination that day to reassure her family. Her mother, Chen Meiling, advised her not to overwork herself and to get plenty of rest. As Yu Xiaowei massaged her mother’s shoulders, she felt that the mutual care within the family was an important source of strength that supported her moving forward.

events.name: Adjusting to an early bedtime due to pre-examination anxiety.
events.description: Due to the energy spent on the daytime medical check-up and some nervousness about the results, Yu Xiaowei decided to rest early to ensure physical recovery.

2025-09.daily_overview: Today was filled with planning and communication. At work, Yu Xiaowei confirmed the team's social arrangements, while at home, she proactively proposed two important plans: organizing a family outing for the Mid-Autumn Festival and discussing her daughter's musical initiation. Her role as the central coordinator of the family is particularly prominent, effectively bridging communication between her professional and personal life.

events.name: Confirm team dinner arrangements and coordinate family matters
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei received a formal notification from her supervisor Liang Zhenhua on the company communication software regarding the team dinner scheduled for the following evening. She promptly replied to confirm her attendance and immediately sent a message to her husband Zhang Weiming in the family WeChat group: [Company dinner tomorrow night, will be back late, don’t wait for me for dinner.] At the same time, she privately sent a voice message to her mother Chen Meiling, asking her to help take care of the children’s dinner and homework. Her efficient time management allowed her to handle work-related social engagements with ease.

events.name: Proposing a family outing during the Mid-Autumn Festival.
events.description: During dinner, Yu Xiaowei, seeing her mother in good spirits, suggested an idea: "Mom, the Mid-Autumn Festival is coming up, and the lantern festival at Victoria Park seems especially beautiful this year. How about we all go together as a family? We could go the day before the festival—it might be less crowded." She turned to her husband: "Weiming, what do you think? We could rent a wheelchair and take Mom for a leisurely stroll." Zhang Weiming agreed and started thinking about transportation and what to bring. At first, Chen Meiling, the mother, was worried about troubling her family, but after hearing the eager persuasion from her children and grandchildren, she finally smiled and agreed. The suggestion instantly brightened the atmosphere at the dinner table.

events.name: Have an in-depth discussion with my husband about our daughter's music initiation.
events.description: After the children went to bed at night, Yu Xiaowei and her husband had a deep conversation in the living room. She played their daughter's video again and said earnestly: "I don’t want to force her to learn anything, but I feel that if she is genuinely interested, we should give her a chance to explore." Zhang Weiming thought it over and agreed, but raised a practical concern: "Learning the piano requires a significant investment of time and money. What if it’s just a passing interest?" After an honest discussion, the couple reached a phased consensus: they would first buy a beginner electronic keyboard as a birthday gift and a test, while also consulting their close friend Lin Jiaxin, a primary school teacher, to observe their daughter’s reaction before deciding whether to enroll her in formal lessons. This discussion reflected the complementary balance of rational and emotional thinking between the couple.

events.name: Due to family discussions, staying up late.
events.description: The in-depth discussion with her husband lasted late into the night, and Yu Xiaowei was emotionally invested, which led to her staying up later than usual.

As an elementary school teacher, Lin Jiaxin offered highly professional advice: "For cultivating interests at this age, the key lies in guidance rather than coercion. You can start with musical games and listening to different styles of music, observing her sustained reactions. If you really want to give it a try, an electronic keyboard is a good choice—it's low-cost and highly engaging." She also recommended several well-regarded children's music institutions. This consultation gave Yu Xiaowei more confidence.

She placed the order directly, filled in her home address, and planned to surprise her daughter on her birthday.

events.name: Complete the Cantonese embroidery work and plan new creations.
events.description: Returning home from work early, Yu Xiaowei set aside an hour for Cantonese embroidery in her study after finishing household chores. She successfully completed the finishing touches on two orchid-themed coasters, with neat patterns and elegant color combinations. Admiring her work, she felt a sense of calm satisfaction. Next, she flipped through a book on traditional patterns and was drawn to the simple yet elegant "回" pattern, deciding to use it to decorate an eco-friendly bag. She measured the dimensions of an unused bag at home and planned to start creating a prototype over the weekend.

events.name: Attend team dinner
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowei and her colleague Su Lishan went together to an authentic Hong Kong-style restaurant in Wan Chai. The atmosphere at the gathering was lively, with their supervisor Liang Zhenhua expressing gratitude for the team's efforts. Yu Xiaowei and her colleagues sat around a table, enjoying dishes like roast goose and steamed grouper slices. Setting aside their work roles, they shared amusing stories from their lives and parenting experiences. She also chatted with her colleague Guo Junwei, who is from Guangzhou, about the differences in insurance products in the Greater Bay Area. The harmonious atmosphere made her feel a strong sense of team cohesion.

events.description: The dinner ended close to ten o’clock, and Yu Xiaowei took the subway home. Her husband, Zhang Weiming, was still waiting for her in the living room. With a hint of excitement, she shared the interesting anecdotes from the dinner and her supervisor’s recognition of the team’s work. Though tired, the pleasant social experience had left her in high spirits, and the simple sharing also allowed her husband to sense the positive aspects of her work environment.

events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowei and her husband took their two children for a leisurely hike at the nearby Lion Rock Country Park. She intentionally guided her family to slow down and appreciate the greenery of the mountains and the distant cityscape. Their son, Zhang Zixuan, ran ahead energetically, while their daughter, Zhang Yuxin, was captivated by the wildflowers along the path. As Yu Xiaowei looked after her daughter, she chatted with her husband, seamlessly integrating the concept of [healthy living] into their family activity. This hike was not only a form of exercise but also a meaningful opportunity for quality family time.

events.description: After the lunch break, Yu Xiaowei sat in front of the computer and carefully checked the official website of the Victoria Park Mid-Autumn Lantern Festival. She specifically marked the locations of the accessible pathways, wheelchair rental points, and dining areas. Using a map, she planned the most convenient public transportation route from home (taking the MTR Kwun Tong Line and transferring to the Island Line) and noted down a backup taxi booking number. Considering her mother's health, she decided to book an accessible taxi a day in advance. Her meticulous planning stemmed from her sense of responsibility to ensure the family outing went smoothly.

events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei video-called her brother Yu Xiaofeng in Shenzhen via WeChat. On the screen, her brother’s family was happily gathered together. She formally extended an invitation: "Bring your kids back to Hong Kong during the National Day holiday! Are you free on the 4th? Come over to my place for hotpot!" Her brother readily agreed and mentioned he would bring some special snacks from Shenzhen. The siblings then caught up on each other’s lives and settled on a specific time. The anticipation of the family gathering filled Yu Xiaowei with warmth.

events.description: At night, after the children had fallen asleep, Yu Xiaowei did not do embroidery. Instead, she chose to lean against the headboard and flip through a magazine about family finance. This was one of her ways to gather information and relax her mind. When she read an article about education fund planning, she thought of her daughter's future interest development and marked it with a pen.

events.description: Today is Zhang Yuxin's birthday. In the morning, Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming presented their daughter with a gift—a carefully wrapped electronic keyboard. Little Yuxin's eyes lit up as she unwrapped it, and she curiously pressed the keys, producing different sounds. Yu Xiaowei didn't rush to teach her; instead, she sat beside her, smiling as she watched her explore freely. Occasionally, she imitated the notes her daughter played, making the little girl giggle with delight. The morning was filled with a warm and joyful birthday atmosphere.

events.name: Schedule a flu vaccine for the whole family
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei logged onto the Kowloon City District Community Health Centre's website to check the vaccination schedule for the new year's flu vaccine. She consulted her husband and parents separately, confirming that everyone was willing to get vaccinated. Subsequently, she skillfully booked the morning slot on October 4 for all six members of her family. Considering that her mother might have a weaker immune system after suffering a stroke, she felt this preventive measure was very necessary.

events.name: Establish an equity incentive management file.
events.description: Taking advantage of the quiet Sunday afternoon, Yu Xiaowei created an electronic folder named [Equity Incentive Management] on her computer in the study. She organized and archived the grant notification emails she had received earlier, the notes she had taken during her self-study, and the records of her consultations with her younger brother and the bank manager. She also created a simple Excel spreadsheet to track the vesting schedule for the coming years. This move marked the beginning of a systematic approach to managing her newly acquired assets.

events.name: Discuss ideas for updating sports equipment with fellow runners.
events.description: In the evening, while jogging near her neighborhood, Yu Xiaowei ran into Shen Peiwen, who was also out for a run. As they jogged together, Yu Xiaowei mentioned that she felt her running shoes didn’t provide as much cushioning as before and that her yoga mat was getting old. Shen Peiwen immediately offered a warm recommendation: "I recently bought a pair from the new cushioning series, and they feel great! How about we go shopping in Mong Kok this weekend? There are plenty of stores there where you can try them on." Yu Xiaowei happily agreed, and the two made plans to go shopping together the following weekend.

events.name: Due to the birthday celebration, I ate a bit more than usual.

events.description: After returning home from work, Yu Xiaowei noticed that her daughter Zhang Yuxin wasn't constantly playing with the electronic keyboard. Instead, she would sometimes draw, sometimes play with toys, and only occasionally walk over to randomly press a few keys to make sounds. She exchanged a glance with her husband, realizing that this was exactly the [observation period] Lin Jiaxin had mentioned. They didn't urge or instruct her, simply allowing their daughter to interact with this new toy in the most natural way.

events.name: First Attempt at Mindfulness Meditation
events.description: In the evening, after completing a piece of Yue embroidery, Yu Xiaowei felt mentally exhausted and her thoughts were scattered. Remembering the recommendation from her running friend Shen Peiwen, she took out her phone and downloaded the [Calm] app. Sitting on her yoga mat, she followed a 10-minute guided breathing meditation, trying to focus her attention solely on her breath. At first, her mind would wander, but she patiently brought it back each time. After finishing, she indeed felt some relaxation in her shoulders and neck, and her mind became much calmer. She realized that actively managing emotional stress was just as important as running and yoga.

events.name: Evaluate and plan updates for sports equipment.
events.description: After meditation, Yu Xiaowei checked the soles of her running shoes and found that the wear was indeed quite noticeable. She also tested her yoga mat and felt that its slip resistance had significantly diminished. Considering that her exercise routine had shifted to long-term health maintenance (rather than short-term competition preparation), she believed that investing in high-performance gear was worthwhile and a responsible approach to her own health. She noted down the running shoe brands and yoga mat specifications she needed to research in her phone's memo app.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to work pressure.
events.description: While handling a complex customer case during the day, Yu Xiaowei encountered some resistance, which left her feeling slightly agitated, but she found relief through meditation.

events.name: Night Running and Socializing at Victoria Harbour
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowei changed into her running shoes and took the subway to the gathering point by Victoria Harbour. After meeting up with Shen Peiwen and five or six other running friends, they jogged leisurely along the Avenue of Stars. A gentle autumn breeze blew, and the skyscrapers on the opposite shore were ablaze with lights. As they ran, they chatted, jumping from topics like running gear to children's education and then to recent movies, with no pressure about their pace. Yu Xiaowei felt an unprecedented sense of relaxation—running here had become a way to socialize and enjoy the night view.

events.name: Post-run gathering at a tea restaurant
events.description: After the run, everyone was still in high spirits and headed to a famous tea restaurant in Causeway Bay. The aroma of claypot rice with preserved meats filled the air as they gathered around a table, sharing iced milk tea and delicious food. Shen Peiwen shared amusing anecdotes from a recent marathon, eliciting hearty laughter from the group. Yu Xiaowei talked about her experience trying meditation, which resonated with several fellow runners. This kind of social interaction, based on shared interests and free from any utilitarian motives, felt particularly precious and joyful to her.

events.name: Returning home late at night
events.description: The dinner gathering ended close to midnight. Yu Xiaowei, weary but filled with joy, took a taxi home. Her husband, Zhang Weiming, was still awake, reading by the bedside lamp as he waited for her. She briefly shared the evening's happiness with him, her voice brimming with energy. After a quick wash, she drifted off to sleep with a contented smile on her face.

events.name: Due to overeating during the gathering
events.description: During a tea restaurant gathering after a night run, Yu Xiaowei indulged in high-calorie foods, leading to an increase in intake.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong.
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, looking forward to the evening run and gathering.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, in the bedroom of the home.
结束状态.心情: Extremely joyful and relaxed, enjoying high-quality friendships and pure happy moments.

2025-09.daily_overview: Saturday was a day of harvest and reflection. In the morning, Yu Xiaowei immersed herself in the focused creation of her personal hobbies. In the afternoon, she received authoritative insights and reassuring results regarding her health. In the evening, she made preliminary decisions for her daughter's interest development. With multiple matters settled on this day, she felt grounded and filled with hope.

events.name: Dedicated to the creation of Cantonese embroidery.
events.description: In the morning, while her husband looked after the children, Yu Xiaowei began embroidering the meander pattern on a cloth bag in her study. She stretched the indigo cotton fabric taut and meticulously embroidered the symmetrical meander pattern with golden silk thread. Sunlight streamed in through the window, and the only sound in the room was the faint rustle of the needle and thread passing through the fabric. Over two hours of intense focus allowed her to immerse herself completely in the tranquility of creation, washing away all previous fatigue and distractions.

events.name: Interpret the In-depth Physical Examination Report with a Doctor
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei arrived at Dr. Zhou Wenbin's clinic as scheduled. Dr. Zhou carefully reviewed her reports and explained each indicator one by one. The good news was that all specialized screenings, including carotid ultrasound and heart examinations, showed a very low current risk, and her exercise habits and weight management had played a positive role. Dr. Zhou also provided advice tailored to her family history, recommending that she maintain her current healthy lifestyle and undergo regular monitoring. Holding this "health passport," Yu Xiaowei felt a weight lifted from her heart.

events.name: Convey health good news to family and adjust plans accordingly.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei officially shared the good news from her medical checkup with her husband and mother at the dinner table. The whole family breathed a sigh of relief. Seizing the opportunity, she proposed: "The doctor said my physical foundation is good, but marathon training shouldn’t be too aggressive. I plan to adjust by doing more strength training and yoga regularly, while keeping my running at a comfortable level." This suggestion was met with support from her family.

events.name: Decided to enroll my daughter in short-term music classes.
events.description: Based on observations of her daughter's reaction during the trial class and further discussions with her husband, Yu Xiaowei decided to adopt a compromise: instead of immediately enrolling her daughter in a long-term course, she would first sign her up for a two-month introductory group music class. This approach would provide more systematic guidance without causing excessive pressure or financial burden, allowing for a more accurate assessment of whether her daughter genuinely had a sustained interest. She planned to complete the enrollment over the weekend.

events.name: Taking a walk in the evening to relax.
events.description: To digest the food from the previous night's dinner gathering, Yu Xiaowei took a 30-minute walk around the neighborhood in the evening.

起始状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, Home
起始状态.心情: Calm down, ready to tackle a few important arrangements for the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, at home
结束状态.心情: Peaceful, steadfast, and full of hope, health is confirmed, and family plans are steadily progressing.

state.今日运动: Take a 30-minute walk in the evening.

2025-09.daily_overview: The last day of the weekend was filled with practical preparations for the upcoming week and beyond. Yu Xiaowei systematically planned her off-season training, confirmed transportation for a family trip, organized household financial documents, and drafted a preliminary action plan for a promotion. Like a commander confident of victory, she meticulously arranged everything before taking action.

events.name: Develop a comprehensive health training plan
events.description: In the morning, following the doctor's advice and her own feelings, Yu Xiaowei crafted a detailed off-season training plan for herself in the study. The plan broke away from the previous cycle centered around marathon seasons, instead organizing three moderate-intensity runs, two yoga or Pilates sessions, and one family hike or swim per week in a balanced manner. The core philosophy of the plan was clearly marked as: [Maintain Health, Enjoy the Fun, Prevent Injuries]. This marked the beginning of a new, more mature, and sustainable phase in her athletic career.

events.name: Confirm and book transportation for the Mid-Autumn Festival outing.
events.description: Following the previous plan, Yu Xiaowei called a company that provides accessible taxi services, successfully booked a car, and clearly informed them of the travel needs for tomorrow (the 29th) evening: departing from home to Victoria Park and returning from the park approximately two hours later. After confirming the driver's contact information, she felt that the final piece of the outing plan had fallen into place.

events.name: Organize monthly financial documents.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowei gathered all the bills and receipts scattered around from September, including those in her digital wallets, and began preliminary sorting in the study. She categorized them into income (insurance policy commissions, other part-time earnings) and expenses (medical checkups, gifts for her daughter, daily household costs, transportation, dining, etc.), preparing the data for tomorrow’s monthly financial review.

events.name: Plan the action plan for promotion in the next quarter.
events.description: Taking advantage of the quiet evening hours, Yu Xiaowei opened a new document and began transforming the feedback from the performance review into a concrete action plan. She listed several key points: 1. Take the initiative to conduct a small training session within the team; 2. Deepen the analysis of a customer case from the Shenzhen channel and write a detailed report; 3. Read an introductory book on team management. She broke these three goals down into weekly tasks for the next three months, making the path to promotion clear and actionable.

events.name: Procuring for the National Day family dinner.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowei went to a nearby supermarket with her mother, Chen Meiling, to shop for ingredients for a hotpot dinner during the National Day holiday, when her younger brother and his family would be visiting. Her mother was in high spirits while selecting fresh beef and vegetables, and she said to Yu Xiaowei, "Xiaofeng loves handmade beef balls the most, so let's buy an extra pack." The mother and daughter discussed their choices as they shopped, and the cart was soon filled with food. They returned home with a full load.

events.name: Staying up late due to planning
events.description: It took a considerable amount of time to formulate the training plan and promotion actions, so Yu Xiaowei went to bed later than usual.

起始状态.所处地点: 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong, at home.
起始状态.心情: Proceed in an orderly manner, focusing on wrapping up and planning multiple tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong
结束状态.心情: Well-prepared and filled with a sense of control, I am ready for the upcoming family activities and the new phase of work.

2025-09.daily_overview: Tonight is an evening where family bonds are deeply nourished. The carefully planned Mid-Autumn Festival family outing was a complete success. My mother’s long-awaited smile, the joyful laughter of the children, and the seamless cooperation between husband and wife together painted a heartwarming and blissful family portrait. This event was not just a simple outing but a significant milestone for the family as we emerged from the long-term pressures of caregiving.

events.name: Family Lantern Festival Outing on the Eve of the Mid-Autumn Festival
events.description: In the evening, the pre-booked accessible taxi arrived punctually at their doorstep. Yu Xiaowei and Zhang Weiming carefully helped their mother, Chen Meiling, into her wheelchair and then onto the vehicle. The two children followed excitedly behind. Along the way, Zhang Zixuan kept guessing what kind of lanterns they would see, while Zhang Yuxin held tightly to the rabbit lantern her mother had bought for her.

events.name: Visiting the Lantern Festival and Enjoying Family Happiness
events.description: Arriving at Victoria Park felt like stepping into a fairy-tale world woven with light and shadow. The massive lantern display of Chang'e flying to the moon and the adorable zodiac-themed lanterns drew gasps of delight from the children. Yu Xiaowei pushed her mother's wheelchair, moving slowly through the bustling yet orderly crowd, stopping now and then to take photos of her mother and the children in front of the beautiful lantern displays. Zhang Weiming took charge of buying candied haws and egg waffles, which the family shared. Chen Meiling, the mother, gazed at the dazzling lights and her joyful grandchildren, her face adorned with a relaxed smile, and she chatted more than usual.

events.name: Warm Return Journey
events.description: As the night grew deeper, the full moon hung high in the sky. The family, feeling content, boarded a taxi to head home. In the car, the two children were already dozing off, leaning against their parents, while the mother, though slightly weary, wore a serene expression. Yu Xiaowei and her husband exchanged a knowing smile, silently sharing a look that said, "The event was a success." This evening was free from the pressures of work, filled only with pure togetherness and joy.

events.name: Going to bed early due to activity fatigue.
events.description: Family outings can be physically demanding, and Yu Xiaowei felt exhausted, deciding to rest early.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City District, Hong Kong.
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to it, feeling excited about the family activity tonight.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, 328 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon City, Hong Kong.
结束状态.心情: Extremely happy, warm, and content, the family cohesion reached its peak tonight, and all the meticulous preparations received the best reward.

state.今日运动: Evening wheelchair walking tour in the park for about 1.5 hours, light activity.
